I live in a very low crime area but occasionally we get some thefts. I hope it just give someone a little pause for thought.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: This product is great! Home security is so important now day when it comes to protecting you family and home.This also helped with the "how to's"[...]

Reviews.Title: OUTDOOR FAKE / DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Uncle Sam "easygoing"
Reviews.Content: I bought several of these. They looked fairly good out of the box but 2 of the 5 I bought needed AA battery replacement on a weekly basis!! At that rate I could have done better over the long run with a real camera than this fake one!!

Reviews.Title: Almost a 5
Reviews.Author: Steven Carter "Steven B. Carter"
Reviews.Content: This camera is well worth the money. I had to put a 4 because it did break when I tried to turn it wrong. My bad, it was my fault. Super glue did the trick. What I did however, was modify it a little. I used to install for a real security company and I found the black looking wire in the back of this camera is kind of cheesy. What can you expect for the money. I am buying a couple more camera's by the way. Anyway, I just got a piece of red phone wire, white thin, (2 conductor wire, and because the piece that came with it was black, I got a piece of regular black thin cable wire. OK, I over did it a little but read on... I have had a lot of home break in's in the area and needed to make this as real looking as I can. So I took off the back cover, drilled 2 holes with a 1/4" drill bit so I could fit 3 wires in the camera, one whole at a time. You can glue it in if you want but it is not really needed. The point is, you have 3 wires, different colors, coming out of the camera now. Depending on how long you need those wires to go, like up in your attic, will determine how long the wire should be cut. ( Two wires will be fine, I just have access to red wire and that is why I added that to). Just make them a different color to show that one is for CCTV, and one is for the Security System. I mounted my camera near the eve of the roof on my back porch, looking at the back door. I drilled a whole, just big enough to fit the wire through the outside roof and simply stuck them in. I tie wrapped the wires to make them look like a company installed it and used sillicone to fill the hole. That was almost 3 months ago and my camera still flashes red, with only 2 AA batteries. My neighbor has already called the cops on some kids running out of my back yard. They got caught, were charged with trespassing but were minors and they were let go. The point is it worked, they saw the camera and took off. I hope you guys get the same as I got out of these. I strongly encourage a real CCTV system when you can afford it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Datina Chinda
Reviews.Content: This is a very good decoy.  It looks real from a distance and close up.  I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Does their purpose
Reviews.Author: AndrewN85
Reviews.Content: These dummy cameras look very realistic when you add in the blinking light. I purchased 3 for around the house and love them. I wonder how long the flashing light will last on the 2 AA batteries you have to use because getting up there and swapping them out multiple times a year would be kind of annoying, but they still are a nice option for those that have not jumped into or don't need a real full fledged security system.They obviously cannot substitute for the real thing but they are a good deterrent. The only fault I found with the cameras is the included hardware to mount them. The screws were just not good enough for exterior placement. I ended up having to use alternate screws to get into the concrete. If installing in drywall on the interior of a house or building it would probable work just fine, but this type of dummy camera is more suited for exterior placement in my opinion.Either way, for the price and what they are, they work just fine.

Reviews.Title: Looks real enough
Reviews.Author: JOSEPH AVENTO
Reviews.Content: This looks real enough that the grandkids were posing and asked to look at the tapes. I changed the subject.

Reviews.Title: Excellant Product, Worth the Price!
Reviews.Author: Gary L Bahr
Reviews.Content: This is a very well make camera. It is very sturdy and realistic looking and will not fall apart like some cheaper cameras. I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Arrived broken
Reviews.Author: Angry Ryan "Ryan A. Forrest"
Reviews.Content: Arrived broken, appears very low quality and red light is too bright. Anyone would be able to notice this is a fake camera but it was a good price and other reviews helped my choice to buy them. I have returned since they arrived damaged.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the money!
Reviews.Author: Crookedsky
Reviews.Content: Just received three of these, and I must say they are a very good product for the money.  Put them up around my house, and yes, they do look very realistic.  Only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because the small sliding hood could be a bit better fit on the unit.Also note, these are really designed to be mounted on a vertical surface.  However you can kind of twist them around and mount them on an overhang or directly into the ceiling and they still look great, but the hood will not be directly on top because of the angle.

Reviews.Title: It seems to be causing vandals to go elsewhere
Reviews.Author: C. P. Dalpiaz "paulo"
Reviews.Content: The battery change is easy, as long as you bring your ladder.  The batteries last for about three months before the led gets too dim to see except on a dark, dark night.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money
Reviews.Author: Kemosabe "Tom"
Reviews.Content: These are impressively realistic.  They look great up under the eves of my house.  Since they are plastic, I would keep them out of direct sun,  But they look fantastic, and I would highly recommend them.They use 2 AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nope!
Reviews.Author: Robyn Howes
Reviews.Content: The 2 security cameras I received are not the same ones shown in the picture. They look SUPER fake - even from a distance. In fact, I think the blinking light makes it look worse. My husband and I didn't even bother mounting them because they looked so cheap.

Reviews.Title: Stops bad people
Reviews.Author: PA
Reviews.Content: Had a package stolen off our front door so we installed a couple of these fake cameras. Flashing lights look real at night and the batteries last for ever. No more bad guys! Even the neighbors think they are real. Best deterrent you can buy for $10

Reviews.Title: Outdoor security camera - fake
Reviews.Author: Caroline A Cartwright
Reviews.Content: Very good item very pleased. Better than picture, thanks. I would probably buy more if I needed them, have told family and friends as it is such a good deal.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: moe
Reviews.Content: Excellent product looks real, I would recommend this product to anyone who has ever had anything stolen before in or out of their home.

Reviews.Title: Affordable security
Reviews.Author: Steven E.
Reviews.Content: This product is just what I was looking for. It looks great and gives the desired effect I was looking for. Well worth the money! Two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: melanie wagner
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I needed for my business. We don't have alot of money on hand, so I really just needed a deterrant. It looks real and does just what I need it to.

Reviews.Title: looks real to me
Reviews.Author: lmc "tiki244"
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews and like the majority,I'm very pleased with this item.  To me it looks real and after 3 weeks it's still blinking.  The price is so right I'm going to buy 2 more for my other house and if after a year the weather starts making them look bad,I will still feel like I got my money's worth.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real deal!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: I"ve fooled many family and friends with this.  I would highly recommend.  I mounted up high so it is hard to tell that it is plastic.  We'll see how it wears over time, but for ten bucks, who cares!  Great deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's intended to do...
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: FYI, the camera I received is NOT the exact camera pictured in the listing. I have posted photos of the cameras I received in the photos section of the product page. The cameras I received have a white cable coming out of the back, and there is no letting or graphics on the sides. It's a slightly different design. Same bright silver plastic color, though. Oh, and no little yellow sticker.That being said. These cameras are great for the price. They look real, even though they are made of plastic. Anyone you are trying to scare off won't get close enough to find out. The wire is white, which I'm not a fan of. Realistically, it should be black. The pivots on these don't seem to be as flexible as they would be on the one pictured on the listing that has the ball joint. But again, for the price, they are perfect. They go up in seconds, and they look real.The flashing red LED light is motion activated, so it is NOT constantly on. The range on the motion detector is only about 12", and I tested with both cameras I received. I didn't buy it for the flashing light, as other reviewers said, no REAL camera has a flashing LED. I have real Foscam outdoor cameras, and they don't have any flashing lights.Bottom line is, if you are looking for an inexpensive camera that looks real, then buy these. You won't find anything better for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Very Pleased! Will order item Again!
Reviews.Author: amprincess
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the item. Very authentic looking. I would not question the validity of this camera. You can almost see it come on. It plays tricks on the mind. Awesome and can't wait to order it again!

Reviews.Title: The BEST dummy security camera's on the market!
Reviews.Author: Henrietta De Leon
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these camera's and they were delivered today! I got them very quickly! As my review title states, they are the BEST looking security camera's I've found anywhere. I have been looking for a few months so I can place them on my front and back porches to deter crime from happening around my house. As many people have discovered, many REAL security camera's have no flashing red light on them, so I'm going to save my batteries and keep it "quiet". It will be noticed, so I don't think it calls for any other type of attention. I will be putting them up in a few days, and I expect the neighbors will be asking questions. I plan on NOT telling them they are fake, because I trust no one! Again, these camera's are the perfect size, color, and design to delude anyone. Don't look any further for anything better because you will not find it. These camera's are EXACTLY what you need. And THAT, you can trust me on!

Reviews.Title: Smile, you're on candid camera!
Reviews.Author: Safe T
Reviews.Content: Was having an interior system installed professionally and the technition was even fooled by them. He couldn't believe how realalistic they were!! Wanted to know where to get them and couldn't believe how inexpensive they were. Customer service was very good too when I had a problem with one of the three I had purchased.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Purchase
Reviews.Author: Ron Robbins
Reviews.Content: At first I was skeptical about buying something like this. But, After reading some of the reviews about this product. I decided to go ahead and buy two of them. Both cameras arrived earlier than promised (a big plus) and it took me about 20 minutes to mount and set both cameras. Once they are mounted you cannot tell that they are fake! So real in fact,one of my neighbors was at my front porch and was waiving into the "camera" instead of ringing my door bell. I'm just glad I happened to see him after a minute or so to just keep the illusion going. All I can say, It's a great buy and will be getting two more in the future.

Reviews.Title: very realistic
Reviews.Author: crashbrandon
Reviews.Content: Cameras appear to be real,they work great with my other cameras to make it appear as though there are no uncovered areas. They are light weight plastic,time will tell if they hold up to the outdoor eliments.  Shipping cost was on the high side, nearly as much as the cameras.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I needed
Reviews.Author: Francis Mohajerin "consumer"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these and used them for six months around a construction site to deter vandalism.  Worked like a charm.  No problems and most folks assumed the cameras were real.They are what they are, real looking fake cameras with a bright blinking red light.  You need to mount them high and in a spot they would realistically be mounted and make sure the fake cable is set correctly and you're in business.Works better than a sign, but not as good as a barking dog.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: ramyota "ram"
Reviews.Content: These cameras look like there's an authentic security system protecting your home and property. I installed them high on the gable end of my home, one facing the driveway, another the back yard. They are small so go unnoticed in this location. A more eye catching, detectable, location is an important strategy with these smaller units. I have to relocate them to a more obvious and noticable place on my house.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: At first I thought it was a little too big, but from the sidewalk it doesn't seem that way. The flashing red light is very noticeable and definately draws attention to the camera. I would buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: R. Calloway "Warpain"
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing. One friend of mine said he was going to come over at night and "moon" my camera. I never told him it was a fake, so he may have. It's a great buy, and I have had no problems.

Reviews.Title: no more slashed tires
Reviews.Author: ron lane
Reviews.Content: Many mornings before getting in my car to go to work,at a dark 3am,one or two of my tires were either slashed or the air let out. Driveway very dark,i would need expensive night vision cameras, got 2 of these dummy cameras.Very realistic looking, and the red blinking light makes it more so. No problems since.Best purchase i ever made.Great Job Amazon!rlane

Reviews.Title: Looks and Works Like the real thing
Reviews.Author: silverado12775
Reviews.Content: mounted this camera outside and put the batteries in, has been working for about a month now with no problems, the red lights flash at night making it look operational

Reviews.Title: Works Like a Charm!!
Reviews.Author: Charles Davis "Charles"
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough about the high-quality look and feel of these cameras. We ordered three to place all around our mobile home, as there have been reports of recent vandalism by youngsters in the area. It is quite amusing to see all the surprised looks and glances as people walk by. Unless you know that it's a decoy, any reasonable person would totally believe they were being recorded. The plastic is high-grade and feels solid, and even after quite a bit of maneuvering around (to find the right angle), there was no compromise to the sturdy look and feel of the camera. I LOVE the blinking red light. When I come home late at night, it does truly add a very real sense of "security" to my property and I feel really good having an extra set of "eyes" to scare off troublemakers.I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to add a bit of security to their property. We live in an area with a lot of senior citizens, and I've recommended these to a few of my neighbors. Amazing product!!

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake Security cameras
Reviews.Author: curiousgoods
Reviews.Content: I live in Panama and Bought these cameras for a friend who had a couple of prior break ins. She absolutly loves them, they were easy to hang up and adjust for a proper angle. Even two old ladies with a screwdriver and a ladder managed it with a little effort. They look perfect and just as good as any real ones. And she was thrilled that they even came with the large yellow stickers. You cannot miss that they are there with that sticker front and center. She sleep much better now! Thank you for the great product.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. No
Reviews.Content: Howdie, This camera looks very real. The blinking light works good, it is very noticeable. Mounts easily. However, this camera is made of plastic and is very light. I live in a windy area, so the camera will loosen and move. I'm going to find a permanent  position and glue it so it doesn't move anymore. Other than that, it's a good product.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Lovethemovies
Reviews.Content: This really works as a great deterrent!  We had someone trying to figure out the code on our garage door opener.  They haven't messed with it since we put up the "Security Camera"!

Reviews.Title: Great additions to the real thing. A good buy!
Reviews.Author: UniversityDoc
Reviews.Content: These are great additions to the real thing.  I purchased one of these to supplement my real survelliance system. As long as you don't handle them, they look real, almost identical to their real working predecessors.  They have the led lights in them, so when you view inside, you think they are real. The blinking real light blinks intermittently signaling that they are working and have an eye on you.I suggest these as a purchase for deterrents for your home and/or business. They're marked Videosecu, which is a plus, as Videosecu is manufacturer of working security cameras.

Reviews.Title: Security and Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: Rush "Rush"
Reviews.Content: Had an auction at my aunt's 93-acre farm last weekend.  Wanted to make sure that there was no stealing of her farm equipment once the auction notice hit the local newspapers.  Couldn't afford the real deal, so we purchased the outdoor fake/dummy security camera.  Installed this ingenious product in minutes and did it ever look like the real deal.  Needless to say, we had peace of mind and nothing went missing.  The auction went off without a hitch and my aunt was able to sell everything on the day of the auction.  Highly recommend this gem of a product.  Great product for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs! Amazing deal.
Reviews.Author: Stimpy
Reviews.Content: Great purchase! Does exactly what we need it to do. Was a bit surprised at the quality and the look of this camera...really looks REAL. Pretty easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery and realistic looking
Reviews.Author: Tazz Man
Reviews.Content: These cameras look similar to the real ones I have around the barn these  will deter crime in my opinion  .

Reviews.Title: dummy cams
Reviews.Author: Jose37
Reviews.Content: They look real, and the blinking red light makes it look over the top. They came thru the mail super quick, I will definitely purchase more

Reviews.Title: Great Fake Camera!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Ravella
Reviews.Content: Very nice little camera.I would also add that I put up some signs to say that area has cameras.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Randall
Reviews.Content: Mounted these on a pole and they look real. Didn't use batteries because real cameras don't have blinking leds.They look good and i will buy again.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: El Duende Quevedo "Indeh"
Reviews.Content: We have never had burglary nor a prowler and proof of this is that, after installing this, we still have no burglars nor prowlers,;) It musta worked.

Reviews.Title: Buy it now, stop reading reviews already...
Reviews.Author: Jeff Weissman "JWE"
Reviews.Content: I am a Master Electrician by trade, trust me, these things look real enough to send a smart criminal away.  Stupid criminals are still stupid & we can't prevent them from being stupid.The red led works good for a few months, but I never replaced them,  most real cameras don't have blinking lights anymore.Seriously get this and place it right in your face at the front and side doors, just place them enough out of reach.  Use the stickers and your odds of a random Breaking & Entering will go down to none.  Yes the stickers are tacky, and no camera is good looking,(until Apple make one)but, if this is what we have to do to keep crime out of our property, I'll do it.

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: C. Signor "bubbascas"
Reviews.Content: It truly looks like a real camera.  Very easy to mount and batteries can be easily installed for the blinking red light.  Very convincing.

Reviews.Title: Looks real enough
Reviews.Author: Eugene S. Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Plan to use both the units I bought without adding in batteries. Thus, no red LED effect. Will look very real that way.

Reviews.Title: Looks ok but no blinking light.
Reviews.Author: Rudolph Henderson
Reviews.Content: I think the camera looks authentic. So far so good. I popped in two aa battereies and no blinking light! Tried some brand new batteries and still no light. Now I am thinking that the only thing the electronics in this thing has to do is blink a light and it can't even do that. I tested the batteries in a tester and double checked the polarity was right but no frigging light. I'm sure it was shipped this way. Very bad quality control seller! Thanks for shipping out a defective product.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Quality
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Imagine my disappointment when I opened the box for this (fake) camera and while attempting to move the camera on the ball mount, had it snap off in my hands.  I literally had it out of the box for 15 seconds.I will say the camera looks legitimate and could be perceived as an actual/functioning camera.  However, you'd need to be able to get it out of the box in one piece before that could happen.Very disappointing.  It's unfortunate I can't return this item (since I am the one who actually broke the mount), but the quality (or lack of it) should account for something.Stay clear!

Reviews.Title: smile your on camera!
Reviews.Author: john tyler
Reviews.Content: can't beat the quality for the money! looks so real - I try to keep off the video! don't need no trouble around the house. lol...had small resale shops in the past and these look just like them!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: stopped working
Reviews.Author: eric coggins
Reviews.Content: The camera looks real from a distance and for the first week the red light would actually blink.  Then it stopped, and never came back on

Reviews.Title: Looks very real!  Can't tell it's not real.
Reviews.Author: Ms. B
Reviews.Content: This camera looks identical to the real thing....still do a double take when I look up at it.  Even looking directly into the lens, you can't tell it's not 'live'.......Great buy and a small price to pay for a bit of a deterent.

Reviews.Title: it is ok
Reviews.Author: X. Fan "Judy"
Reviews.Content: it is ok because the price. But it may use too much battery. I installed it and after 3 days, I fiind the red light is gone.

Reviews.Title: Like the look.. have not used yet
Reviews.Author: Robert Burns
Reviews.Content: Look real to me and one can add security... (false but better than nothing) with them.Can't imagine anyone not thinking they are real.

Reviews.Title: Look like the real thing!
Reviews.Author: Gene K. Wineland
Reviews.Content: Plastiic, but sturdy enough for the purpose designed. Easy to install with three wood screws. Great value for, hopefully,, strengthening home security.

Reviews.Title: Dang - it fooled me and I even know it's fake!
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Jackson
Reviews.Content: Great product, great price. I hope they make some smaller models, because this is more "business sized" rather than "home sized."

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Awesome deal for 5$. Installed this on the corner of my house and it looks so real. Seems to do the trick!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: MrLizard
Reviews.Content: This item works great.  Looks like the real deal cathes the eye with the blinking light not sure of battery life yet but will probably buy another...

Reviews.Title: The perfect way to trick would be bad guys
Reviews.Author: Vic C "Nerd Alert"
Reviews.Content: It looks real and the little blinking red light adds even more realism to this dummy security camera. I also love the fake wire that goes into the non-existent hole in my wall.I have it partially covered but it is exposed to rain and the sun. So far it has withstood all weather and is continuing to blink red!

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: timpop
Reviews.Content: These cameras have an unbelievable real look from up close and a distance. With the interior light on at night they really look good.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: SM "Pops"
Reviews.Content: Does the jobInexpensive for the peace of mind they offerEasy to installNote:Take the time to buy or print your own Warning signsIntruders will see your warning signs firstThen look up and see the "camera" and that's a more effective  deterrent

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: Barney Luthe
Reviews.Content: Like my purchase.  camera is a little larger than expected though. looks like the real thing! Received in a timely and on time!

Reviews.Title: Enough to scare away the plan
Reviews.Author: Rahul Menon
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the amount I spent. Its been 2 months now. LED light is just bright enough. No complains here.

Reviews.Title: outdoor security  camera (Dummy)
Reviews.Author: Franklin P.
Reviews.Content: They work the little light make other think they are realI have real ones next to them so if someone tries to dismantle the dummy ones they forget the real ones I have installed

Reviews.Title: Looks so real
Reviews.Author: Wulamjingying "Happy Shopping!"
Reviews.Content: It looks so real. I guess it will serve the purpose although I have not installed it. For small amount of money invested, I could have a little ease of mind.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Brenda Jones
Reviews.Content: Works great and looks real. Several have ask about it and we tell them yes you are on camera! Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fathers day
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: My dad had just mentioned he with he felt more secure with people that passed by his home. He did not want to bother with the real deal. I looked it up on Amazon and there it was!

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Orthmann
Reviews.Content: They so far are working out very good.  I have them set up to be seen in our driveway along with a good sign.  No problems since I put it up.

Reviews.Title: does the job
Reviews.Author: Carlton Robinson "carlton robinson"
Reviews.Content: Was told that person who put up these cameras got extra peace of mind at night.  Single mom with one son notices the long stare up at the cameras as strangers pass in the road.  Apparently, persons with ill intentions do not like the idea of cameras snooping out front.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Matthew A. Couch
Reviews.Content: Came in yesterday and already up and working, we have some school kids that always steal our roses from our garden in the front yard, this looks real enough with the red blinking light that I think they will think twice before taking roses again. I even put one in the alleyway where our mail box is because in the past we have had people driving down the alley looking through mail boxes. they also come with a bright yellow sticker stating closed circuit camera, so I stuck that next to the camera, looks pretty cool, it take 2 double A batteries and the red light blinks intermittently giving it a more realistic effect. Thanks. Matt

Reviews.Title: Forget about the batteries
Reviews.Author: D. Robinson
Reviews.Content: This product drains pricey lithium AA batteries in about two months.  So I second those reviewers who say to forget about batteries.  If the light is important to you, get a GGI International half-dome camera, where regular AA batteries last about four months.Pros: Looks real from 15' or so.Cons: Looks like plastic up close.  Drains batteries.  Rather small - hard to notice it from the street (may want a larger one).

Reviews.Title: Cheap yet effective
Reviews.Author: Dude in desert
Reviews.Content: Realistic enough to make a scumbag thief think twice.  I bought two of them and also purchased some additional stickers to place on my windows.  Takes 2 AA batteries, the red blinking LED light gets attention.

Reviews.Title: Looks real and fools most people
Reviews.Author: Atech
Reviews.Content: I have tested how real this looked by putting this in front of my house and most of my guests that come over think it is real and ask what type of security system I have setup.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't mount from ceiling
Reviews.Author: Engineer "Engineer"
Reviews.Content: Hard to criticize this given its price, and it works fine mounted from a wall or horizontal bottom surface.  I hoped to mount it under an eve, which doesn't work well with its bracket.  It will mount under an eve OK if you want it pointed fairly steeply downward.  If you want it pointed almost horizontally, an eve mount doesn't work.  There are hemispherical fake cameras -- they'd work better under an eve.

Reviews.Title: Cheap looking. They look fake to anyone who knows
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: If you are a real intruder and not a crack head you will know these are fake. They don't even look real. Maybe from a hundred feet away they are great but once you get within 10 feet...not going to fool a smart intruder.

Reviews.Title: Not too effective
Reviews.Author: Les J.
Reviews.Content: at deterring stupid neighborhood kids to stay away from your precious vehicles. It blinks...and a normal security camera does not blink..it stays on...

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: R. Brewer
Reviews.Content: After waiting for a week for this to be shipped and following the mounting instructions to a tee, I am going to get another camera FROM a different supplier. The red light refuses to blink. I have tried using three different sets of batteries and it still won't work. Clever Edgar sure is, he got my money. Don't let him get yours.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: J.A.Tisevich
Reviews.Content: This is one of the better investments in my recent purchases of the year. It works great to deter the people not picking up their dog poop in my neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: A decent "dummy" security camera
Reviews.Author: C. Loeffler
Reviews.Content: This fake camera looks OK and is pretty easy to mount.  However, I wouldn't recommend putting it someplace where the casual observer can inspect it close-up.  It's not quite THAT realistic.  I mounted mine under the eave of the roof, where it can't be inspected close-up without a ladder, but is readily visible from the front door of the house.  It has a batter-powered blinking light, which I guess is supposed to make it look more realistic, but the light can be left off simply by leaving the battery out.  It must work, since no one has broken in to the house since I put it up :)

Reviews.Title: I may order more of these for my other locations.
Reviews.Author: beaudr
Reviews.Content: I purchased one with very cheap price. It worked better than expected. However, after observing Security Cameras in stores and the cameras atop Walmart, I removed the batteries from mine. None of the Profession Store Mounted Cameras had 'flashing' lights. Plus, the 'real' Cameras that I already had mounted, didn't have 'flashing' lights. Now, the unwanted visitors will have to wonder which are 'real' and which may not be 'real'.I may order more of these for my other locations.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: r.r.gore
Reviews.Content: I honestly can't believe how cheap this is.  I especially appreciated this fact considering that numerous incidences of theft are what necessitated the spending of my hard earned money on this item.It seems to have worked.  Ashtrays, plants and packages are no longer being stolen daily off my front porch.  Pretty darn good solution for such a small amount of money.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfect
Reviews.Author: Sun Set
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera three months ago and it has worked perfect. We have not had to replace the batteries yet. It appears to be a real camera to anyone looking up. The red light flashes constantly. I drilled a pea size hole in the brick and ran the cord inside so that it looks like it really runs a recorder. It actually fooled my insurance agent.

Reviews.Title: good fake carera
Reviews.Author: M. idrissi "Idrissi"
Reviews.Content: this plastic made care is excellent, it does get the job done, and looks real ........................ so it will do the job of deterring thieves and unwanted visitors.....

Reviews.Title: Very nice looking, great price
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: I think these fake cameras will really fool someone thinking of stealing or breaking into property, they really look real!  Great deal.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Jawbreaker
Reviews.Content: We love this, and initially bought it waiting to purchase the "real deal".They are amazingly similar and realistic, so didn't bother to take it down.Of course, you want the real thing, but if you can't get it, this is excellent.The flashing red light still works on the same battery after 6 months!

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Cody Knauff
Reviews.Content: Very realistic. A little bigger than what I was thinking. (That's what she said) but it does a great job. Very realistic and I don't think I will have any problems since it looks so real with the flashing red light and what not

Reviews.Title: I like the blinking red light
Reviews.Author: macbc
Reviews.Content: This is easy to install, just 3 screws, done in few minutes.  My main worry was the cable, I don't want to dig any hole in my wall, but this was easiest part, just tuck it into the turning joint.  I have it pointing at the front door from the overhang of the garage.  It has this red blinking light going 24/7, runs on 2 AA batteries (not included).  Very bright, I can see it from inside the house or from the curbside, slightly annoying but we will get used to it.I think if anything that will scare away the thieves will be the blinking red light, they can guess what it is, so they will not bother to get too close to see it is a fake camera made with very light weight very cheap plastic.  I handled it, it is light and cheap, I don't know how stupid the thieves are these days, if they get close, they can see it is fake, but more likely they are not that stupid to walk up to a security camera, are they?  Go to next door, this one has that scary blinking red light.

Reviews.Title: tHESE CAMERAS WORK AND LOOK GREAT
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: THESE CAMERAS WORK AND LOOK GREAT FOR A PLACE THAT YOU JUST NEED A LITTLE BIT OF FAKE SECURITY WITH OUT HAVING POWER AT LOCATION

Reviews.Title: Fake Cameras
Reviews.Author: Luv4Snoopy
Reviews.Content: What more can you say about them. They are plastic and a little cheap looking but as a theft deterrent I guess they serve their purpose. It is a nice touch that they have a "wire" sticking out from the rear which give the impression they are hardwired through the wall.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake , Dummy Security Camera with Blinking Light (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Buff Don't Bluff Blackler
Reviews.Content: The more cameras the better... hopefully this will keep away the less desirable human beings...  looks real and was easy to install.. does not take a rocket scientist to install...

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Rafael C.
Reviews.Content: I have had it out exposed to rain, hot sun etc. and it keeps on working. It's working in Costa Rica and let me tell you it's easy to install and it just looks and it's awesome. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Dan Lopez
Reviews.Content: would recomend this because look soo real neighbors have ask me if it cost alot t install but to me its soo cool they think that good buy good price...

Reviews.Title: Convincing and cheap but red light failed
Reviews.Author: LPDDS
Reviews.Content: Fine for simple deterrent value. Looks real until you get within a foot or two so still useful even above a doorway.However, don't expect the red LED to last more than a week or two. Bit disappointing, but on the other hand, it was fairly obnoxious so won't miss it.

Reviews.Title: a perfect imposter
Reviews.Author: Peter Bates
Reviews.Content: These are very real looking and once installed you really can't tell the difference between them and the ral thing.

Reviews.Title: Great item. No one will ever know!
Reviews.Author: Ivan Frost
Reviews.Content: My family even thinks this is real. They will never never know. Think I'm going to order three more of these. It's amazing how people act when they think they're being video recorded. Amazing Item!

Reviews.Title: works great, looks pretty real from the street
Reviews.Author: E. WOO "kewalosurfer guy"
Reviews.Content: We have rentals and have had occasional problems with trespassers and graffiti. I set one up facing the front gate and the other facing out of the garage storage window. I just put them up, and so far so good. Can't really tell that they're fake, excellent reproduction. I also have 4 legit wireless LOREX cams installed on the property, but I think these will work just fine for the less sophisticated criminal.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected!
Reviews.Author: Carla Novaresi
Reviews.Content: Purchased them to annoy a noisy neighbor and it appears to be working!!  Unless up close can not tell they are fake.  Great outcome for the price.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY GREAT
Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: I have some real cameras and some of those F. cameras.This F. camera doing just everything except of recording. It is very sturdy, looks so real that I already started to think, that I have real thing. Keep bad people out of my property. I have those F. cameras for two years now. Survived well first winter.I did not place battery and as result do not have blinking light because: 1. it requires to go up-up on the tall ladder while replacing  2. it could alert neighbors and others that  something m.b. fishy about cameras if I am replacing the battery,3. if bad people used to see the blinking and it stops, they would think that the camera is "dead" .Just make sure that you are buying silver color, sometimes they sell lilac color, which  remind me toy like subject.

Reviews.Title: Realistic
Reviews.Author: Sandhills Complete Security
Reviews.Content: These cameras look like the real deal. They are light weight and look like the real thing. These could be a real deterrent for your home or business. While no substitute for the real thing, these are a good first step for the budget minded.

Reviews.Title: Working well
Reviews.Author: Adam M. Bendig
Reviews.Content: I'd almost like to see some of the IR led's light up since sometimes you can just barely make them out in real devices, but it's done well for me. The battery last about a month if I can recall correctly, for the single flashing LED. Nice little camera, looks cheap when you have hands on time but mounted up on a wall it's tough to distinguish between real and fake.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Linda K.
Reviews.Content: Looks real.  After placing this up my neighbors thought I had put in a security systems.  Looks realistic and very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Deno
Reviews.Content: These camera are great. I bought additional this spring to take to the other house. Batteries last a long time.

Reviews.Title: Do it.
Reviews.Author: Unobfuscated
Reviews.Content: Good price point and quality for a cheap deterrent.  Don't use blinking light.  Per most research/feedback, blinking lights are not suggestive of an operational 'real' security camera.  Install well out of reach (so that its operation/functionality/quality cannot be discerned upon closer inspection) and you should be fine.  Wear in elements if not under cover not tested, but suspect it to be comparable of that of a 'real' camera.

Reviews.Title: So real!!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Ferrari
Reviews.Content: This is so simple and everyone thinks it real!Pop the battery in, attach outside. Not a single person knew it was fake.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: david kleinfelder
Reviews.Content: For the price these are not bad units.  They look a littly cheezy but, It would make me think twice.  Batteries don't last as long as I'd like for only powering a LED light,  Maybe 2 months+.  Light just starts getting dimmer as it dies.  Ordered 3 of these and one had screwed up printing on the side of the camera where they had a double image about 1/4" shifted, but it wasn't a huge deal since i had it in a high location  Led light is very bright at night and can be seen during the day if paying attention.  Have one camera mounted to outside of building and as you pull around a corner it stands out like a sore thumb at night from 400 ft away.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: glen wells
Reviews.Content: done the job

Reviews.Title: home security
Reviews.Author: Ruben Cifuentes
Reviews.Content: it helps to keep my home a little bit safer, if I can make the intruders second guessing if they are on video or not, it has done it's job

Reviews.Title: Great Faux Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Jack Flanigan "Jack F"
Reviews.Content: These are great! Look like the real thing.  Batteries last for apprx 3 months before needing replacement.  EZ to do as long as you can get to camera with a step ladder.  Have 2 of these and have had them 3 yrs now.  No problems.

Reviews.Title: I got two
Reviews.Author: Oliver W. Robertson
Reviews.Content: I placed one of these very real looking cameras over my main entry door and the other over the back entrance. It won't prevent a pro burgler from coming in, but it might deter the average crack-head opportunist from committing suicide.  If our good president releases all the "non-violent" druggies from their current sentences as he recently proposed, these fake cameras just might prevent an early death sentence for one or more of these "steal from anyone to feed the habit desperados".

Reviews.Title: Look real!
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for the security on the sailboat. For open the camera, just slide the cover on top and put batteries for the led. You have also a piece of wire...look more real.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: mr.vr4
Reviews.Content: This is made entirely of plastic, not the best quality. But for the price and appearance at a distance it's a great deal! I definitely would recommend this unit.

Reviews.Title: Does its job.
Reviews.Author: T. A. Gilman
Reviews.Content: Looks real enough from afar. The light is kinda heavy in comparison to the arm and adjustment nuts and joints. Those are kind of flimsy as they are plastic. Had this been made of metal I don't think you could go wrong. I've had it blinking for over 3 months now on the one battery. That's pretty amazing. Have no idea how much longer it will be before battery change, but this is good so far.I think this is a good item. It has deterred (knock on wood) any vandalism or thievery (we suffered some tagging and break-ins in my neighborhood recently)....so far so good!

Reviews.Title: exellent
Reviews.Author: Thierry A. Chanudet "thierry-jax-florida"
Reviews.Content: very good product , very good pricelook like the real thingif you put a duck tape on the top of the batteries compartment and then put the coveryou will not have any problemsmine are outside around the house , the batteries last around 3 to 4 monthsI recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Great Deterent!
Reviews.Author: ozone
Reviews.Content: These fake cameras fooled me and look so real.  If I were a burglar I would move to the next house before taking a chance that these were not the real thing.  I've hung four of them.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Eve M
Reviews.Content: It's made out of a hard plastic but if the product is up high enough you can be fooled. The short black rubber cord makes the product appear hard wired if you attach the cord to the wall with an adhesive. Be prepare though to replace the batteries so keep the location easy for YOU to make the change. The batteries are located on top of the unit that has a cover that slides off. The picture shows the cover on top extending a little over the face.  I bought it month ago and so far the batteries are stilling working but I expect I will need to change them soon. I placed one on my lanai and it's dark outside and you can definitely see the red blinking light from afar. I seriously don't think anyone who sees it would take a chance that it's not real. For the price of $6 bucks you can't expect any better design than what is offered just wish the quality of the batteries were different. Having said that, it works for us. I bought three of them and have one on the inside so if anyone is looking in, thats the first thing they will see.

Reviews.Title: wonderful.  looks real
Reviews.Author: seriously
Reviews.Content: No one comes syphoning gas fro my van now that I have this aimed down the driveway!  Have it up high enough on porch post pointing to the driveway. every thinks it is real. I Like the red flashing light since in the dark it attracts ones eye to it. otherwise someone prowling in the dark may not notice it..  The 2 AA batteries last me 3 months and are no problem to replace.  I bought another one to put up next to the girls window aimed across to catch their window and my rabbit condo.  No one messing around my yardin the over a year I have had these. They hold up in the weather well also

Reviews.Title: Security Cam
Reviews.Author: CavScoutCasey
Reviews.Content: Look great mounted outside! LED is bright enough to see during a bright day as well, and they don't look fake at all. Unless you were inspecting it from an inch away which most would be thieves wouldn't even dare to get that close. Pretty neat.

Reviews.Title: Realistic as long as you don't look to closely
Reviews.Author: E. Clarke
Reviews.Content: Look, for $6 this is as good as you will get. Look closely and you will see it is plastic but most people will likely take a brief look and just assume it is real. I fooled my coworker for half the day until he really started looking at it. Install them where they may provide a visual deterrent and you have spent your $6 wisely. One of the red lights on the two I bought did not work, so I just left the batteries out.

Reviews.Title: They look real.
Reviews.Author: J. L. Brundage
Reviews.Content: Everyone seems to notice them and think they are real.  We have had no more vandalism issues since installation. YES

Reviews.Title: WORKS GREAT AND LOOKS REAL
Reviews.Author: tina miller
Reviews.Content: Everything was as described works perfect and arrived on time .Looks like the real thing with working blinking light.Awesome product

Reviews.Title: Look pretty real
Reviews.Author: alrmom
Reviews.Content: I got these and they look pretty real, everyone that sees them thinks they are being recorded lol. So suits the purpose perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Does as described
Reviews.Author: Martha "MomWow"
Reviews.Content: Made of plastic, so treat with caution- but looks real, red light blinks when you put in (provide your own)  batteries.  Looks great!

Reviews.Title: Does work
Reviews.Author: Deborah Marlott
Reviews.Content: Being plastic, the handle broke off, but I can still use it in my living room window and it has had folks when they see it, keep on walking away.Being battery operated, the batteries do last for some time.

Reviews.Title: Works well with Raspberry Pi
Reviews.Author: Rick Demings "Douglas Hatteras"
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good fit for Raspberry Pi usage.The dimensions are just right to fit the board and the camera.It can be easily unassembled so you can fit everything in right :)Good product and cost affective.BTW, the red LED works just fine (not using it).

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Lee in AZ
Reviews.Content: for the price ok, but the batteries don't seem to last as long as in the other one I had of unknown brand.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for a dummy
Reviews.Author: Tommy J
Reviews.Content: Looks realistic. Problem is that the mount set screw is weak and unit will sag. Probably will glue it in position. The battery last a long time. The flashing red light grabs your attention.

Reviews.Title: well worth it.
Reviews.Author: Jhunter
Reviews.Content: Awesome put the lights up in November and original batteries are still working in April. Yes they're fake but I have caught myself looking up going a camera oh yeah dummie!!!

Reviews.Title: They look real!!!
Reviews.Author: ron rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Cameras look great and most portantly, they look real! Love the red light flashing and black cord extending to the side, it definetly looks real. I installed them almost 3 months ago, I wonder how long the batteries will last, so far the 3 "cameras" are working great. Recommend purchasing, the price it's unbeatable!

Reviews.Title: This is a bargin and it looks real!
Reviews.Author: John P. Rhodes "John Paul"
Reviews.Content: Don't bother putting the batteries in; real security cameras usually don't blink like that.  It is large and looks real.  Maybe it will keep those evil people who want to take your stuff.  Good luck.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: Katawampas
Reviews.Content: We have real cameras on our property but they are not visible.  We wanted a fake camera to drive home the point that we have cameras.  We also have a visible sign warning of 24 hour camera surveillance.  This camera is a fairly good fake camera.  It is plastic & if you look at it closely, it looks fake.  We mounted it up high on our 2-story house so it can't be seen up close & can't be tampered with.  It looks very real, especially at night when you notice the light blinking.Mount this in a place you can easily get to because you will need to change the battery.  We can access ours from a window so it's not an ordeal.  Also mount it in a logical spot for a camera; a real camera would have electricity so choose your location wisely.

Reviews.Title: Look's real!
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Excellent product for establishing fake security. Look's real enough to be real. The blinking light gives it the real effect.

Reviews.Title: They Look Authentic
Reviews.Author: patricia frazier
Reviews.Content: Although made from plastic these little cameras look authentic.  I can't commit on the battery life since I haven't used the red blinking light feature.  I will probably order a couple of additional such cameras in the future.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable
Reviews.Author: Michael B.
Reviews.Content: This is a reasonable look alike of a cheap home security camera. I did not install the batteries, because my other cameras do not blink.  This one is place in a very noticeable, easy-to-get-to place as a decoy for the real cameras.

Reviews.Title: they look real to me.
Reviews.Author: erin "erin keck"
Reviews.Content: not sure if other people agree with me because s*** still gets ripped off from my house. someone just stole my lemon tree. i have two of these cameras. one facing the driveway and one by my front door. i dont get packages stolen anymore. just trees.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: Judie
Reviews.Content: Have fooled most people.  Would highly recommend to anyone.  Easy to install and look like the real thing. great price.

Reviews.Title: Real Enough To fool my wife
Reviews.Author: Jameson
Reviews.Content: I  have been talking about buying a surveillance system for years. When this little jewel came I hung it without telling her what it was. She was astonished to learn it was fake. I am very happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: Decent - Plastic
Reviews.Author: Dee "Trinity"
Reviews.Content: Yes they are plastic and work on 2AA batteries but they will do the trick for me as I cannot wire up real ones due to how far the area is from an electric source.  These will be just fine, and from up in the air I don't really think that any one will scrutinize them.  As a deterrent,  I think they will do the job... cheaply.

Reviews.Title: good imitation
Reviews.Author: Curtis Crockett
Reviews.Content: looks realistic, batteries last a long time, actually bought another one to put in a blind spot on my house and aim at a crazy neighbors...

Reviews.Title: WORK GOOD
Reviews.Author: Hank Kramer
Reviews.Content: I've had these for about 2 yrs. & they work good.I use my rechargeable batteries & they seem to last about 3 months.the red blinking light is bright & you can see them from the road.you can't tell if there real or not.

Reviews.Title: Fake cameras seem to be deterring criminals
Reviews.Author: DAVE
Reviews.Content: The cameras look genuine and intimidating even close up.So far, all criminal activity has ceased.I installed the cameras in 5 minutes.Can't beat that for cost effectiveness.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: MarlaT
Reviews.Content: I put it up and I have to tell you, it looks like a real security camera. There is a red light that blinks on and off to indicate it is active,,, I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Title: Larger than expected
Reviews.Author: Mr. Perry "Perry"
Reviews.Content: makes a real impact. Solid construction. easy to change batteries (2xAA). LED flashes bright. about every 2 seconds. Minimal pivoting. includes 3 small screw and 3 anchors if needed. Also includes large square (diamond style) sticker , yellow, CCTV and graphic of camera 4x4in.

Reviews.Title: missing a key feature
Reviews.Author: Chen Sun "WebAndNet.com"
Reviews.Content: See the short plastic tail?  Better if it was longer, so that it can be better tucked away and not reveal it's empty.

Reviews.Title: Looks authentic
Reviews.Author: Nance Home
Reviews.Content: Attached this under the eave at my father's house.  It gives him peace of mind since it looks like the real thing.

Reviews.Title: For $5.90, who could resist?
Reviews.Author: C. B. Banks
Reviews.Content: Comes with NO directions, but is easy to install.  Just detached the top camera part and drilled in the base.  Then re-connected the camera portion.  Wanted it up high enough where no one could tell it was a fake, so I put it above my garage door pointing toward the street.  It is close to an outdoor light and really looks like it is connected to the same electrical wiring.  Just push the short tubing down into the hole when finished.  Has a red light that flashes and looks like the real deal.Batteries load in the top under the shield.  I hope it will just be a simple matter of taking that shield off and replacing dead batteries in the future.  Have to get up on a tall ladder for that.  It IS outdoors and will be in the elements so the batteries may not hold up as long as usual.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Hector D.
Reviews.Content: I liked how this arrived to me in 3Day with no x/tra cost. REALISTIC yea! my friends and nieghbors still dont know its a dummy. My parents liked it too and purchased a pair

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Floyd
Reviews.Content: Works as described and is effective (so far) at keeping would-be intruders at bay. It's very easy to install with three screws.

Reviews.Title: they look fairly real
Reviews.Author: john doe
Reviews.Content: Unless you walk right up to them they are good enough to fool most of the ignorant low life thieves out there!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ben Robbins
Reviews.Content: Once you get the batteries installed, and the camera mounted, this thing looks AWESOME! I purchased two, one for the front of my home and one for the rear. BUY THIS PRODUCT! Seriously, how can you beat the price??

Reviews.Title: Looks real.
Reviews.Author: Richard Reese
Reviews.Content: I put this over my front door after a recent robbery spree in the neighborhood.  It looks real enough.  The red light looks like it is recording.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Cameras excellent
Reviews.Author: Ronald Dansie
Reviews.Content: They look good and were exactly as the company described them.  I have put them up among other real cameras and am very pleased with how they look.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: John Jay
Reviews.Content: Real look, Very Detailed and easy to install. It even fooled me. Amazed at how it looks. Has flashing light. A real hoot.

Reviews.Title: Smile! I tricked you!
Reviews.Author: Pancit25
Reviews.Content: Ha! Bought these to add a faux security outside our home. We have a security system for our home and we have 2 live cameras in front door & back door that we paid $140 per camera for. I wasn't going to put it outside since its an expensive cam. With or without battery it still looks real! 4 stars because the wire part can be detached if its windy outside and of course people will know its fake if it falls out. So we had to do some adjustments, like glueing it in place and also its a pain to adjust it. Not many 'wiggle' room to flip cam upside down. But the price is affordable and works great!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wish it would flash less often and use up the batteries more slowly
Reviews.Author: J. Valiulis
Reviews.Content: It actually looks pretty good, and I think will be convincing from high up. But it flashes once every second, which uses up the batteries. It would have been terrific if the red light blinked every 15-20 seconds instead, which would likely give a multi-year period between needed battery replacements.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Great product the light was brilliant just what I was looking for, I will be buying more of these in the future

Reviews.Title: Adds to the real thing
Reviews.Author: Ignatius Malibu
Reviews.Content: I have these mixed with some real ones around my place.  Great supplement to existing security.  Appears I have more area covered than I actually do.  Just keep checking to make sure the batteries don't get wet outside.  So far I have not had a problem with that

Reviews.Title: What a Great Foolery
Reviews.Author: Ponitayl
Reviews.Content: We were at odds with our neighbors that moved in next door and put 1 up to make a point of not letting their dogs yap under our bedroom windows.It worked out great and the noise level has gone to NIL!We bought 3, and have yet to place the other 2, but they certainly have an effect!(Teeheehee)

Reviews.Title: A realist fake
Reviews.Author: Randy Dunn
Reviews.Content: The Dummy Security Camera is realistic looking and the blinking red light is pretty cool two. I wish it was a little smaller.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Delmus Bradley
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend to use and it was great.  It solved the problem and I would buy more of these in the future.

Reviews.Title: security
Reviews.Author: Smith
Reviews.Content: We had a crook break into our garage and since we posted this camera we have had no problems. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Dan G "ComputerMan"
Reviews.Content: They're a little cheap looking but unless you look very closely, they should serve as a deterrent.  I'm a little disappointed that they require 2 AA batteries.  I would think lighting one small LED could be done with a single battery.Update, when installing these, the plastic mounting bracket breaks very easy.  I was using self-taping screws so perhaps a bit too rough for these.  To avoid breaking, I'd suggest removing the camera from the bracket and pre-drilling the mounting holes.  Once secure, reinstall the camera.

Reviews.Title: Looks real but mount material feels less sturdy
Reviews.Author: Jeff Davidoff
Reviews.Content: Looks real from a distance, especially with the blinking light.  Mount can be more sturdy though. It runs on 2 AA batteries (for the blinking light only, the LED lights around the edge are non-functional), so it should last a very long time.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: miguel mejia (18-00237)
Reviews.Content: I have been struck this camera has really liked is constructed of very good material and really looks like genuine security camera I recommend it and so I'll give a 5

Reviews.Title: does what it says it does?
Reviews.Author: BurnedCustomer101
Reviews.Content: it's a fake and cheaply made camera casing with an LED powered by two AA batteries. i'm not sure how to expect any more or less of it. the lens is glass rather than plastic, bonus. seems real enough at a distance--if this is what you need, the $8 is worth it.

Reviews.Title: dummy cameras for dummy crooks
Reviews.Author: jeff scoggin
Reviews.Content: These are not bad for the money. They do look pretty real and I think they will deter would be wanna be criminals and maybe even some more experienced criminals. When you put them up try to do it when people are at work so its not as noticeable,  and have somebody talking  to you while you wave at the camera to act like your checking to see if they can see you on a monitor in the house.

Reviews.Title: Gotta have more!
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I have bought four of these so far and i.Installed all around our properties. With blinking red light, these look daunting. Cheap solution to spending big bucks on the real ones. Of course, there is no recording! :)

Reviews.Title: Great product, but maybe a bit too obvious
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is great and I love that they have the cord that can be tucked back into the base to make it look like it's actually wired.My one issue with it is that the LED is a bit TOO bright. It makes it look a little fake and it kind of screams "Look at me! I'm a camera!" which may or may not be what you're looking for. I use mine indoors and in a dark room it's incredibly bright for a security camera.Overall this is a great dummy camera and I'd buy another if I ever lose or break this one. Just be aware of the bright light if you plan on using it in a dark room indoors.

Reviews.Title: Cheap for cheap
Reviews.Author: shopalot
Reviews.Content: Would look more realistic without the print on the side.  We know it's a camera, you don't need to label it as such!All plastic.  Light is useless, gives away it's fake.  Real cameras have a solid light, not blinking!

Reviews.Title: Dummy security camera
Reviews.Author: Georgi Macdonald
Reviews.Content: I have this set up in my patio pointed towards the back of the house and hopefully this will give anyone that might want to break in another idea.

Reviews.Title: Its fooling the people I need to fool!
Reviews.Author: S. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I got this mounted high on my building.  It looks very real and I tell everyone it is!  Great price.

Reviews.Title: Clever
Reviews.Author: Jordan Renander
Reviews.Content: Looks like something out of a James Bond movie but hey no complaints.  Overall, its what I expected.  9/10 times a crook sees a camera it will not break and enter, so I am told

Reviews.Title: Solid Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: Bartell Cope
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done. Water got in the area that holds batteries and the blinking light died, but if you pair this with a "CCTV in Use" sign and mount it high enough that passerby can't reach it, you're golden. Looks like the real thing, but way way cheaper than an actual system.

Reviews.Title: "ARE" THEY "REAL" ???
Reviews.Author: blue
Reviews.Content: Good way to fool the not so honest . This camera looks real! I've had neighbors , think it's real! I don't use the battery, because that's a dead give away, their fake. Real cameras don't have a flashing light on them. If you don't have hundreds of dollars for the real deal, than this well work.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: FPC
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing, 2 months now and light blinking perfectly.  I did modify a little by opening the back and running a longer coax cable out to simulate hardwire.  Neighbor liked too and bought one.

Reviews.Title: faked the dummy down the hall out!!!
Reviews.Author: Statler And Waldorf "Everyone appreciates goo...
Reviews.Content: yup that fool thought it was real! I had him believing he had been caught .... well you can use your imagination ... come on now get your mind out of the gutter this is a family site I was referring to picking his nose! Anyway the blinking light totally makes you think it is real! If you want to be safe, and fake out those shady people who to need  think they are being watched in order to act civilized then this is the product for you!

Reviews.Title: On camera or not??
Reviews.Author: Matt Winfree
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what I wanted it to do. Cheap, 2AA batteries installed a red light flashes on the front and makes potential thieves think again. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Jerry N.
Reviews.Content: I was so well pleased that I recommended them to a friend and I also made an additional order, the batteries last real good and they look so real

Reviews.Title: The price was right !!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence M. Weber "LMWMAIN"
Reviews.Content: As expected these were low priced, but nice looking. The first one I installed I managed to crack the plastic mounting bracket.  lmw

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: terry
Reviews.Content: Perfect product for the price.  Put it up high so no one knows it's plastic.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a deterent.

Reviews.Title: I bought one of these a few mounths ago and the LEDS have already stopped Working
Reviews.Author: Paul K. Hodson
Reviews.Content: I installed new batteries but it did not make any difference. I just assumed I have a bad item. So, it was not worth return it I just purchased a new one and it is working fine.

Reviews.Title: WOW, it just look real
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Rodriguez "Camera photography student"
Reviews.Content: Thank you for inventing this camera, I installed a whole 8 real camera system, and placed this one right next to the others, and no one knows that it is fake.  LOL. : )

Reviews.Title: One of the most convincing fakes I've seen, and cord doubles the deterence factor.
Reviews.Author: Danny Langford
Reviews.Content: Our fake cameras have been up five months, and the first batteries we installed are still working.  We have a real, but low profile alarm system, but realized a deterent is better than being warned when something has already happened.  A few strategically placed "Cameras" will serve as quite a deterent.  The look of thes is very good. My only complaint is the top cover is very loose and can blow off in very hard winds if placed in area exposed to wind.

Reviews.Title: good for the purpose
Reviews.Author: mick
Reviews.Content: it realy works well  looks like a real cam thats why many dont come too close you want to secure your home buy this ann you see the difference.

Reviews.Title: People will avoid the "coverage" area
Reviews.Author: Da Penguin
Reviews.Content: Its odd that this fake $8 camera works as well as a thousand dollar home security system, but this and save money.

Reviews.Title: Looks very real
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Having installed many real cameras I can say that this one looks real. But don't waste your time or money putting a battery in for the blinking light. Real  IR cameras don't have blinking lights. That would be a giveaway to a burglar that this is a fake camera.

Reviews.Title: Works great, looks intimidating
Reviews.Author: EllPro
Reviews.Content: When the "camera" arrived, everything was in perfect condition. It took me a second to figure out where the AA batteries went (the weather cover unclips and the door is under that), but then it went right up. A have a classic Mercedes that people had been dirt-drawing on, so I wanted to visually dissuade the neighborhood kids from doing so. This sucker is doing the trick. It looks visually intimidating, so I have no worries it'll do its job.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: the red light still works but it had big cracks all over it and I know it wasn't much out of pocket but I don't want to pay for broken stuff

Reviews.Title: It looks so real!
Reviews.Author: Spanish Baker in Frisco "Phoebe"
Reviews.Content: We use these on rental properties.  We bought a couple of these dummy cameras to post around so when the delivery trucks or repair people come around, they think we are watching them.  I like the peace of mind these cameras give.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: K. Eden "Online Supershopper"
Reviews.Content: For the Price I never expected them to be such high quality! They are very convincing and look even realer than my real cameras!

Reviews.Title: A cheap deterent
Reviews.Author: Stephen E. Mcgowan "Hammer"
Reviews.Content: These things look real even while you hold them.  They mounted in a few minutes and the red led can be seen from a hundred feet away at night.  I have installed 3 of em and cant be more happy with them.  Any idiot thief would just move on to the next house.

Reviews.Title: Looks real from a distance
Reviews.Author: annalee
Reviews.Content: It looks real enough that a neighbor asked about getting recordings on it. Close up it's pretty obviously a fake but not sure if anyone would get close enough to really check.  Also, if mounted high enough, it looks even more authentic.

Reviews.Title: helps
Reviews.Author: cfast
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these to place on my property. They look very real but are cheaply built. If you can avoid putting them in an area that catches alot of wind you shouldnt have any trouble.

Reviews.Title: wtf
Reviews.Author: Joseph Uriegas
Reviews.Content: these are amazing i love them they look so real cant tell at all has a wire going thru it and everything i love them the price is so unbliveable to i am gunna even buy more they are worth it

Reviews.Title: Fast deliver
Reviews.Author: Nisha
Reviews.Content: They look so  real and price was mind blowing real haven't mounted them yet so we don't know how well they work for trespassers yet but when I do I will update my review. As for delivery they arrived days prior to their scheduled delivery date.

Reviews.Title: Looks very convincing
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Placed this in my alley to deter vandalism.  Works great so far.  The camera looks identical to an IR security camera.

Reviews.Title: its works
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: its works looks realand after i put this onmy worries gone.just i need to replace batters after 6months of use

Reviews.Title: Great Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: Best14you
Reviews.Content: I bought mine about a year ago. It has done great. Neighbors definitely know you have a camera. LOL It is just as intimidating without the blinking red light (when the batteries go dead). The camera was knocked off my garage wall by someone up to no good last night. I'm buying some more today.

Reviews.Title: the fake/dummy security looks just like a real one
Reviews.Author: Junjun Liu "tomthecat"
Reviews.Content: the fake/dummy security looks just like a real one.  The LED light flashes.  It tracks people's attention and make people think it is recording.

Reviews.Title: Look like the real thing
Reviews.Author: LaRaine B
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 one for front of house and one for the back. Friends thinks they are real.. Blink light gives the impression that they are working. Great product

Reviews.Title: What I ordered.
Reviews.Author: Cognizant
Reviews.Content: They look real!  I wish they were a bit smaller in physical dimensions and they are made of plastic so I suspect the mounting will break before too long but at this price its perfect.

Reviews.Title: Cool Product
Reviews.Author: Frank Dickens
Reviews.Content: Arrived as represented.  Mounted easily and they look real.  I'm sure they are not a total defense of my home but they add an extra layer.  Good price and a little extra comfort.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Anita Griffin
Reviews.Content: Outstanding value and Excellent Quality...This product conforms to standards and it is a product of integrity with durability to sustain performance.

Reviews.Title: Save yourself some money!
Reviews.Author: C & J
Reviews.Content: We bought these to install on a rental house we'd just bought for a friend to live in.  The house is in a rural area, had been abandoned for two years, and had had numerous salvagers and "tourists."  When we put these up and our friend moved in, neighbors started stopping by to say hello.  They saw the "cameras" blinking away and got a little nervous.  Word must've gotten around--no more trespassers and thieves.  One old boy who comes over a lot still thinks they're real and wonders why they're still up.  Because they work, our friend replied.  Enough said.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Joanne M. Pinette
Reviews.Content: Work very well and look like the real thing - have ordered similar products before and have been really pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Scott Meyers
Reviews.Content: Looks pretty realistic and for such a cheap price I am happy with it.  If you just want it to fool the bad guys it should do the job.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Graybear "Graybear"
Reviews.Content: Fairly easy to install.  Looks pretty real.  I've had a couple of people comment that they were on tv.  I didn't tell them differently.  Only problem, battery doesn't last long.  Took it out.  Looks good enough without flashing red light.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Jeff Oppido
Reviews.Content: The red blinking light is a BIT too bright.. which sounds strange but it lights up the whole inside behind the "lens".  If it were less bright, or was blocked so it wouldnt shine inside the "lens" then itd be great.The base is a bit cheap looking and the wire coming out of the back is also pretty cheap - otherwise it seems to do the trick.  Lets see if it helps my car from being broken into anymore..

Reviews.Title: Here's looking at you kid.
Reviews.Author: Ned Flanders "A left-handed Diddly-Doh! to yo...
Reviews.Content: Very convincing from even a short distance.  I leave off the red light because that makes it obvious.  Someone that is casing out your pad will see it and doesn't need a blinking light.  Even if they know it's fake, it made them look and be aware that you are aware and care about security.  They will go on to a more naive target.

Reviews.Title: Good fake!
Reviews.Author: Joseph W.
Reviews.Content: Needed to add another camera (a fake, and this is the second one) on my house - primarily as a deterrent. It looks quite similar to the real thing so I put it up. The blinking red LED seems like the camera is working.The only 'disadvantage' I found so far is getting out the ladder to replace the battery for the LED (after about six months) and that is quite acceptable to me. I just wish it could be once every five years.I certainly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a fake device.

Reviews.Title: Look real.
Reviews.Author: David Taylor
Reviews.Content: These cameras look real and can defintely protect your property for a low price.  Easy to install . Long battery life.

Reviews.Title: Look real
Reviews.Author: Diego Badiola
Reviews.Content: I purchased these for my beach house to scare thieves away. It has a blinking light and you would have to be a professional to know these are not real. Good purchase

Reviews.Title: Batteries don't last long.
Reviews.Author: Ascend Federal Credit Union
Reviews.Content: It looks good, but batteries don't last long enough and it's hard to get to to replace them.  Good bye.

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal and so realistic
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: Amazing deal. Looks real. The flashing red is a little crazy and wish it was a little slower. Really good bargain.

Reviews.Title: Looks and acta real.
Reviews.Author: Anthony R. Taylor-Weber
Reviews.Content: I've already had our nanny and postman ask about the new "system". What they don't know won't kill them. We have it outside our front door pointed down the walkway. If anyone looks up and sees it, I have a feeling they get out the ladder with the face in front of it to inspect it and see if it's real.Good stuff, and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Awesome decoys for the price - won't pass close inspection.
Reviews.Author: Longo05
Reviews.Content: These decoys are cheap and look the part as long as someone doesn't stand right under it, or knows what they're looking at. That being said, I purchased these cameras after a car was stolen down the street as a small deterrence. I hung them under my awnings. From the street, they look the part, and you can't beat the price. I'd recommend this product. I've read a lot of reviews that say to skip the batteries - I'd skip the sticker too.Also, I hung mine upside down to hide the wire and the underneath part of the molded plastic arm. It works better for my house.

Reviews.Title: Very realistic, will buy more.
Reviews.Author: Justin F.
Reviews.Content: Great price, description doesn't do this justice as people have come into the house and picked it up (before installation) and asked if it was real. Looks very real and has flashing red LED, 2 AA batteries not included.

Reviews.Title: Does the job, lasts a while, easy to assemble
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had this for a quite some time now and the battery is still kicking. No need to get my latter out to change up anything. Very happy with this buy

Reviews.Title: Great value and quality for the low, low price!
Reviews.Author: Kai Tiura "tiura"
Reviews.Content: This thing is as real as it gets. After a few items disappearing from my front porch after being dropped off by UPS and FedEx, I decided I'd try a dummy security cam and this one was cheap, cheap, cheap! I thought it may also be made cheaply, but it was so affordable I figured I'd give it a shot. So glad I did!It looks totally real. It has a "wire" that goes through the base and appears to go into the wall, and the light that blinks all the time gives it a distinct look of authenticity. I'm fairly sure it will sit its purpose nicely, and given the low price, I think it's an exceptional value!

Reviews.Title: Realistic and worth the money
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Ordered these in a 3-pack January 2013 and they are still working wonderfully a year later. Have one on the front porch aimed at the walkway which covers the porch and front window, one is pointed at our vehicle in the driveway and the other is on the back porch aimed at the patio door. As far as I know they're doing as intended because we've had no issues in our very active neighborhood where property crimes have risen. Glad I have them...they've given me some peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: dummy camera
Reviews.Author: MARTHA H GAMBOA
Reviews.Content: just be aware that this is a plastic camera,I thought it was metal ,but should still do the job that I am after,I read feedbacks and I went by that ,

Reviews.Title: LED light
