Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Great decoy but battery's will only last 30 says....no big deal because I do all rechargeable batteries (system) I bought on Amazon : )

Reviews.Title: Good for $7
Reviews.Author: Scott Harris
Reviews.Content: Looks good enough for the $7 price but wont fool anyone who takes a minute to look at it closely

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Shaunspad
Reviews.Content: Looks very much like the real thing, it's the right price, it's super light and easy to install and I hope it works.

Reviews.Title: stopped working
Reviews.Author: Book Lover "Book Lover"
Reviews.Content: Did not last long - light stopped flashing even with new batteries. Was cheap but I expected it to work longer than a couple of years

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Abraham Chaparro
Reviews.Content: Arrived really quickly loved it. Came in new unopend box and  stickers and everything. really satisfied. It comes with a plastic cord to make it looked like its wired into the wall.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Arielvapes
Reviews.Content: Great, looks like the real thing when placed atop the garage door with its antenna sticking up. Great deterrent !

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Valley of The Sun "SUNSHINE"
Reviews.Content: I expected this camera to a look better. Until i'm able to paint  it, I have it on the shelf in my garage. I fell it looks to cheep to use as is.

Reviews.Title: This Dummy Camera Looks Real !
Reviews.Author: PrettyPicky
Reviews.Content: I have a security issue with my X wife so I had to buy a real security camera set with 4 cameras that run 24/7. I ran into a little problem with a couple of areas that needed cameras but I had already bought the real system so I ordered a few of these dummy cameras.When they arrived I was pretty surprised that they look so real and they are made well also. The unit has a blinking light that you can see in the day time but at night it is really bright and for sure to catch the bad guys attention. I can say with both real and the dummy cameras, it has solved my problems with my X destroying stuff around my home.I recommend that anyone having problems or not get a few of these and especially if your parents are getting up there in years because if the bad guys see this they will find another house that does not have cameras. Also, Amazon has alarm stickers and even stick in signs advertising you have a security system. At least get you enough stickers to put on every window or any place a bad guy might try to get it. The stickers here on Amazon come in packs with several stickers in them and are very cheap so just count your windows and put them on to make sure you are protected.

Reviews.Title: Looks Realistic
Reviews.Author: Reedarama
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these for our off grid cabin.  Looks realistic and easy to mount.  I will probably buy another for the other side.

Reviews.Title: Looks genuine but drains batteries quickly.
Reviews.Author: DB in CV "Chem Dude"
Reviews.Content: This product certainly looks 'real', but I'm unimpressed with the electronics within.  I'm not sure why this device would draw so much current as to drain batteries in just a few weeks.  A lone intermittent LED should last months on a couple of AA cells.  Something's amiss with this product. Quite frankly, I wouldn't recommend this, based on this factor.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool and looks real
Reviews.Author: Rudy
Reviews.Content: I think this is a pretty cool camera for it's price. I mean if you really go up to it and inspect this thing, you might be able to tell it's not real. I would def. suggest this to friends that are looking for a fake security camera.

Reviews.Title: Dummy camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald F. Curlewis
Reviews.Content: Looks realistic and is just as effective as a real one! A friend has his house surrounded by real cameras, had a break-in and gave the videos to the police and that was the last he heard from them.

Reviews.Title: Excellent in every way
Reviews.Author: David Brown "TheyCallMeDave"
Reviews.Content: VERY realistic looking.  Blinks very bright when its dark and from a long way off.  Battery lasts a long time.  Good sturdy product.

Reviews.Title: Big and Real-Looking!
Reviews.Author: Otis Lift
Reviews.Content: This is one of the most realistic looking dummy cameras I've seen. I wouldn't even bother loading batteries, it just makes a single red light blink periodically. I think the red blinking light actually works against the deterrent abilities of this unit.  One last thing....mount it where people can immediately see it!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: russell walker
Reviews.Content: Hard to make the cord look like it goes into a wall. The lights on the inside are obviously fake to other people

Reviews.Title: GREAT DUMMY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: Just dont mess with other brand, buy form the best, its very nice quality, is the best ! ill definitly buy again, thanks amazon for another great buy ; ill recomend it for anyone who likes and who want the best

Reviews.Title: pretty cool fake
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: it's cheap and affordable and it looks real......would recommend to anyone, also it has a red light to make it look real.....

Reviews.Title: Looks real easy to install Priced right for a decoy.
Reviews.Author: komputernerd
Reviews.Content: Looks real easy to install and is priced right enough for a decoy. Used as a decoy when hiding another real camera.

Reviews.Title: OUTDOOR FAKE DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: DONNA PHILIP
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed by the outlook.......it looks real when set up so real that people won't know the difference.

Reviews.Title: Try it
Reviews.Author: Jummama
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy.Looks good. It is a great value for the money and I got instant results of avoidance by potential violators

Reviews.Title: Great  Fake Security Camera's
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: I needed a something to deter folks from illegal dumping on  a pieceof property.  When I opened the box I was surprised at how real they look.  They look even better mounted high up on a wall in a dark area with the red blinking light.  Time will  tell if they work but while I was installing  them a neighbor commented how great it was that I was putting up security camera's..............I guess I wasn't the only one who thought they looked real.

Reviews.Title: Won't fool a real thief... but still good
Reviews.Author: M. Dvorak
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and will probably scare some of the juvenile hoodlums away. Upon closer inspection, it doesn't look real. All of the real CCTVs that I have been looking at for the past two weeks have two wires (power and signal). This only has one wire. Also, the red blinking light is silly, so don't bother putting batteries in it. Overall, for the price, not a bad investment.

Reviews.Title: No one knows the difference
Reviews.Author: WaRMaCHiNE
Reviews.Content: I bought several of these to go along with the two real ones I have and unless you are a foot away from it you cannot tell the difference between a real one and a fake one. Would you take a chance on being recorded just to see if it is? Only a professional thief/burglar might know if it is. It also has a blinking light for night time. For $7 its good security and peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Well. . . 2 out of 3 were okay
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Like many have said, they are cheaply made plastic fakes. But they look enough like the real thing. I ordered 3 of them.I installed two with no problem, even though there is absolutely no directions. However, after I installed the mount for the 3rd one and opened the battery case to install the batteries --SURPRISE! Couldn't be done.It takes two AA's, and the springs for the negative terminals were on both ends (positive and negative) for one battery, and the other battery slot had no springs. Now you may say, "well just move the spring over, silly". Can't be done. It was riveted on the terminal end. Sending it back and I'm going to chance ordering another one. Wish me luck.

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to
Reviews.Author: R. Klein
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these after someone ran a key along the side of my new car.It was relatively easy to install, and it looks authentic.  It requires AA batteries to activate a blinking red light on the front of the unit.  This is where I feel it lost one star.I think, like most people, I installed this above eye level, so that it looks downward at the car, which required the use of a ladder to do the installation.  The battery compartment is on the top of the unit, under a sliding hood.  So, once the batteries need replacement, you have to get above the camera to install them.  Given that the unit doesn't actually contain anything other than the battery compartment, a better design would have been to have the battery compartment accessible from below.Other than that, I could aim it where I wanted, it sits, it blinks, it looks real, it looks active.  So it does what I was hoping.

Reviews.Title: Fake is great!
Reviews.Author: soothesayer "soothesayer"
Reviews.Content: Say cheese!  That's what we think about these clever fake cameras.  I know some commented about the red blinking light, but most thieves don't take the time to question that particular option.  Besides, they don't have the guts to check.  These units are doing a great job, and we made sure they were placed openly for everyone to see.  We also purchased a 'real' camera--just in case, but we have had some local thieves lately in the neighborhood and they have yet to even attempt to cross our 'borders'.  We are very happy with these cameras!

Reviews.Title: get them they look just like the real thing
Reviews.Author: jody
Reviews.Content: They look real love them...got them just in case I hope that all can see them so my properties are safe

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: MOZZI
Reviews.Content: I live in a sketchy apartment complex, and i though it would be a good idea.  I like it so far.  Great plastic unit for the price.  and it looks real.

Reviews.Title: Great idea, poor quality
Reviews.Author: Jennifer "Jen Talk"
Reviews.Content: I think the concept is wonderful.  However, the product is cheap.  In the installation process, it easily broke with little pressure.  Also, the battery life is not very long, so the batteries have to be changed perhaps once a month.  This is tricky with the poor quality of the product.  I wish they had been sturdier, because I love the idea.

Reviews.Title: Cameras get the Job Done...
Reviews.Author: Tall Timbers "wbajm"
Reviews.Content: Along with several signs along my long driveway warning folks that they're being monitored and shouldn't be trespassing, I have two of these mounted high up on the front of the house.  They look like any other real camera and a blinking red light makes them look authentic.  I only gave four stars because movement for aiming the things after they're mounted is quite limited, so you should take great care before drilling holes in your building to make sure they'll point where you want them too.  Mine are mounted upside down.  It would be nice if the weather/shade cover could be slid around the surface of the cylindrical camera, but it only has one position.  For the price, they're good enough and would fool me...

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: AngeLeya
Reviews.Content: Exactly as described. The little blinking light and dummy wire make this look like the real thing without the cost and hassle of installing a security system.

Reviews.Title: Life like great add on.
Reviews.Author: ZigWorm
Reviews.Content: This is a cheap and easy way to add visibility to any security system. It has expanded the "you are being watched" big brother aspect of my system. Now if it could keep the neighbors from peeing in my yard all would be good.

Reviews.Title: inexpensive but may do the job!
Reviews.Author: quality matters
Reviews.Content: lightweight & plastic... wire on several didn't feed into mount; mount hole was not big enough-- remains to be seen if really effective--  looks ok from a distance!

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake , Dummy Security Camera with Blinking Light (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Espana
Reviews.Content: This item is worth so much more than asking price.  Easy to install (3 screws and 2 AA batteries that's it) and very realistic looking. The flashing red light adds to authenticity.  This products can give you peace of mind. The seller shipped it well in advance of the estimated delivery date and I couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made but does the job
Reviews.Author: Grace Davies
Reviews.Content: There's no on/off switch on this; it just turns on when you put in the batteries (which are under the top cover).  The top piece slides on loosely and within a week the wind took it away.  That isn't a problem in my situation since I mounted it high enough that potential intruders can't see the top; it still looks like a real camera.

Reviews.Title: They work but remember the battery life is not as long as you think
Reviews.Author: Micheal Russell
Reviews.Content: They really work but do take batteries they last about a month may be a little longer but not much

Reviews.Title: Stop Thief.
Reviews.Author: Jaqui Robbins
Reviews.Content: Don't know if they deter theft or not, but its intimidating to me.. Looks like the original working camera.. Love these.

Reviews.Title: Real as you can get
Reviews.Author: Ken and Barbie
Reviews.Content: They look real as can be.  I would never know the difference between the expensive real models. Recommend you buy.

Reviews.Title: Theft deterant
Reviews.Author: dave2k2
Reviews.Content: They look authentic. I see cameras daily at different job locations.  The batteries last forever for the red blinking light. They have weathered well on my house.

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: Lauren A. Suarez "La La Lauren"
Reviews.Content: It looks real.. Except for the red light.  The red light was a bit dramatic - so we took the batteries out and it look a lot more authentic that way.

Reviews.Title: awesome and cheap!
Reviews.Author: K. Whisenhunt
Reviews.Content: This is great. I purchased it to put on the front of the house to deter car theft which is fairly common in our neighborhood. It was super easy to set up, and looks incredibly real, especially once you're a few feet away. The red light is nice because it catches peoples eye and I like that it has the black fake cord coming out of it.I was initially unsure of what to do with the cord - it wouldn't just stay pressed against the wall and it would look ridiculous hanging down but I decided to super glue it "into" the house so it looks like a power cord going into the wall. Looks really realistic and people ask about it all the time

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Abdul Shaheed
Reviews.Content: Chose this rating because the product is excellent it looks and feel real I would recommend it to friends.thank you

Reviews.Title: Awesome fake camera that keep on ticking..
Reviews.Author: K Lee
Reviews.Content: Installed in few months ago with alkaline battery and it's still working strong even in chilly weather. The red blinking definitely commands attention.  The only think you should do if you place it outside in the elements is tape the battery cover/door since the sliding shade on top will NOT seal the battery compartment.  It will get wet and corrode the contacts.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: Daniel WJ Frawley
Reviews.Content: Put these up on my house when we were having issues with the neighbors foreclosure and never had any issues.  Even the other neighbors thought they were real... you can put batteries in them and the light blinks but since real ones don't do that I just hung them with no batteries.  Plus I don't want to change the batteries every so often, hard enough to do the smoke alarm batteries.  Can't beat 6 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Does the job for me!
Reviews.Author: kh
Reviews.Content: This camera is okay for a dummy, but if you purchase it I would suggest mounting it up higher so someone can't look at it too closely and discover it is fake.

Reviews.Title: Thinking of getting another one
Reviews.Author: Ron V "ron_v"
Reviews.Content: The camera looks pretty authentic. Out "Cable" is slightly short.Mounting was easy. Single battery lasts for a very long time.I am very satisfied with it and considering getting another one.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Tomasi "Thomasi"
Reviews.Content: This camera looks very real. A friend of mine owns a video surveillance company thought it was real.  It will deter a burglar.The only reason I gave it a three star review instead of a five Star review is I wish the batteries lasted longer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: Huy Q. Truong
Reviews.Content: Excellent purchase! I can't distinguish it with the real camera, that means it does the job, and at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Should help
Reviews.Author: Marc K "An old rocker"
Reviews.Content: Looks pretty cheap close up, but from a distance it probably will deter most random nuisances from vandalizing or burgling your home.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: Phillip L. Salamacha
Reviews.Content: This thing has fooled everyone who has gone on my porch.  I bought it after someone broke into my house, I also bought a motion light which really helps.  The combo of the two and nobody has messed with my house since.

Reviews.Title: Fake security camera
Reviews.Author: James M. Wright "jimboboo"
Reviews.Content: It looks real and that's the important thing.  Great value as well! I added a longer cable to make it more realistic and now it truly looks like the real thing.

Reviews.Title: ANYTHING TO DETER THE DISHONEST AROUND US!
Reviews.Author: Jules "Jules"
Reviews.Content: Installed these at our vacation property. Just another device to keep honest folks honest. Realistic looking enough. Easy install. Change batteries as needed and you're good to go!Jules in MN

Reviews.Title: Watchin' You!
Reviews.Author: Sgt Mo
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing and doesn't cost that much. This camera even has a fake wire attached so it looks like it really looks like it's hooked up. Flashing red light is a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: Very nice deterrent
Reviews.Author: Steven McGuire
Reviews.Content: These are nice cameras, well they look like cameras.  They even come with a plastic cable to add to the realism.  None of my friends could tell they were not real.  The LED blinks and the lens looks very real.  I consider these a very nice deterrent.  I expect battery life to be very long.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: JoeS
Reviews.Content: It looks good but after 2 weeks the battery died and the flashing light stopped.  I didn't replace the battery because it drains it too fast.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing.
Reviews.Author: Keninca
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing.  Put it in an obvious (protected) place to make sure people can see it before they think of doing something they shouldn't.

Reviews.Title: Fools you from a distance, beware the short wire
Reviews.Author: kayoss
Reviews.Content: Beware the wire they give you to make this look real is TINY. I just tucked it into my siding near the corner of the house to make it look like the wire was going inside. As long as you don't put batteries in it, it looks fairly real from 5ft away or more. Any closer, and you can tell it is cheapo plastic.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: J. WIDMANN "nuts about boston"
Reviews.Content: Nice, good price for the quality.  Too bad it doesn't have a rotating swivel base so you could point it in more directions.

Reviews.Title: a little cheap but from far away looks real.  what do you want for the price?
Reviews.Author: Rozalija Buntic "soccermom"
Reviews.Content: a little cheap but from far away looks real.  what do you want for the price? pretty good product.  like

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera déterrant
Reviews.Author: PHILLIP J MCDONALD
Reviews.Content: Makes an intruder think twice.Looks like the real deal.Works really well.Great at night with the flashing red light.

Reviews.Title: Limited mounting options.
Reviews.Author: Roy Heron
Reviews.Content: Looks great and works great.  The only problem is that the design of the base limits the mounting options. done

Reviews.Title: Homeowners esssential..great theft deterrent,
Reviews.Author: JEFF1
Reviews.Content: Excellent Theft deterrent.. It looks so real.. I have the safest looking home in the neighborhood..I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Look real
Reviews.Author: Rick Feightner
Reviews.Content: Looks real, just what I needed as a deterrent. The recommendation from a friend of mine who owns a security company was to get some fake cameras and put them up.  He says anyone interested in vandalism will see them and usually go elsewhere.  I installed 4 cameras around our church. They look real. Mounted about 7-8 feet high non of the regular attenders have even noticed them except for the few I mentioned them to and they don't know if they are real or not.  I did leave out the batteries. I think the blinking light is a giveaway as most security cameras don't have blinking lights.

Reviews.Title: Front and back of house cameras
Reviews.Author: patricia baker
Reviews.Content: Love these cameras because they look so real making me feel very secure.  I didn't even bother with the batteries for the blinking light because I feel the camera is enough

Reviews.Title: im watchin ya, or am i?
Reviews.Author: hallie
Reviews.Content: excellent camera that really fools everyone, I have two of these and they work great at keeping people from loitering

Reviews.Title: Great Fake Camera.  Recommend to all.
Reviews.Author: Veltiana
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like the real thing, lights blink and it even looks like is connected.  The price was perfect for the item.  Recommend to ALL!!!Veltiana

Reviews.Title: Pure Junk
Reviews.Author: Miss Fizzy Pants
Reviews.Content: Product arrived broken. I bought 2 of them and they both arrived broken. Not worth the low price I paid. Even dollar store prices would have been too high.

Reviews.Title: Dummy cameras look very real
Reviews.Author: Major
Reviews.Content: Very realistic looking; daughter saw it and had me order one for her; another friend had me order four for her

Reviews.Title: Very Realistic
Reviews.Author: Patricia R. Dumond "pat_of_northern_california"
Reviews.Content: Wow, really looks real!  I put one of these up by our front door.  With the flashing red light, it does look intimidating.  The battery lasted for about 2 months when left on full-time.  Kind of a hassle having to climb up to replace the battery, but worth it for the feeling of being a little more "secure" from break-ins.

Reviews.Title: Legitimate looking camera
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing, and gives me peace of mind, while away. Thefts are up in the neighborhood, and no one likes the idea that they're possibly on camera. I got tired of strange vehicles stopping in front of my home, possibly looking for something to steal, so now they have something they can look at, this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good substitute for the real one
Reviews.Author: Tom H. Riggins
Reviews.Content: Mounts easily--looks real enough to deter crooks--batteries still have power after several weeks ! Cable gives more authenticity to the unit...

Reviews.Title: Great camera - buy it!
Reviews.Author: M. Lyons
Reviews.Content: So, the quality of the actual camera is great.  The only problem is that the screws they send with it are complete garbage, so if you are using a automatic drill/ driver, you will snap the heads off.  Have to do the last tightening with a hand tool.  But the camera looks scary as hell and blinks great!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: J J
Reviews.Content: It looks real enough to me and to others as well. Does serve its function well enough to be useful.

Reviews.Title: Good product and price
Reviews.Author: walstar-usa
Reviews.Content: Really Good Quarlity and price for home and businessI put these on my house wall and then looks secured.Im verry happy with that they has on red blink light even fake!!I will buy more this after I need more.

Reviews.Title: Camera modification
Reviews.Author: Retired Physicist
Reviews.Content: I just installed 2 of these "cameras". They run on 2 AA batteries. Since I have already read some complaints about battery life, I modified one of 2 "cameras" to run on 2 AA batteries AND, in parallel, 2 C batteries. There is plenty of room inside the housing for the 2 C batteries. This should increase operating live by roughly 5X. I am running a side by side test to find out. If the test results are positive, and nothing else goes wrong, I will up grade the rating to 5 stars.Update: With 2 AA batteries the operating lifetime is about 10 weeks, in San Diego. I expect the ones with additional 2 C batteries to last about a year.

Reviews.Title: Looks good till it comes time to set-up
Reviews.Author: moe
Reviews.Content: I gave it two stars, and that's generous. Out the box it looked nice. But this dummy camera has two major issues. First off the blinking light blinks way too far apart. Making it blink every second or so would have made it easier to be noticed by intruders. Second, the head has a very limited swivel movement. Making it hard to mount it the way you want. So your either pointing it at the feet or the sky. Makes no sense to create something that looks real only to screw up on simple parts. I'm back to looking for another dummy camera.

Reviews.Title: Everyone fooled...
Reviews.Author: C. Dean Waterman "MacPastor"
Reviews.Content: We got these, put them up, and EVERYONE is faked out.  We had to keep it a secret, so only a couple people know they aren't real.  We left the batteries out, as real cameras don't blink.  But, they have done their intended job, which was to deter people from a certain area.  Incredible for the money.

Reviews.Title: They don't look fake
Reviews.Author: Dave Watkins
Reviews.Content: I can't tell these from the real product. Everyone thinks they're absolutely real, and now no one is knocking at my front door! I'm very satisfied with these dummy cameras. I will probably purchase more.

Reviews.Title: some people like it some don't
Reviews.Author: fragorock
Reviews.Content: I love these cameras. I live on a busy street with a huge lot next to my house and behind it runs a creek concealed by thick brush. I got three of these installed them around the house. To me, if I was walking by on the street and glanced at these cameras, I would think they are real.  I had one up facing the driveway, which also faces the neighbor who has lots of fruit trees in his front yard. One day he had some fruit stolen from his trees in the front yard and when I got home from work he asked me for the footage from my "security cameras", when I told him they were fake he looked suprised and said,"Thats a good idea, I thought they were real" I guess if your a seasoned thief you'll know what to look for but for my purposes these things work great. the flashing red light hasnt stopped on any of the cameras and there at least 5 months old. We've had lots of rain and fog and they are holding up great. The cameras come with a fake wire attached the back, which give it a even more realistic look. I'm thinking about getting some real cameras to go with the fake ones, we'll see.

Reviews.Title: You definitely notice it walking past the house
Reviews.Author: Skizix272
Reviews.Content: Looks real,  light flashes, easy installation.  Would not install in direct exposure the elements.  I installed under the eave facing the driveway.  You definitely notice it walking past the house.  Good deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Cameras!
Reviews.Author: Saffron
Reviews.Content: They look realistic enough, especially with the light on. We have trouble with people coming into our yard all the time, so I put up 3, and far fewer people bother us now.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: Ben Hur Salle
Reviews.Content: awesome! product received as expected and in good condition. It looked real and was easy enough to install. I realize this will not stop those who really want to break into your house but it acts as a deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Smile you are on camera.....sort of !
Reviews.Author: Colby E. Sanborn
Reviews.Content: Up and running ...as they say, if you mount it out of reach no one will ever know its fake!

Reviews.Title: RED light ON or OFF .
Reviews.Author: Mr C
Reviews.Content: Torn on whether the flashing red light is a good or bad thing. I saw some folks disabled it. I left mine on.

Reviews.Title: Really Nice
Reviews.Author: Ronald Nicholas PhD
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and looks like a real camera. I have wanted some video cameras mounted around the house and these five cameras meet the need for the moment. .

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: George Simonich
Reviews.Content: My wife runs a day care, and thought this would keep the house safer. for the price I didnt think it would look real but I am very impressed with how real it looks.

Reviews.Title: Looks real and easy to install
Reviews.Author: AlteredArtist
Reviews.Content: I bought two and am very happy with them. I may buy a few more for the back of the condo. Gives me piece of mind when I leave town.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is...there needs to be light in the area for the red blinking light to come on. I placed one of the cameras on my front porch.  I have to keep my porch light on in order for it to light up.  It is not truly "motion censored."

Reviews.Title: security camera
Reviews.Author: Russell Langhorst
Reviews.Content: I put one of these cameras in the front of my house and one in the back. Two AA batteries make a red LED light blink. The blinking light can be seen in daytime and is very noticable at night. The camera looks very real and is a good deterent to potential thieves. I am very happy with them and would recommend them to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Fools everyone
Reviews.Author: M. Small
Reviews.Content: I'll get a real system someday but in the meantime this is great.  Really, really looks real.  It has fooled all my friends.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: tfizzle
Reviews.Content: they were on time, look great and do the job just fine! I would buy this product over and over again and recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: BEST 8 BUCKS I'VE EVERY SPENT
Reviews.Author: David Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I GAVE IT A 4 OUT 5, ONLY BECAUSE THE CAMERA IS A BIT BULKY. ALL MY FAMILY AND FRIEND THOUGHT THAT I HAD GOTTEN A REAL SECURITY SYSTEM.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: trevor peninger
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with the outdoor fake, dummy security cameras with blinking lights.  They were easy to install.  The cameras met our expectation.s

Reviews.Title: Good item
Reviews.Author: George H. Fair
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and gives the impression of a  professional camera. I do not know the life of he batteries although the can bereplaced if mounted correctly.

Reviews.Title: Looks real to me
Reviews.Author: Pam Billings
Reviews.Content: I've checked out real security cameras at stores and with my untrained eye(which most people have) looks real to me!It raises a degree of doubt and for most crooks that's all you need.We are satisfied and do not make it your only defense. The GE door and window alarm set for less than $20.00 is nice to go with this.

Reviews.Title: PROFESSIONAL LOOKING ITEMS AT A GOOD PRICE
Reviews.Author: Charles Hayes
Reviews.Content: We were surprised  how quickly the items arrived.  They were better than we anticipated.  The value was great and we ar going to recommend them to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great! Looks real!
Reviews.Author: Bec - CPA
Reviews.Content: This camera looks real, with the blinking light. We are pleased to use it with our entire system! Transaction was smooth! Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Looks very realistic!
Reviews.Author: oldie62
Reviews.Content: Although only plastic, when the camera is installed, from a distance at ground level it looks very realistic.  I extended the fake wiring cord and tried it make it lookeven more realistic where it appeared to enter the house.  I think that added even more realism.  I bought two, then two more, and finally two more.  The flashing red camera lights contribute a lot to the overall effect. Just take the time to aim the cameras as you would a real system.  Hopefully for less than $50 bucks any potential burglar will see the cameras and move on to another house.  For anyone who asks, I just tell them they came from Sam's club and I don't invite them to view the "monitor station".  The yellow "CCTV" sign that comes with it is POOR.  It stuck on the window less than 24 hrs before it started to roll up on the ends.  I ended up putting on the inside of the window with scotch tape.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done . .at a great price
Reviews.Author: Captain Drew "Captain-FedEx & USNR-Retired"
Reviews.Content: These are cheap 'deterrence' !! They "LOOK" real, but do not require all the hard work of 'wiring' up. .and the extreme expense and upkeep of the real thing. The neighborhood of one of our rentals had been seeing an increase of vandalism and theft from cars on the street. Can't directly attribute it to having these installed, but, there has been no such activity since they have been up. The blinking red light is quite 'effective', especially at night. Fingers crossed

Reviews.Title: Looks real to me.. just hope it can fool the theft too!!
Reviews.Author: YIU BUN WONG
Reviews.Content: The dummy security camera looks real from a distance.  Just hope it can fool the burglar not to come  to my house!!

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: M. Schwaller
Reviews.Content: These look pretty real, and I've had people come over thinking they were.  Of course you just nod and tell them yeah they work really good.  The led feature is nice and the batteries last long.  It would be nice if there were some other features maybe a stable led that blinked if something moved, however for the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Good housing.
Reviews.Author: Casey Hearn
Reviews.Content: it's a fake camera.  Looks real and has a blinky light.I didn't really want a light blinking, but...Performs as expected :)

Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool!
Reviews.Author: Ray P. Fleitas
Reviews.Content: I like them! just have not installed them yet. My only concern now is: Would a trespasser/thief think I have very valuable things in our vacation house because of these? They look pretty real!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Mack
Reviews.Content: worked and looked as advertised.  Battery life is not as long as I hoped.  So don't put it to high up.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: Ronald Sherman
Reviews.Content: Security cameras are cheaply made. Unable to position them as I would like. There are better ones in the market.

Reviews.Title: not bad but big
Reviews.Author: Christopher P
Reviews.Content: Nice product and exactly as described.  The quality of this product is high and exactly as show in the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I think they're working.  Bought a couple for home and several more for our Condo clubhouse.  I highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake , Dummy Security Camera with Blinking Light
Reviews.Author: Amazon User
Reviews.Content: They mount, how shown, and that's about it. For me, that aspect limited their use. However, for the price, was workable.As well, the battery maintenance for the light, --would be problematic, --I see many "real" cameras w/o lights, so think that through. In a year, you may not feel up to taking them out, and out have to if leaking, etc.I think these make good *supplemental cameras with other real ones for a limited system.The decal is a bit fake looking, "CCTV..."--I cut out the camera part only, and used it. I feel if someone is looking, they're "looking", and this would do. I know I would not "advertise" my type of system and would not use a branded warning sticker, so that worked, as I explain.They are what they are, as advertised. So, if usable as-is, for this price, for supplemental cameras with other working ones, they are "OK".As prices go down on this stuff, just buying another real camera and mounting it not activated will just occur. I mention that since considered it with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very realistic dummy security camera really looks intimidating.
Reviews.Author: Neal Geiger
Reviews.Content: Mounted on my back porch, this blinking camera faces our rear entrance through the patio. It looks realistic and intimidating... which is the point. The small blinking red LED appears as if it is recording and constantly monitoring. Bad guys should be quite fooled as all my neighbors are :-) -- It comes with a window sticker alerting possible intruders to the presence of the camera - but the graphics are  amateur and I felt like it detracted from the impact of this cool trickster so I did not place the sticker on the glass.

Reviews.Title: Looks good in my garage
Reviews.Author: J. Lee Stanley "Lee"
Reviews.Content: I put this in my garage.  Have to change batteries pretty often, but other than that, it looks real and the red light is very obvious at night.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake , Dummy Security Camera with Blinking Light (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: Looks a bit cheap, which denies that idea of fooling possible intruders. The LED works, but no screws are included to mount the unit with, so plan on find the right ones to fit. I would not buy another one due to its lack of credibility in appearance.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Gminaya
Reviews.Content: Looks So Real! The battery long enough for me.You can adjust the direction that u want.Just what a I looking for.

Reviews.Title: It looks like the real thing.
Reviews.Author: Sharon Leigh Anderson
Reviews.Content: This camera will fool everyone as it looks like a REAL security camera. A little hard to mount. Would like a different mounting material. Seller was prompt.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Megan Smith
Reviews.Content: These were as expected and shipped fast (prime).  We had bought several of these last year from a different vendor and these were the same.  Works as described.

Reviews.Title: These dummy cameras look real.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Alan Dale
Reviews.Content: These cameras look quite real. I set up 4 on my property. You can't tell these from the real ones.

Reviews.Title: Just for fun
Reviews.Author: Julie A. Ampoloquio
Reviews.Content: I like it as it looks like a real one and I share this product to my friends.Julie Ampoloquio

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: A.C. Berry, Jr.
Reviews.Content: This camera provides a lot of peace of mind for very little cost. It was very easy to install as well.

Reviews.Title: haha
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: Looks great easy to install. This ought to fool them.... fooled my friends ha ha ha. I woukd buy again.

Reviews.Title: Impress with purchase
Reviews.Author: Theresa
Reviews.Content: I just rec'd my security cameras and is very impress that they looked real, I would have never thought that purchasing a generic system would also deter criminals or bad behavior.. easy installation.

Reviews.Title: not what we expected
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Mccallon
Reviews.Content: works ok but the red light stays on all the time not like the small round one. will go thru batteries quite often

Reviews.Title: Serves the purpose cheap
Reviews.Author: Deb E.
Reviews.Content: I have it on a shed so it is very visible from the road entry. The real camera is more hidden. Stray people are gone. I wish stray animals knew what it was.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Challenger R/T
Reviews.Content: Looks real and a great deterrent .I put These at my cottage and everyone thinks they're real , that's the whole idea.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real!
Reviews.Author: PJ
Reviews.Content: Obviously, if you  hold it in your hand, it will look and feel fake.  However, once mounted onto a wall, it totally looks real!  I love it.

Reviews.Title: It Works well and looks good
Reviews.Author: a.l.
Reviews.Content: It looks good and works well. It's been blinking strongly for over two months with an off brand batteries, so thats good. Looks real enough.

Reviews.Title: It certainly should fool most people.
Reviews.Author: William Moore "Music Taste Tester"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product. It should fool anyone. I understand that it is basically a full scale unit without the electronics.

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: KW
Reviews.Content: I have neighbors who keep helping themselves to my grapevines along my property so I set-up this camera, with it's realistic red blinking light, and cuttings are no longer missing. Very realistic.

Reviews.Title: broken right out of the package
Reviews.Author: Mr.Harry
Reviews.Content: I had to glue it back together right out of the package. If it had been an actual camera, I would have sent it back.

Reviews.Title: Will fool someone as long as it it is on your roof not up close L.O.L
Reviews.Author: annette dyrland
Reviews.Content: Would work but, keep far away like on your roof . If they get a good look up close they will know it is a toy..

Reviews.Title: Great security camera
Reviews.Author: Storyteller
Reviews.Content: Allthough only time will tell how well this device works, it sure looks impressive and people have told me that they smiled to the camera before knocking on my door. I bought six of them to cover my property and it just looks right and real. Good idea!

Reviews.Title: Looks real.
Reviews.Author: Kenny
Reviews.Content: Really nice looking and easy to install. They are very light and cheaply made, but for the price they will serve the purpose well.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: These camera's are great they look like the real thing with the blinking lights! I would recommend these to anyone who isn't ready to install a security system just yet.

Reviews.Title: A light to be comfortable with..
Reviews.Author: Gaspare di Campobello "Venetian adventure hound"
Reviews.Content: Here is a'warning' to any one who may conssider to intrude.. it positions irself as though you are being televised.. you make the giess.. and stay away if one has thoughts of intrusion.

Reviews.Title: Nice Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Southland Fire Protection
Reviews.Content: Has a red blinking light, and very easy to install. Looks pretty realistic, and for the money, you can't go wrong. Will be buying a couple more in the future. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: I received it on time
Reviews.Author: Pat Bizzell
Reviews.Content: I like it, looks very good , easy to install I am happy with it, glad I ordered  it,, received on time

Reviews.Title: Good value and quality
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: The cameras look more realistic then others I have seen. If I were a burglar and I saw these cameras pointing at me and blinking I wouldn't want to stick around to determine if it is a real or fake camera. Just keep them out of reach of potential thieves. Of course cameras real or not will not deter all burglars. For the price this is a good fake camera. Some day I'll spend the extra money and buy a real camera system.

Reviews.Title: Nice supplement to our REAL cameras.
Reviews.Author: sandie
Reviews.Content: If a person can't afford the real deal these cameras with a sign on the gate can be a helpful deterrant to burglary. These are pretty realistic looking.

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: Jerry N. Layne
Reviews.Content: They look real and they seem to do the job. Someone moved one that cover the driveway so they must think they work. If the were real we would have their pictures. They did not come down the drive or a real alarm would have went off. Works for me Jerry

Reviews.Title: Cameras
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Love the cameras!!  Especially the red blinking light.  Looks completely realistic.  Highly recommend the cameras.  Will be buying again in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Batteries drain fast - especially in cold weather
Reviews.Author: mikeyin va
Reviews.Content: Although hard to tell from the real deal, the batteries DO NOT last more than 10 days in winter and 16 days in summer.  I am using rechargeables in all 4 of my units, and they are the best you can buy.  I think the problem could be solved by slowing down the LED blink cycle - which is the only drain source.  They don't have to blink every 2 seconds!  8 to 10 second intervals would be just as effective and extend the battery life up to 5 times.  These could be an excellent product if batteries lasted a couple of months, like some of the 'reviews' here (falsely) claim.  If you read more reviews you'll see my complaint repeated many times.  After 9 months of use, and too many trips up and down my ladder, I'm looking for longer lasting replacments.

Reviews.Title: Look Real
Reviews.Author: Casteela
Reviews.Content: I purchased these to put up until I can get an actual wireless system to install..  They look like the real thing.

Reviews.Title: Nice little dummy
Reviews.Author: Nael
Reviews.Content: it is real looking camera. it has a flashing LED once you insert the batteries. it looks real. you can use it where there is no Electicity to power real cameras and to protect real cameras.

Reviews.Title: Buy an ENORMOUS  Supply of Batteries
Reviews.Author: New Mexico 87144
Reviews.Content: I Installed this on the back of my house as there is public access directly behind.  I have no idea if it is a deterrent but I am getting real tired of having to install new batteries every 2-3 weeks.  I have spent more on batteries than the cost of the device.  Other than this drawback, it probably does the job intended.

Reviews.Title: DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: looks real...well worth the money...red blinking light us very bright day or night...came with screws and molley anchors if needed...previusly bought 2 identical and are holding up well in heat and weather...satisfied customer

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Fernando J. Calle
Reviews.Content: It looks like an authentic camera especially with the blinking red light. Very lightweight and easy to install -- very impressive and the the price is amazingly low.

Reviews.Title: Good  deal
Reviews.Author: john bellinghausen
Reviews.Content: very real looking-- easy to install------initially bought  two------ later  bought a  dozen  for  family and  friends-----i will recommend  it  strongly.

Reviews.Title: Don't install too close for visual inspection
Reviews.Author: scott c.
Reviews.Content: If you install close to the ground you immediately can tell it is fake. I installed mine ONI the roof and they actually look real. Forget the battery as no real cameras have blinking lights.

Reviews.Title: Great Decoy

Reviews.Content: This in combination of the stickers next to my actual security system make my house appear extremely secure. I put one in the front high up on the garage and another in the back leading to my back door. Very happy with the product. still blinking after 3 weeks

Reviews.Title: Uses batteries pretty quickly.
Reviews.Author: fishstick
Reviews.Content: Best get you some rechargable batteries for this one. It had a red light that blinks constantly. Needs an on/off switch.

Reviews.Title: It works just fine
Reviews.Author: R. Karlovich "rakarlo"
Reviews.Content: This does exactly what it's designed for. Granted it's made out of cheap plastic, but it blinks and looks like the real thing from a distance.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: CarolinaGirl
Reviews.Content: Whenever people come to my house, they instantly notice it and say something about it!!  It just keeps honest people honest, but it also makes the not so honest people think twice!

Reviews.Title: Battery life
Reviews.Author: Robert Allen
Reviews.Content: Is very poor maybe a month or so. So if you want to spend the time and effort to climb up to the camera and change and the money its not bad.. I would not buy one again.

Reviews.Title: Looks real. Easy to install.
Reviews.Author: Cameron Scott French
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these to put over my front and back door, and at the corner of the garage. There is a blinking red light that is easily seen. After installing them, many neighbors asked when we had our security system installed. This is an inexpensive step up from placing a security sign in your yard.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Bonafide Bella "ShopDropDiva"
Reviews.Content: Look reallllll I placed it out and inside n no one even tries to vandalize property I recommend it highlyyyy

Reviews.Title: About this product:
Reviews.Author: Shirl
Reviews.Content: This product is as described.  Everything about this product has lived up to my expectations so far, both in craftsmanship and durability.

Reviews.Title: Doing the job
Reviews.Author: DTT&TRT
Reviews.Content: Lithium batteries recommended.  Bright red LED is perfect.  I seem to have started a trend in the neighborhood with security cameras going up on several properties.

Reviews.Title: Great dummy camera!
Reviews.Author: Capital One
Reviews.Content: These cameras look like the real thing and that's the point. They will scare off most would be thieves. The blinking light is awesome and the look is very realistic. Easy to install too. There are stickers that come with each camera that you can post on a door or window to warn thieves about CCTV camera.I can sleep easier now that I have installed three of these cameras around my house.

Reviews.Content: The 2 AA battery's last months. For me a month or 2 of always being on, and I use rechargeable battery's.I definitely reccomend this.

Reviews.Title: Fake outdoor security camera
Reviews.Author: I. Smith
Reviews.Content: Looks real from a distance; however, I don't expect this cheap plastic fake to hold up for more than a year or two.  Glad it wasn't expensive and I hope it does deter any would-be criminals.

Reviews.Title: Effective decoy cameras.

Reviews.Title: It's watching you
Reviews.Author: Hey hey

Reviews.Title: Great camera and looks real
Reviews.Author: M. Blanchard

Our home is gray and this silver camera looks good mounted on the siding.This fake camera does the trick and looks real. The blinking red light is great and has been working for the past six months with fresh lithium batteries.

Reviews.Title: Smart Looking Dummies
Reviews.Author: Hicoteo
Reviews.Content: These are great because they look real. I have an 8 camera DVR for apartment block surveillance. I set the dummies up in the most visible places and put the real cameras in less obvious places. The dummies catch peoples attention but its no big deal if someone tries to break them. I think the flashing light is a little too bright, however. A dimmer one would be just as affective and would increase battery life. Or, a photo cell would be good so that they only blink at night. They also come with stickers to let people know there are cameras on the grounds. My real cams didn't even come with any.

Reviews.Title: Fake security camera
Reviews.Author: Randall Witters
Reviews.Content: Unless you were inthe security business It can't be told from the real mccoy. I had a trespassing problem with vandalism this summer. There is a good chance that this will put a stop to that. Currently I haven't installed batteries, but may to activate the blinking light if I leave for any length of time.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera...
Reviews.Author: Hilly
Reviews.Content: I love this Camera.. Can not tell it is not real.Has a security sticker which comes with it.Every home needs one..

Reviews.Title: Would fool any hoodlum, f-n punk, or bad boy copper
Reviews.Author: Web User

Blinking red light is very bright and noticeable in day and night easily from the street.  It gives me confidence that I can trick criminals and the law into thinking they are being watched and will act civil accordingly.

Reviews.Title: Liked it

Reviews.Title: Looks real

Reviews.Title: mrd

Reviews.Content: I just tested these cameras to see if they are working and I am very happy with them. Right now they have gone to Europe to be install in my sisters house.

Reviews.Title: Perfect to deter bad guys
Reviews.Author: David A. Jones "Davy"
Reviews.Content: The security cam meets my need to deter criminals who might want to drop by and shop at my house. Looks like the real think. I love the bright blinking red light!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: amy taylor
Reviews.Content: This looks so real it's amazing it's plastic but com afar where mounted no one knows and the red light is genius

Reviews.Title: Not nice
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: Sorry this is the only thing I have bought so far that was bad it fell apart and wouldn't work sorry it was plastic wish it had told me that before I ordered it all my other things are just great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! I hope it lasts a while.
Reviews.Author: midmich
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this dummy camera. It shipped fast, arrived in perfect conditions packaged in its product box, and yes, the package included the "warning" sticker.The "camera" looks great and very convincing. I also have a "real" Foscam FI8904W, and the view from the front (lens, IR LEDs) is virtually identical. It is made of apparently high quality plastic, very well finished and painted in silver. It is impossible to tell it is plastic without touching it.The flashing LED works as advertised. Removing the cover and accessing the batteries takes one second - no instructions required.I hope this product will hold well outdoors... I will write a follow-up review in a few months.So far, so good. Definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: They Look Real
Reviews.Author: wy4j
Reviews.Content: These fake cameras will fool everyone. They look very real. I mounted them high and drilled a hole so anyone looking at them would think that the wire was indeed going inside the attic. I also took a pin and ran it across the empty plastic tube that masquerades as the wire connection just in case anyone tries to pull it out of the attic. They offer perception rather than protection and if anyone see them they just rather go break into another house and not risk dealing with alarms and security cameras and who know what else they might find inside once they break in.

Reviews.Title: Looks not fake
Reviews.Author: Luis Garcia
Reviews.Content: It Installs in minutes and it looks great. I just wish it would be a smaller, but it is great for the price

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: S. Rao
Reviews.Content: Looks real, but I hope it is never needed!  My guess is if someone really tries to come close and look at it, they may be able to tell it is a fake... but then if someone is so keen to find out, then you have problems anyway!

Reviews.Title: Gets the Job done!
Reviews.Author: Bigrin
Reviews.Content: In addition to my regular real cameras, this camera dummy adds to my home's security.  Neighbors cannot tell the difference.  It will fend off anyone who looks at it.  The blinking red light lasts for over 3 months on 2 duracell AA batteries.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: NICE!!
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera, easy install and the light stays lit for a long time! Only thing is i wish that there was not a name on the side. Camera interests people and would hate for someone to look them up. But overall good investment!

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Detective Chase WPD
Reviews.Content: I put two of these up at my home because of some recent problems.  At 15' above the ground you cannot tell that they are fake.  I recommend these "cameras" for anyone who needs the illusion of a security system.

Reviews.Title: Won't be able to install batteries
Reviews.Author: Alfred J. Trimble
Reviews.Content: For the price this may be just fine.  However, there are no instrucitons as to how to install batteries and when I tried to remove the screws to get to the battery compartment two of the four screws stripped.  The manufacturer wanted to made shure the batterhy compartment was watertight but should have used larger screws that would not strip.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: Looks like a real camera. Not much else to say about it.  Real metal.  I guess it would deter somebody.

Reviews.Title: Good enough to get the job done.
Reviews.Author: Joshua Forrester
Reviews.Content: For the price (under 10 bucks at the time of this writing), you really can't beat these dummy cameras. I ordered one to put inside my place after finding out I was getting uninvited visits from the landlord when I wasn't home. I can tell you that from a distance it looks like the real thing. I can't say I approve of the blinking red light (real cameras don't have this), but it does a good job of getting someone to notice the camera if it's tucked into a dark corner that would otherwise be missed... If you don't like the light, just leave the batteries out, problem solved.After installing the first one, I decided to order a second one to point toward the back door (from inside). I think these would look good outside as well, but I'm on the fence about drawing that much attention to my place from the outside- as if to say "I've got something really good in here, and I need cameras to protect it." I wouldn't mind sending that message if they were real, but prying eyes would be able to tell these were fake if you got a close enough look at them. I figure if they are mounted inside and someone breaks in and then sees them, they aren't going to stand around long enough to inspect them to find out if they are real. If they are mounted outside, someone could get close to them to inspect them without drawing much attention..Anyway, I digress... As stated before, for the price you can't beat these for cheap added security - I would just think twice before mounting outside vs inside. 4 stars instead of 5 only because the mounting bracket is cheap plastic, but that's being really picky for the price point..

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: daryl moses
Reviews.Content: this fake camera is very realistic.  I mounted it over my back door.  It even has a blinking red light that adds to the realism.

Reviews.Title: Good looking from afar
Reviews.Author: Detroit4ever
Reviews.Content: Hopefully these will deter any would-be troublemakers!  The items are plastic and feel cheap in hand.  Install was fairly easy.  Unable to mount "upside down" on a porch ceiling.  For under $10 they look decent!

Reviews.Title: Nice quality looks real
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: This fake camera looks good and does the job of keeping people worried.  Two AA batteries are not included so buy some.

Reviews.Title: We loved them.
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: They are very realistic looking.  Several of our neighbors bought them and we bought some for our kids. Everyone likes them.

Reviews.Title: Looks real to my friends
Reviews.Author: Daniel Jurs
Reviews.Content: Nice product, easy to mount with included screws, fully adjustable, turns and tilts any which way.I'm not an expert on cameras of this type but it looks like the real thing.I've only had it for a few weeks, so I can't say how long it will blink before the batteries go dead.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping for
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I do not like the way it mounts.  I will have to use it somewhere else than I had hoped as it needs to be far out of reach for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Cameras look real and will fool everyone!
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: I love them. I ordered 2 and went back and ordered 3 more. Looks very real and will fool anyone. Serves the purpose at a great price! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Looks professional!!!!!
Reviews.Author: J. A. Phillips "livingwaters888"
Reviews.Content: Looks clean...easy install...easy battery change. I put a real camera cable instead of the one it came with and ran it a ways before going into my ceiling.

Reviews.Title: Looks very realistic.  Love the blinking LED
Reviews.Author: Strategic Internet "www.strategic-internet.com"
Reviews.Content: This should get burglars attention.  They don't want to know someone is watching or that they are being recorded.  I mounted this high and far enough away that they can't get too close.  All of our eaves are too low and they could easily tamper with it.  Only time will tell.  Still looking to get some REAL cameras though too.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: N. Lancaster
Reviews.Content: This item is great, It looks just like the real deal, It is easy to install. The sticker that comes with it that warns there is CCTV is junk and fades in the sun in under a week though.

Reviews.Title: I liked it
Reviews.Author: Janice Drapp
Reviews.Content: I was a gift for some one else, I didn't hear from them, so I guess they liked it. I will ask

Reviews.Title: no on off switch for the light
Reviews.Author: sid
Reviews.Content: wish they had given an on off switch on the deviceit will save lot of power in the morning hours.in that way conserve power.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!
Reviews.Author: Memi
Reviews.Content: I bought this dummy camera becasue where I live there was a break in, I got so paranoid after that and, I could not afford a realsecurity system, I think  it does what it supposed to do and I feel somehow secure having it.Thank you and I would definetily recommeded to a anyone.Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what its needed for.
Reviews.Author: Eli D. Bob
Reviews.Content: Looks convincing. Does its job. Can't beat the price for the service it provides. Would absolutely recommend this product. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: dario a untama
Reviews.Content: It looks very real. It has dissuaded some of my young neighbors from playing pranks on me. I would definitely buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Looks great
Reviews.Author: Peter A
Reviews.Content: Modern looking fake cameras.  Feel a little cheap when handled, BUT they look appropriate when hung high on a building or wall.  Got several for our property.  The nut/bolt combo holding the articulating joint together was stripped on one of the six cameras that I purchased.  I found it easier to replace the hardware myself rather than return the item.  Part of the low price will be inherent in the lower-quality components.  All in all, a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Sweet item
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: good quality makes a good impression when installed near a  window, keeps the amateurs away and that is good Love em

Reviews.Title: good fakery!
Reviews.Author: E. Swenson "esoterik1967"
Reviews.Content: To the untrained eye it can be a deterrent. I bought it because the kid next door was stealing my deliveries. I know this because my neighbor across the street told me that he saw him stealing my stuff.

Reviews.Title: looks like a real camera
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: fast deliver.looks like a real camera and at night it blinks red and at day time its blinks to but at night its bright red blinks make it looks like a real camera.

Reviews.Title: What batteries to use.
Reviews.Author: IRISH
Reviews.Content: I just purchased 3 Outdoor Fake/Dummy Security Cameras w/Blinking Light. I installed Energizer 9X Lithium Batteries ( Purchased at Walmart ). These were recommended by another review and I am using them so I will not need to replace the batteries as often. Units look Great.

Reviews.Title: large camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen L. Cudmore
Reviews.Content: I was hoping this camera was smaller because most digital cameras are smaller now. So I didn't mount it on the building. Instaead gave it away to a poor fellow who had his house broke into and plumbing ripped out. I was unsure if they would be a deterant or a draw for criminal activity since the camera was so large

Reviews.Title: OK...BUT
Reviews.Author: David Sprunk "Trudy Post Sprunk"
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT 4 AND INSTALLED THEM AT MY WIFE'S OFFICE. THEY LOOK GOOD AND HOPEFULLY WILL DIVERT SOME BAD GUYS. I INSTALLED THEM HIGH ENOUGH SO NO ONE CAN REACH THEM.MY GRIPE IS THE BATTERY LIFE.  THE FIRST REGULAR BATTERIES LASTED ABOUT 5-6 WEEKS. SO I BOUGHT SOME EXPENSIVE LITHIUM BATTERIES.  THEY LASTED ABOUT 3-4 WEEKS.  I DECIDED TO FORGET THE BATTERIES. A BETTER PRODUCT WITH A WIRE TO AN ELECTRICAL OUTLET WOULD BE OF INTEREST TO ME...I KNOW IT WOULD COST MORE BUT THEY WOULD LOOK MORE AUTHENTIC WHEN THERE IS A FLASHING RED LIGHT.  I HAD SOMEHOW GOT THE IMPRESSION THAT THE BATTERIES WOULD LAST A YEAR.  THAT, MOST CERTAINLY WAS NOT TRUE.

Reviews.Title: Realistic looking product!
Reviews.Author: Star "Wabbit"
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these to try and it seems to work well.  Easy to install and adjust from just outside a second floor window.  Didn't even need to use a ladder.  Batteries are easy to change, not sure how long they will last but it's been working over a month now.  It point down the side of my home toward the rear of the house, and is easy to spot blinking at night..

Reviews.Title: Does not work for me.
Reviews.Author: Sassylady2001
Reviews.Content: I am unable to mount the cameras because they do not tilt.  They only swivel side to side, not up and down.  My house is brick and the only way I could mount them would be on underside of roof overhand near the exterior wall, about 6" above the top of the door.  Problem is, the camera only swivels from side to side and needs to be able to be tilted up or down.  Since I have to hang it above the door, as it is made, it would only appear to be capturing pictures above the intruder's head and not of the intruder.  It needs to be able to tilt downward so it appears it could capture someone approaching my door.It's also a bit plasticiky looking. I remember what I paid for it and it is worth the $8 if it would tilt.  As it is, it is not worth anything since it cannot be tilted at an intruder.  I held it to the wall as I was going to mount on the wall, but with it not being able to tilt up or down, you can't make it aim at anything but a line parallel to the wall about 5" out.  Security cameras are mounted high and pointed down at at an angle - something you cannot do with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply mad but looks good from a distance.
Reviews.Author: Finn Comfort Fan
Reviews.Content: Be careful handling it.  Turn the twist knob first before you attempt to manipulate it.  The screws are rather cheap and strip easily.  Just be patient.  And don't cut too much of the wire at first.

Reviews.Title: Good idea.
Reviews.Author: Clubis
Reviews.Content: I like the appearance of the product--looks very real.  Did not put batteries in it because I don't want to draw too much attention to it, only enough that potential thieves won't look for the real camera.I would recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: "Camera" look like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Shirley Underwood
Reviews.Content: I use these cameras in my store.  I have one on each wall and the lights blink and look like a real camera

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: leanna "leanna chapman"
Reviews.Content: I PUT THIS UP TO LOOK IVER MY CAR AND  THE FACT THAT THERE IS A RED FLASHING LIGHT IS AWSOME CAUSE PPL CAN SEE IT AND IT LOOKS LIKE A REAL CAMERA  AND NOTTHING HAS HAPPEN TO MY CAR SENCE IT HAS BEEN UP ..SHIPPED FAST

Reviews.Title: top notch security camera (even though its fake!!)
Reviews.Author: J. Bellizzi Jr. "Gonzo"
Reviews.Content: for a great fake camera, that looks real, and easy to mount, this is the model for you.  I have two of these now!!

Reviews.Title: The best I think
Reviews.Author: joonki baek
Reviews.Content: This item works in my backyard. Easy to install and the blinking light seems very convincing. No problems after a month or so. OUTDOOR FAKE / DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light (Silver)

Reviews.Title: Excellent dummy camera - not too small
Reviews.Author: Robert V Herman
Reviews.Content: I was surprised at the decent size of this dummy camera (about the size of a Campbells condensed soup can) and the realistic details.  The camera body has a dummy wire that fits into the base like a real camera, the face looks like a regular IR camera and the mount and swivel allow flexibility in mounting.It uses two AA batteries to run the LED which flashes red to make it look like the camera is on.  I haven't decided whether it looks more realistic with the LED blinking or not.  Most cameras do not have a red "active" light.  The body and mount are plastic but seem sturdy enough.At this price, these make an excellent investment to ward burglars and vandals away.

Reviews.Title: Great and realistic camera
Reviews.Author: Florence Samuels
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the results of this camera.  It accomplished exactly what I wanted and the installation was very easy.  Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: So real it's almost funny
Reviews.Author: Abraham
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty cool, and it's bigger than you may see it in the photos. I did accidentally break it while trying to get the right angle.. but for a few dollars it can be fixed with your average super glue. It comes with three green plastic tubes about a half inch long and a red, artistic, Japanese style snowflake... what are the green plastic tubes for? And why did I get this artistic snowflake? Not hating on the art... just curious.

Reviews.Title: Look Great
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Have not put them up yet but when I received them they look like the real deal. Will serve their purporse of keeping people from arm's length and from coming close enough to vandalize. I won't put the batteries in because that is a tip off that they aren't real. Unless you strapped a 1984 JVC shoulder camera up to your house no other real camera will have the light. Only question I have is if they will hold up to weather and high winds.

Reviews.Title: Needs new screws!
Reviews.Author: Captain Cole "JMC"
Reviews.Content: The screws that come with the product are junk. Get some good wood screws about 3/4 inch long. The product its self is fine. Although, I didn't use the batteries. Too obvious a fake. My neighbor has cameras without the blinking lights. JMC

Reviews.Title: OUTDOOR FAKE / DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Robert George
Reviews.Content: From afar ...the unit looks real and as a functional unit. The camera and body look and feel very cheap and may not have the longevity expected. Once the snow and rain get at it ... I expect to have some trouble. I believe I have found this same unit elsewhere online for much less. While Amazon is most often a great value ... it is not always.

Reviews.Title: lets see keeps the unwanted guess away
Reviews.Author: James Smith
Reviews.Content: lets see keeps the unwanted guess away ! who likes to stand out in front of your house.  they are smaller then they seem on line !!

Reviews.Title: Amazing Looks So real
Reviews.Author: Danushka Abeyasekera
Reviews.Content: This looks so real, I love this camera. I am sure all the thieves would be scared to enter thinking there is a real camera

Reviews.Title: Looks real enough I guess.
Reviews.Author: Deal Seeker "Tony"
Reviews.Content: For the price I think it makes for a a decent fake camera. Perhaps someone who really is very familiar with cameras could ID it as a fake but most of us I think see them in stores and occasionally a house so doubt many would give it a casual glance and know it is fake.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: tschuebel
Reviews.Content: thanks-the product was easy to install , afterall i live in NYC and need probably another 4 of them so thanks

Reviews.Title: Looks authentic
Reviews.Author: V. Pittman "Farmer"
Reviews.Content: Have some real cameras but wanted to use this to notify would-be-uninvited guests of surveillance.Cost and look make it a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: C. Lopez
Reviews.Content: These look so real and mounted in one minute. Well worth the very little $$ they are asking for. All my neighbors think they are real. :-) good deal and great for faking out those who may want to rob my house.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: SB Inc.
Reviews.Content: Everyone that came into my house was sure this was real. Will buy more and this is a just in case type of item.

Reviews.Title: Love these
Reviews.Author: Gino Deanne
Reviews.Content: As a small business owner working from home, it's very important that no body messes with my work van or try to break into my home, I never had a problem before but still never really felt safe. Any giving time somebody could break into my van or home. I seen these online, bought them they came fast, very easy install. Put one high up on my porch in front facing van and front yard and one on back deck facing the whole yard. Looks so real with blinking light. Everybody around my house notices the cams now. Feel a lot better now. Awesome product .

Reviews.Title: Looks real to me
Reviews.Author: Salt4life "B.S."
Reviews.Content: Mounted outside, looks real to me even 6 feet away. I would recommend and the batteries are  still going strong.

Reviews.Title: Not exactly fake
Reviews.Author: Dennis Johnson "Shopper"
Reviews.Content: After installing this great looking "camera", things appear much more secure around here. Pointing it out to family always returned a, "You installed a security system? Bet you feel safer already". Not, "Why did you put up a fake camera?"This is a realistic (looking) security system. The rain shield, cable, and blinking LED all lead to its realism. It's the next best thing to spending hundreds and having a real system. Any thief is not going to try and take this down and see if it's for real. They're just going to quietly move along to a house that doesn't have a security system.Worth every penny. In fact, I might have to get more. Make it look like Fort Knox around here! :D

Reviews.Title: police
Reviews.Author: Mal
Reviews.Content: The police wanted to see our recording from the camera because there was a burglary several doors down the street

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: Looks and feels just like a real camera.  We have a few real ones and this one fits right in.  I like it because no one but me know which ones are real!!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: lees
Reviews.Content: Loved it!Can't be better.. loved the price and the productIt really has a red light and everything so it looks real

Reviews.Title: For the $$$, a good buy
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: Looks a bit more plastic-y when you see it up close but still very realistic looking when mounted outside. Have it in the rear of the bungalow where I live. The batteries need to be changed but lasted for at least 3 weeks.

Reviews.Title: This thing really looks good
Reviews.Author: leendawoman
Reviews.Content: The little red light flashes. I wouldn't mount it where thieves could get a close look or touch but mounted under the eave of the house it is convincing.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Content: Moving into a new Home is expensive, but having these camras mqde me feel safe until , I was able to purchace the real deal.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Brian W Hoeksema
Reviews.Content: Great Value for what i paid. Serves its purpose well.  Would buy more. Would recommend. LA  :LA :A :ABB n

Reviews.Title: So realistic!
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for the front and sides of our home. We had our cars tampered with in our driveway in the middle of the night so the security cameras was our next step to scare off whoever was thinking of trying to break into our vehicles. No more problems with the vehicles after we put these cameras up. Also, the red blinking light makes the camera seem realistic!

Reviews.Title: Looks really good, would buy another
Reviews.Author: Miketheman
Reviews.Content: This thing look like an Led camera, if you get right up next to it you can see it is a hose for a wire etc. it does have a blinking red lite that draws potential robbers etc. attention. My advice is to hang this thing up high (out of reach) but in plain sight. So far so good, looks like you just smiled for the camera. I also bought a security camera in use sign from home depot for like $2  and put that up as well.

Reviews.Title: They look real
Reviews.Author: Tim Williams
Reviews.Content: They look real and that is what works for us. This has a deterance factor that works in a very open environment where hard wired cameras would be very difficult to install.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: Clay White
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed. Looks just like the real one. All plastic but from a few feet away who can tell.Great value!!

Reviews.Title: Looks fine
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: This dummy is ok. I don't know if it works. At least my scooter has not been stolen again. I combined it with a warning sign. Feel much better and safe with it. From far away looks very real and the red light it has is visible at night.

Reviews.Title: DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light
Reviews.Author: G. Sherwin
Reviews.Content: DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light is just what I needed... I will recommend it to all of my friends

Reviews.Title: Great Fake!
Reviews.Author: R. Cervantes "raven"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera 3 months ago and I'm very pleased with it. Details look great and it actually looks like a real camera. I have asked a few relatives visiting my place and they are all convinced it is a real camera. For the price it is a homerun! I recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Meyer Jr. "Jay Meyer"
Reviews.Content: Looks good and real the blinking light really is a plus, I might order a couple more for around the house.

Reviews.Title: My wife fell for it
Reviews.Author: Emir
Reviews.Content: Wife pulled up and I asked if she saw our new camera. She goes, yep! did you see me waving at it! I started laughing.I will say it works well!!! It fooled her!it's made of plastic, and kind of flimsly. but it will do since it's up high.

Reviews.Title: The real thing almost!
Reviews.Author: JiMarti
Reviews.Content: Our ADT installer did an upgrade at our house and was fooled by the camera.  Our FedEx man now makes sure our packages are on the side facing the camera. That is good enough for me!

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Maturity "TG"
Reviews.Content: It served its purpose of making it appear that my new house had security while it was being built Well worth the money I spent

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive solution to security concerns
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Miller
Reviews.Content: This is a great inexpensive solution to security concerns.  Some knuckleheads were opening car doors in our neighborhood and going through them late at night-- after I installed this camera, no more problems!  An easy, inexpensive solution to our security issues.

Reviews.Title: They look real
