Reviews.Author: Wolf Neumann
Reviews.Content: Great looking camera. Installation is no problem at all. I added a little piece of wire on the inside of the window, so now it looks VERY real.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: BAT LIFE
Reviews.Content: These fake cameras are great for cheap security.. They look authentic and the batteries last several months. I have two cameras that are on my RV and they stay in the rain...still going strong 2 years now!

Reviews.Title: It Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Clint Henry "CH3"
Reviews.Content: I love it so far. Its been a week so far and its still blinking. Hopefully it scares the crooks so my pistol wont blink.

Reviews.Title: Does the job I want.
Reviews.Author: nature lover "Steve"
Reviews.Content: This camera looks real and the red flashing light is bright in the dark.  No one is going to get close enough to it to realize it isn't real.  I put in good lithium batteries and almost 2 months later are still flashing.Put it up on a porch post aimed at the driveway. I have seen people who have come to knock on the door actually smile and wave at the camera as if they think I can see them on an indoor monitor!Had someone in the night syphoning gas from our vehicles. Since the camera has been up  our gas tanks have stayed full.  When you see a security camera aimed towards you with the blinking red light you aren't going to take the chance of being filmed breaking the law, etc.On here now to order another one for the far side of my house just because !  :-)They are well worth this small amount of money.

Reviews.Title: Looks real, effective deterrent for the price
Reviews.Author: Jim Gordon
Reviews.Content: I have no insurance on my old home. Installed one of these today and will order another for rear door. A cheap deterrent, it comes with a bright yellow window sticker that says 'CCTV security'. The swivel bracket is designed to be mounted on vertical surfaces, not overhead unless you are willing to use it pointing almost straight down. There is a dome camera for cieling mounting. EDIT - after 2 months the original set of alkaline batteries is still flashing 24/7 in spite of the searing hot 95 degree days here in Florida. So I can say batteries last a minimum of 2 months, making the required annual cost of batteries a reasonable price for the year-round crime deterrent effect.

Reviews.Title: Realistic Fake Cameras
Reviews.Author: Jackie L. Willis Jr. "waterboyjlw"
Reviews.Content: These were recieved in good condition with no defects. the screws were included ( inluding wall anchors for drywall mounting)but were the wrong kind (they would have worked) but I had the correct ones in the garage. Three screws to mount each camera. It only took about 45 minutes to mount thes and put away all the tools. Just loosen the screw on the bottom of the mounting bracket to swivel the camera out of the way when mounting and then tighten it up and aim the camera when done. These "fake" cameras appear very realistic including an adjustable sun shield on top. I did not install batteries to get the flashing red led because that is a sure sign off a fake camera (I have 22 real ones at work and none of those have a flashing led). I am very happy the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Does the trick and tricked an alarm system salesman
Reviews.Author: Steverino
Reviews.Content: I installed four of these around my house.  An alarm system salesman came to my door.  I declined his offer.  As he left, he asked how my camera system was working for me.  I said they were serving their purpose.  He didn't know they were fake.  One thing though, the fact that they use batteries means you will need to change the batteries periodically.  That can be a challenge if you've had to locate them in a difficult place, as I have.

Reviews.Title: More than expexted
Reviews.Author: Roberto Andino
Reviews.Content: Is really a nice product, do their job really well is the best buy i ever made thank u very much!!

Reviews.Title: I would bet that A Thief would Think It's Real
Reviews.Author: Wil MacKinney
Reviews.Content: This camera is absolutely realistic.  I can't believe any thief would would want to be in it's apparent coverage area.

Reviews.Title: An Inexpensive an Effective Home Security Addition
Reviews.Author: Tom  A  Pettey
Reviews.Content: It looks like a part of a fully operational video serveilance system, making it a cost effective part of a burglary deterrence system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: This device is awesome, i guess that i bought it 2 months ago and the led still blinking without any issue.I recommend it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: D. Logan
Reviews.Content: I will admit, I don't know what a real outdoor security camera looks like. However, this serves our purpose well. The blinking light makes it look very realistic. We mounted this high on the wall and from a distance, it looks amazing and very real. Very close up and when you have it in your hand, it's lightweight and you can tell it's not real... but not really a problem when mounted. One thing to keep in mind before choosing where to mount the camera, if you want the red light to blink - you'll need access to replace the batteries on a regular basis.

Reviews.Title: IMPRESSIVE LOOKING.
Reviews.Author: LOUIE P.CABALLERO
Reviews.Content: IT IS WHAT IT IS.. COULD BE MADE STURDIER ,SUPPLEMENTS MY REAL ONES WHERE PLACED OBVIOUSLY TO DETER INTRUDERS HOWEVER THEY WILL BE ON  VIDEO CAMERA !

Reviews.Title: Great buy !
Reviews.Author: Bob  Hall
Reviews.Content: This is the best $10.00 that I ever spent !  Depending on where you live, its always good to keep thiefs guessing whether or not they are being filmed !  As long as that red light is blinking they will never know.  Thanks again !

Reviews.Title: it works great , not gaudy or cheap looking
Reviews.Author: Diana L. Berry
Reviews.Content: Better quality than I expected for the price !  Sturdy, good looking equipment. Will be buying another one in the near future

Reviews.Title: Perfect Decoy
Reviews.Author: Thomas Lhamon
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it is supposed to do, be really obvious and scary.  The LED is very bright and easy to see.  Very quick install, batteries are very easy to change as well.

Reviews.Title: good anti-theft device
Reviews.Author: Julie Livingston
Reviews.Content: Camera looks good, real good I think. Lights blink red, which makes camera appear to be working. We had an attempted B@E and I feel better with this on the lanai.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jon D
Reviews.Content: Can't beat the price, look very authentic. And if your wondering, you cannot see the battery compartment and it has a fake cable that comes down the back, very nice Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Still blinking
Reviews.Author: D.H.
Reviews.Content: Does what it says. Easy to install and seems to be working fine after a couple months of duty. Still blinking.

Reviews.Title: Great Idea
Reviews.Author: Richard Spivey
Reviews.Content: I love this item as I use it a donated gift and us these types of items in my public talks. Thank You very much

Reviews.Title: Great Fakie
Reviews.Author: SGT Santiago
Reviews.Content: I love these bad boys! All my friends and family think its the real thing! I would recomend buying some rechargable batteries as they use up bat life within 1 month or so.

Reviews.Title: i think its working
Reviews.Author: Tricia
Reviews.Content: I have ben robed 3 times now, and I have not woken up in the middle of sleep to see a guy running out, so im happy

Reviews.Title: Okay but not great.
Reviews.Author: yo
Reviews.Content: I received these a couple weeks late and when I finally got them I was very disappointed that one was already broken! I just used some glue and reattached the rotating mechanism back on to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Red light blinking!!
Reviews.Author: ClutterBGone
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and they look very real. Nice to look out on the back deck and front porch and see the red light blinking!

Reviews.Title: Very real looking
Reviews.Author: Auntie Beth
Reviews.Content: Great security for the price. Well made and easy to install too. If mounted high an unexpected guest could not tell these are fake.

Reviews.Title: Dummy camera for dummy crooks
Reviews.Author: shobobb
Reviews.Content: I have to say to make it more real, I do not use the blinking light. Put it up high so they can see the camera but not seeee the camera, and for shats and giggles I put an antenna on the back to make it look wireless

Reviews.Title: Who knows if it's effective?
Reviews.Author: Sky Sox Wiz
Reviews.Content: After a year and a week of using the CCD fake camera I'm pleased with it's appearance and value.  Unless you could actually talk with a potential robber it's hard to say if it has had any deterrent value or if I've been lucky.  Nevertheless at this price there's no harm in trying it.  I haven't had any break-ins or robberies since installing the CCD but that's a little like the joke about keeping away elephants.  Given that the PD found a stolen purse/cellphone in our alley this week and we are close to marginal neighborhoods I'm buying two more to augment a true webcam that a neighbor is installing in the alley to watch his business van.  BTW I just changed the AA batteries for the only time in a year...the blinking LED adds a degree of realism!

Reviews.Title: Hope this does the job
Reviews.Author: ORELINE SWEENEY
Reviews.Content: Because it is as advertised only hope it works to deter crime.  Crime is rampant.  The police force can't handle it all.

Reviews.Title: graeat looking camera
Reviews.Author: Luis A. Soto
Reviews.Content: the camera looks very real, and it only needs three screws to install. i think i made a good purchase and being thinking on ordering a second one.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: BG
Reviews.Content: This was definitely an impulse buy.  I installed it on my apartment porch and the same battery still works after 24/7 for 2 months.  People always think it's real.

Reviews.Title: very realistic
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: these are very realistic, fools even the expert cctv people !! I have several "real" cameras but cannot cover my entire property so I have these strategically located so only I know the real from fake. The blinking led works great and is bright, motion activation works but seems to stay on a little long, but with the led if it blinked forever the batteries would still last 2-3 months. great purchase and detterent for theives.

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Visa "catman43"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good product , the key is to put it up high enough so that it can't be detected as being fake.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: M. McDonald "Retired APE"
Reviews.Content: This fake camera is very intimidating.  I have it mounted next to my front door right above the side that says "No Solicitors".  It catches the eye of everyone who comes to house.  I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Hawgfan "Hawgfan"
Reviews.Content: Had some dirt bags walk through our hunt club and steal a few items last season so people are putting up dummy security cameras and signs to give them pause in case they decide to return.

Reviews.Title: I see you
Reviews.Author: Karen Owens
Reviews.Content: This camera looks real and is a good deterrant for potential crime.  The batteries in this camera only last a month which can become annoying to replace. You can either use batteries or choose not to for the red blinking light; either way, the camera still looks functional and real.

Reviews.Title: It works. But battery life is not great
Reviews.Author: Joel Haile
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised. Looks like a real camera from a distance. But It kills battery fast. The sticker is cheesy.

Reviews.Title: Look Realistic
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly
Reviews.Content: Great price, hard to tell from real ones...Istallation was very easy, Didn't use the batteries though (Blinking light spells FAKE) would buy again.

Reviews.Title: good replica
Reviews.Author: Survival Pro
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like the real thing with the one exception being the cord (it's slightly small and can come out of the base leaving it looking like the cord has been cut.

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark G. Matthews
Reviews.Content: Looks good.  Only problem is short battery life.  I use 2500ma rechargeables and they only last a month or so.

Reviews.Title: Good but battery replacement is frequent
Reviews.Author: K. Allen
Reviews.Content: I liked the idea of installing a camera (even though fake) as a deterrent for home break ins and vandalism, which unfortunately is picking up in frequency in my neighborhood.  Cameras look real, except for the fact that I was told the red flashing recording light is not blinking, but constant on real cameras.  Several neighborhood kids did a close up, but I simply told them it was the real deal anyway!  Also, the battery seems to need replacing every month and a half, which is a bit of a pain!

Reviews.Title: Nice...
Reviews.Author: Utard Lonestar
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and it really gives the appearance of a real camera.  Didn't even tell my neighbors it wasn't real.  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: AZ
Reviews.Content: This little camera stop working (the light) after just Two days, so I tried in vane to fix but no way.  I think You get what You paid for.

Reviews.Title: Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: After someone was able to unlock the outside door to my carport I purchased these because I can't afford the real thing.  I also had a deadbolt installed and bought security decals from Amazon.com.  Some people say these are obvious fakes, but I can't tell the difference and wonder if the thugs that break into other people's homes could tell.  When someone breaks into your home it can make you very nervous and a bit paranoid.  After my handyman installed them I have felt much better.  They were simple to install and if a person is younger and doesn't have arthritis it would be a snap.  My handyman was so impressed with them he was talking about getting some for his house.

Reviews.Title: Fools Everyone!
Reviews.Author: M.B.Cook "Snorkle Finatics"
Reviews.Content: We've had this camera mounted on our house for 6 months now, same batteries, little red light still steadily blinking night after night!  Everyone that comes to our house either to visit or various servicemen all believe we are watching them.  It's great (and somewhat amusing)!  We just don't tell them any differently.  We are adding another to the front of our house now!

Reviews.Title: Well Worth It
Reviews.Author: D. Mikeska
Reviews.Content: I've bought two of these and have been very happy with them.  They look real and the flashing light is very convincing.  Rechargable batteries lasted about 3 months if I remembered correctly.  Money well spent in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: best dummy security camera
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: I like this outdoor fake camera it looks like the real deal and the red dot is bright enough that someone can see it.i wish  you can move the bottom of the cam.

Reviews.Title: Living in the country
Reviews.Author: Sibeez "Sibeez"
Reviews.Content: These fake camera's are helpful.  Potential criminals don't take the time to discern if these camera's are real, or not.

Reviews.Title: Great..Great...
Reviews.Author: Ms Tasha
Reviews.Content: I live in an apartment complex and was fearful of being robbed by the nosey neighbors that are across from me that are always sitting outside 24/7. I installed the cameras and I haven't seen the nosey people outside watching me any more..They think they on candid camera....lol..It works..the light blinks and it look realistic

Reviews.Title: really pleased with items
Reviews.Author: donald young
Reviews.Content: I have not installed them yet but just by looking at them, I am pleased with them ,I am looking forward to getting them on the wall....delivery was....excellent......buy them if you like the look of them.....they are worth the money

Reviews.Title: Lack of a power switch
Reviews.Author: Thiem T. Pho "thiempho"
Reviews.Content: It'd be a very daunting task to replace the batteries once you've it mounted. And also there's no switch to it on/off when it's not in used or saving batteries life.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Product!
Reviews.Author: Brad Keown
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with my new dummy cameras. They're value priced, quickly shipped, and look like the real thing. I installed two of them on the front and side of my house and will probably get two more for the back. I would definitely recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Should have bought these years ago...
Reviews.Author: David R. "Abide"
Reviews.Content: Yes, they're cheesy, fake, video cameras, but they're NICE cheesy, fake, video cameras. They look real enough (especially the front where the camera lens would be), and other than some silly CCTV stickers on the side, they are plenty real enough. Initially I thought the flashing light was a bit much, but they are not that noticeable by passerbys and are great for the people looking for such security devices. I use one to cover packages and one to cover my cars - very happy with results (less people hanging around, no issues with packages missing). Maybe eventually I'll get a real home surveillance system, but for now, these work.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: BJ
Reviews.Content: For those who are looking for an inexpensive  deterrent for unwanted guests, it does the job. It is made of plastic, but if you're far enough away or the camera is high enough it's hard to tell. Plus, only the complete morons are going to test it to see if its real by breaking into your house or vandalize it. I doubt there are too many people willing to risk it. For those who will try, there's nothing anyone can do to fix stupid! Overall, it's worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A true warning to would be intruders.
Reviews.Author: old school
Reviews.Content: I wanted a fake camera, that would cause an intruder to think twice, three times before breaking in. These fake / real look cameras should do the trick, but if not, I'm ready with the real deal inside.

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: Cerina Hicks
Reviews.Content: great product-using it well-really keeps me well protected-even though it is not real item but fake.thanks for inventing this item.

Reviews.Title: easily made to real
Reviews.Author: Gilbert
Reviews.Content: great product to use with really small cameras. It may look fake but once you disassemble it and put a real wireless camera in it, it saves you a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: Was pleased.
Reviews.Author: al watson
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these cameras for outside use. They were shipped really fast. The looks of them are like real cameras . You have to put them up around ten feet high to get a nice effect. The only problem I had was the battery's don't last but about a month. Overall they do the job.

Reviews.Title: It's okay, but...
Reviews.Author: Jackie "Bibliobrat dot com"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my townhouse after I was visited by a Peeping Tom late one night, in addition to a motion-activated security light.  It looks real enough, I guess, and the blinking red light is a big part of it looking legit, but the batteries died after two weeks.  Not very practical, but for the price, no real complaints.

Reviews.Title: First Class Fake! Great Deterrent!
Reviews.Author: B. Good
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that I bought this fake camera. It really does look legitimate and the red blinking light is very bright. It was super easy to put up comes with screws (I used shorter ones). Slide the top cover off, throw in 2 AA batteries and mount it in 5 min. Feels light and cheap like a foam cup, but it is fake so who cares!+ Inexpensive+ Easy to Mount with hardware included+ Can swivel and adjust by loosening the base, changing the angle, and re tightening+ Great "Quality Appearance"_Bottom Line_ Yes, I would recommend this to a friend. In fact, I have already and I am ordering a few more since I only purchased one (received it today). You cannot go wrong for $10 on this one. I think it is just enough to make a person think twice about entering the property. Anyone can easily pull the wire and notice its just a fake wire but if a person is that close than the fake camera probably didn't scare them much anyway. I have it tucked in as tight as I could get it. The camera really seems intimidating, but only I know its a fake piece of plastic. I love it! Easy 5 Stars!

Reviews.Title: Looks real and sometimes, that's all that matters
Reviews.Author: SilverFox "SilverFox"
Reviews.Content: I Installed this unit high on my garage which overlooks my front driveway and yard.  In that position, it looks absolutely real and the bright red LED advertises the unit during both the day and night.I have already had the "wrong people" comment... "so, you have installed a security camera?" which was my goal.  Remember the bad-guys/gals would much rather go for the easy access house than one where they think they will get caught so the hope (and the experts tell you) put up stickers, cameras... etc and you will generally be passed by in favor of homes with no visible signs of security.Now one could argue that, if you are really concerned with security you should buy the real thing but that is not always an option for some and this, without doubt is better than nothing.As a side note about converting this enclosure to a real camera, I purchased a car "backup camera" (XO Vision HTC35) from Amazon that I will use for one of my access doors and I plan to use one of these fake cameras as the enclosure so it mounts easily to my house.  I also purchased a wireless Driveway Alert System, a 100ft CATV cable (power and video) and a small 12volt power supply to go with the camera.  The camera will then hook into the RCA video jack on my DVD recorder / TV so I can see and record anyone entering.  I will be writing a review on the camera with photos if it all works out.I would have given this four stars except that the shield blew off in the wind (admittedly a high wind) last week.  I may just glue it on.All in all, I am very pleased with this item.

Reviews.Title: this is perfect
Reviews.Author: spd5
Reviews.Content: the blinking light is awesomereally looks like a real cameranot sure how long it will last in the weather but looks solid

Reviews.Title: Big battery issue
Reviews.Author: RNM
Reviews.Content: Camera looks great...very convincing.  However, it has been installed for less than a month and I have replaced the batteries three times.  Inconvenient and frustrating.  Good idea, good product, but poor engineering on the power side.

Reviews.Title: Realistic!
Reviews.Author: Marty A. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I didn't have a great expectation of this product looking so real.  With the battery powered flashing light, the installed camera does look real.  Only myself, the maintenance man and one other employee was aware that this was fake.  Many employees came by my office to comment about the camera thinking it was real, I never let on otherwise.  This camera is used to deter vandalism and theft of our vending machines.  Only time will tell if this tactic works.  I would recommend this for those who do not wish to install a real camera but only deter potential illegal activities.  It's realistic construction, operation and presentation is why I gave this a five star.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Seakyte
Reviews.Content: This dummy camera is well built, and easy to install. Blinking red light with false electric lead looks like a real security camera and should be a good deterent.

Reviews.Title: WORKS!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Theriault
Reviews.Content: Change the batteries once or twice a year and you have an automatic deterent for criminals!  Neighbors even asked me why I installed the security cameras!  Told them I just want to be safe...:) . Get em!

Reviews.Title: Genius
Reviews.Author: JGuitar3 "JGuitar3"
Reviews.Content: Me and my partner have these on our investment properties. They are excellent. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: karl
Reviews.Content: It looks real. Its cheaply made but i knew what to expect for $10. Everything looks great except the way the light blinks. Its a long blink, I think it would look more realistic if it were quicker. Over all I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our needs
Reviews.Author: xxdoty "xxdoty"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these after someone broke into our mailbox.  We are in the country and don't have WiFi so getting a real camera was out.  I didn't really want to hard wire a camera as that entails a lot of work.  I stumbled across these fake cameras and thought for the price, why not give them a try.  I was pleasantly surprised how real they look.  After I hung them and my husband came home, he said he couldn't believe how real they look too.  The bolts that come with the camera are very cheap.  Don't use them.  Save yourself the trouble I had.  I sheered two off and had to back them out without the heads.  It was a pain.  Throw the cheap bolts away and use some nicer quality ones.  Beside that, great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: anishap
Reviews.Content: Even though it's fake it doesn't look like a fake camera from far.  So I think it's worth the money, with a blinking red light at the center. Not sure how long the battery will last. Anyway I will recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Security Measure
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Helpful in the yard area.  Should  keep the teenagers from trespassing.  We have regular security for a break-in but it doesn't keep kids from running through the back and exciting the dog.  Certainly cheaper than a 'real' camera system.

Reviews.Title: Great Looking Camera
Reviews.Author: RetiredSiGuy
Reviews.Content: This product looks very realistic, installs easily.  AA batteries need to be changed every few months and the blinking LED gets dimmer and the batteries fade.

Reviews.Title: The perfect addition to the Racing facility
Reviews.Author: Vito Veck "Vito"
Reviews.Content: When I was having trouble with some of the patrons at Philville Speedway (located in Northern California) I installed the dummy cam out of desperation. The incidence of vandalism and other illegal activities has decreased significantly. It looks and operates like the real thing. " A family friendly facility " is one of our core values here at Philville Speedway and the Dummy Camera has helped maintain the atmosphere at a low cost.

Reviews.Title: Grrrrrrreeeeat
Reviews.Author: R. Garza
Reviews.Content: Can't tell the difference in this one from a real one. The guy that was setting op my indoor cameras said he was fooled by them.

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: jeanne
Reviews.Content: It deff looks like the real thing!!!! I bought this and a sighn that says "SMILE YOU ARE ON CAMERA"! Works for me.

Reviews.Title: Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: Va Trail Rider
Reviews.Content: Looks real for sure. I have had it installed for over 1 month now and it is still working perfectly. It has faced quite a bit of hard rain and seems to be waterproof. I have it placed at the entrance to my long driveway to deter the nosy.

Reviews.Title: Look so real
Reviews.Author: ana maria
Reviews.Content: It looks so real and it has a red led that blinks every few seconds making believe is connected to system. Great product !

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Michael Berger
Reviews.Content: This is just what I had hoped it would be.  Very impressive, looks like the real deal.  I wouldn't test it.

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: JWATNH
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Have it mounted at the peak of the garage and everyone thinks it's a rearl camera. I impressed with the battery life, after three months it's still blinking.

Reviews.Title: look real
Reviews.Author: john mcdonald
Reviews.Content: installed these in my driveway.  they look so good my neighbor called the P.D  and complained that i had cameras facing her yard.  The police coundt even tell they were fake.... LOVE THEM

Reviews.Title: ccd camera
Reviews.Author: Mikelo
Reviews.Content: Awesome, I was really excited by the quality of the camera. It looks so real. I am thinking about buying more. The cable coming out is a nice touch for added realism.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Renee'
Reviews.Content: Let's face it, security is theater. All you have to do is make someone THINK you have cameras and most will go elsewhere for easier pickins. I modified mine by adding a length of RG-59 coax to route a short distance away to enhance the realistic appearance of these. That makes them look installed. These are good on their-own, but adding them to a couple working cameras might be a better idea. TIP: I did NOT use any blinking lights. That actually makes them look phony.

Reviews.Title: Fake Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna Epstein
Reviews.Content: We'd had a rash of burglaries in the neighborhood.  We wanted to feel more protected without spending the big bucks for a real camera.  It blinks as if it's really taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Egoneater
Reviews.Content: If the thieves decide to damage or steal these, I won't be out out very much money. The have a realistic look and can be mounted very easily. The jury is still out on battery life. Now, I need a couple of real ones that are identical to the fake ones, so I can really confuse the theives.

Reviews.Title: Nice Security Plus
Reviews.Author: Gandalfe
Reviews.Content: In the world of home security, it's all about looking harder to steal from than your neighbor. If you have lights on at night, deadbolt door locks, security stickers, and a barking dog, then the perp might just decide to go to the next house. (Hey, they don't even lock the front door.) But with this camera, those in a remote location, with no neighbors close, can have almost the same secuity as if there were neighbors. Kudos for coming up with a great product that was delivered promptly, priceworthy, and big plus, easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Ted Finch "Chanimal"
Reviews.Content: Added this to the outside of the restaurant where my son works (along with a Kryptonite NY Fugetaboutitl lock, an alarm, a Kryptonite Ulock) to prevent his second scooter from getting stolen.  They got the first one, cut the cable (useless) on the second but the alarm scared them away.  This is a further deterrent.  Looked very real, the top cover slides off to install two AA batteries.  I used Lithium (cost almost as much as this camera) to last.  Easy to install, light blinks, looks 100% real. Comes with a 6 x 6" sticker (nice bonus, didn't say it would have one (so I bought another one at the same time), but it was too cold to stick (I'll try again when it warms up).

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Breier
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing. I'm sure this unit will help keep the bad guys at bay. Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: wrong color/did not work
Reviews.Author: Gary St. Clair
Reviews.Content: Two security cameras were sent in purple and one was sent silver.  The silver camera did not work (blinking light) with new batteries.  I will be returning the product.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: The camera is quite realistic for the price. Looks way more authentic than other dummy cameras.The security sticker was a great addition - however I don't think it looks genuine. The screws stripped out in the middle of mounting to my house.Overall - Good!

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Sacramento Bogie
Reviews.Content: We are but one of several small companies sharing a large parking lot.  And since all of us are 24/7 and personnel do change it is difficult to tell who belongs and who doesn't.  After three months of exposed outdoor use it is still "on duty".

Reviews.Title: Look real
Reviews.Author: Michael Pangborn
Reviews.Content: We had a minor theft problem and it is gone now, these cameras look real a great find and useful

Reviews.Title: Look 100% real
Reviews.Author: Francisco Loaiza "Francisco Loaiza"
Reviews.Content: Every single family member come to my house they thing is real, because when get closer star a red light blinking, is the best for the low price.Atte:Francisco Loaiza

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: My how when someone thinks they are being watched change their behavior  great value I bought 4 at this value price

Reviews.Title: looks very real
Reviews.Author: ajrascal
Reviews.Content: so far so good and looks so real..for the price and how it is made and where i have it install you cant tell the difference from a real one..it was a good buy

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: It really looks real... If you are not looking for a real video system to protect your place, this one seems to be right for you. I bought it to my new home as I do not want the complete system. Great choice!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Krystal Celestino
Reviews.Content: You can see the light from quite a distance, which is something we liked. It looks very real, unless you are standing right next to it.

Reviews.Title: it cannot look more REAL
Reviews.Author: A. Complished
Reviews.Content: it does the job. It looks very real, it's very convincing and it gives me a piece of mind. I am very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: professionals even can't figure out it is fake
Reviews.Author: Grx_nite
Reviews.Content: I installed this and it serves the purpose. no one can figure out whether it a a real one or a fake one. even a friend of mine who is in the business couldn't recognize it as a fake one! I am happy and recommend it. Only disadvantage is, have to replace batteries frequently than I expected.

Reviews.Title: It looks real and the blinking red light makes it look even more realistic
Reviews.Author: Bread Basket "breadbasket"
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting too much as it did not cost much but I did hook it up quickly and put in the batteries and it blinks a red light constantly and looks like the real deal. I liked it so much that I bought another one and put it in another area of that overlooks the side door to my door garage.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: CherylT
Reviews.Content: this works very well along with our home security system.  easy to install and they look real.  would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, looks like the real thing. I would recommend this to those that are looking for an inexpensive way to deter crime. I use it in my backyard area where it's difficulty for others to get close to it and figure out if it's the real thing.

Reviews.Title: This fooled one of my friends
Reviews.Author: nc43202
Reviews.Content: When my friend noticed this camera, his first thought was that I was streaming the video and probably watching him.  He said it definitely caught his eye and the red blinking light makes it seem authentic.  I did notice that the red light wouldn't start blinking until I put the cover on.  I thought it was either broke or the batteries were dead but once I put it all back together, it started working.  So far, I've had it installed a month and the batteries are still working.

Reviews.Title: Looks good!
Reviews.Author: Native Texan
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount and looks real to me! Even a police officer passing by thought it was real. The con is that the batteries went out that operate the LED in only a month of use!

Reviews.Title: Very real looking
Reviews.Author: Keith
Reviews.Content: It looks very real right out of the box. Packaging was prepare correct, nothing broke. It was easy to install and feels solid in your hand. The blinking light can be seen from some distance. The next day neighbors asked how much it cost me to have my alarm company put "those" up, I smiled and said, "a lot". We have had crime in our area and vandalism so anything to avert being a victim is well worth the money. And no, I don't own shares in the company. I would recommend buying this

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: JSpring
Reviews.Content: Looks like a real cam for sure! Slightly fake feel to it because it's obv all plastic but the look of it fixes that suspicion immediately. Good product!

Reviews.Title: wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Joanie
Reviews.Content: for the money we spent it is fabulous. got 3 of them to cover all the hidy holes around the house.. batteries last forever even in thisfreezing weather.. totally real looking.

Reviews.Title: It's what it claims it is....
Reviews.Author: Sheldon
Reviews.Content: There's not to much detail with this product...  It has a nice solid mount that you can orientate in several different ways.  Looks rather realistic, and has kept the neighbors off of my property.  The flashing light is a real deterrent as well.  I would recommend this for anyone who can scare away their harassers without the use of a real camera.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: dlshea84
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery and works just fine for a dummy camera.  Mounts very easily  and hopefully the batteries will keep the light blinking for several months.. Another added security feature that will deter those thieves.

Reviews.Title: Looks real, good details in housing, (don't bother using battery for red LED)
Reviews.Author: R Gibbons
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these last year, after my car and garage were "egged" twice.  It looks real from the street.  I've since purchased 6 real security cameras to cover all the doors and most windows of the house,  this "fake" one blends in nicely, it is built sturdy.  I've now purchased a second one of these "fake" cameras, to appear as if my entire property is covered by cameras (so someone doesn't try to sneak up from a blind direction to destroy the real camera).It is a little bigger than my real cameras, but that is a benefit since you want it to be seen.  I don't bother putting a battery in to light the LED,  since my real cameras don't have a recording LED lit.Update:  While installing the 2nd camera, the bracket broke.  Mostly my fault, since I didn't loosen the knob completely that allows the camera to swivel and aim,  but it didn't take much pressure to break the plastic.  Be sure to completely loosen the knob before turning the camera.

Reviews.Title: All the security, none of the liability!
Reviews.Author: Atlas Tree Service, Inc.
Reviews.Content: After a couple of break-ins, our company considered security cameras (expensive, and worth stealing on their own), guard dogs (a great idea, but only as long as they eat what they catch; otherwise, it's lawsuit time), and fake equipment - which seems to have solved the problem very cost-effectively.Personally, I still think the dogs would have been a much greater deterrent, but this gives us almost as much protection, and the cost savings is more than appreciated.A great product, a great price, and they look absolutely real!

Reviews.Title: DOES THE JOB WITH A LITTLE HELP
Reviews.Author: truestar "a"
Reviews.Content: Ok. This was cheap so the fact that there are no mounting screws I guess I can forgive. You need three.  The head rotates all over the place on one and not the other, so I think some have a looser fit. If you position it pointing where you want it, it still works ok.  We also took a mat knife and cut out the local (oops!) security company logo as a stencil and spray painted it on. We did coat it with clear coat as it's plastic silver colored and we put a logo on it. From far away/up high enough It will fool anybody. NOW it looks REAL. Remember burgulars are smart enough to know the local companies. The logos on their webpages you can  copy easily. There are online sticker companies that you can make you own for less than 4.00, use your local logo (oops! change one thing and you are ok using their design) and have it look a lot more real. For the money, three mounting screws and a little bit of creative effort, it is a good deterrent.

Reviews.Title: fake dummy camera
Reviews.Author: mr.d
Reviews.Content: works very well looks real ,good price I may get more, testing battery life sofar 3 weeks and still blinking

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: D.C.S.
Reviews.Content: I'm glad i picked this security camera,it looks good, works good. I don't think to many people would know its not the real thing. Any more you don't know where cameras are, you could be out in the woods and be on camera. Thanks D.C.S.

Reviews.Title: Looks great, the flashing light adds authenticity
Reviews.Author: Harleyjohn
Reviews.Content: Looks good and give me the confidence that prowlers will give pause when within its range/area.  Would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: fit the bill
Reviews.Author: Robert Inverso
Reviews.Content: a client of mine has had a problem with vandals in her complex she owns. so rather than the expense of a real system she chose this alternative. i installed four for her. they look real from a distance. mounted them high so they can't be tampered with or checked out closely. but unlike the description, these are not real camera's with no guts in them. they are a cheap plastic dummy camera. the client is pleased with the item and the price.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Michael Heryla
Reviews.Content: Worked out fine.  And you can't beat the price.  Bought one for several members of the family.  Highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: LOVE this!
Reviews.Author: Tonya McMahan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera because people kept stealing valuables from our booth...Looks VERY real, especially with the flashing light and dummy wire.  The store owners were very impressed!!

Reviews.Title: Good alternative to more expensive systems
Reviews.Author: Ron Texas
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  Looks like the real thing available in local stores.  Others complained about short battery life but I used lithium battery for longer life. Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It's exactly what I wanted.  Looks good and easy to install.  I found the plastic to be a bit fragile.

Reviews.Title: Works as it should.
Reviews.Author: Jack Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Looks very real and neighbors have asked why we got video security.  Can't ask for more then that without a real unit.

Reviews.Title: Believable fake video camera
Reviews.Author: Darkwave Fan
Reviews.Content: These fake / dummy video cameras are very realistic.  I put up a bunch of them around, to augment the hidden video cameras around my home. I wanted a visible camera presence, to deter thieves.  I placed these high up where they could be easily seen, and where they would not be subject to close examination.

Reviews.Title: good buy!
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: People who don't know that it's not real can't tell the difference.  I use them to augment my real security camera's around the compound where the security camera's are not noticeable to intruders. Battery for the red blinking light lasts 3-4 months - don't mount where it is a PITA to change the battery.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Look-A-Like!
Reviews.Author: Jim Bill Paul
Reviews.Content: We have two real camera's and these look just like them.  Delivery was fast and the little red blinking lite is great!  Reasonably priced!

Reviews.Title: Looks Very Authentic
Reviews.Author: Anonymous Business Owner
Reviews.Content: So authentic that we might even forget it's a fake!  We have security cameras on our property, but needed more for a larger presence.  These did the trick.

Reviews.Title: looks real
Reviews.Author: Mr Richardson
Reviews.Content: looks real,seems to have a motion sensor it in.it starts to blink when something crosses its line of sight...but i dont know for sure there was no manual or instruction booklet with it

Reviews.Title: Very deceiving..for theives...
Reviews.Author: Scott C Jones "HenryJonesJr"
Reviews.Content: Not being an expert thief, I can't say how realistic this would look upon close inspection to someone who knows, but to me it looked legit.  It is plastic, so that would be the givaway if someone touched it or looked too closely.  Mounted it on the top of my garage and it looks very real.  Battery lasted for a few months.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing!
Reviews.Author: Joe Donaldson
Reviews.Content: These cameras look just like a more expensive functioning camera - complete with a blinking red light. The name of the game in security is to raise enough doubt on the part of the thief to look for an easier target. These cameras will do the trick.

Reviews.Title: outdoor camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Malcolm
Reviews.Content: recieved  item as listed seems to be working well. would reorder from this vendor again!! I still dont think you should tell me how many words to write???

Reviews.Title: Good deterrent
Reviews.Author: Grant
Reviews.Content: Use one on our home and vacation home. Very real looking and much cheaper than a real security camera and recorder

Reviews.Title: Very Realistic
Reviews.Author: jim macneill
Reviews.Content: We live in a small, upscale gated community. I wanted something that looked realistic and classy at the same time.  These did the job.  I decided not to activate the flashing red light...seemed less realistic.  I did remove the back plate and replaced the black "wire" which was just a rubber tube.  Used a metallic looking coaxil cable which definitely made it look more realistic. Definitely a good value at $9.99 each.

Reviews.Title: Just what we were looking for.
Reviews.Author: Cheryl J. Bullis
Reviews.Content: Received right on time and they look like they will work perfectly for what we want to use them for.

Reviews.Title: Finally Received It..................
Reviews.Author: Gail Andrews
Reviews.Content: The item was shipped from Hong Kong and took a VERY LONG TIME to arrive.  It looks very real but is extremely light weight plastic.  I'm concerned about it possibly breaking when or if we are able to attach it to the house (brick wall).  As long as it doesn't break while installing it looks believable enough to work.  I will update once we have installed them.  We are hoping to find something that we are able to attach it to other than the wall.

Reviews.Title: fooled me
Reviews.Author: C H HUNT "broomstick"
Reviews.Content: just what I needed to prevent my neighbors letting their dogs use my lawn for a bathroom while being walked for that purpose

Reviews.Title: Great realistic looking dummy camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Kovac
Reviews.Content: I just purchase two of those and took one of them a part. Very simple and easy to fix if something goes wrong with it. Only one  $0.69 3V LED in side, conected to batery. I would recomend it to everyone who is looking for dummy camera. Other stores will sell these for double price yet not as realistic looking. Vlad K

Reviews.Title: Looks real to me, will get another one soon
Reviews.Author: Ed Hendrickson Jr. "ace"
Reviews.Content: It looks real, and I like the constant flashing red LED, it gets your attention in the dark, otherwise you might miss it. I put mine up a few months ago and the LED is still flashing. I will order more.  It was easy to install, two dryywall screws hold mine in place on the stucco on one corner of the house.Update: 2/11/2013 I recieved this OUTDOOR FAKE / DUMMY SECURITY CAMERA w/ Blinking Light (Silver) on Oct 29, 2012 and installed it on Dec 3, 2012 and just today replaced the 2 AA Energizer batteries Feb 11, 2013. Replaced again with 2 energizer AA alkaline batteries.  The red LED flashes once a second 24 hours a day and it is visible in the daytime and very visible at night.  The red LED started to get dim about 3 weeks ago and was hard to see, so figure the batteries will need to be replaced 3 times a year. Maybe lithium AA batteries would last longer? The battery compartment is easy to get to, it is on top of the unit. You slide off the cover and pop open the lid. I used a step ladder so I could see which way the batteries went.

Reviews.Title: look so real!
Reviews.Author: Armando Martinez
Reviews.Content: I am really happy w/my purchase look so nice the battery last a lot and the installation was easy and fast .

Reviews.Title: Looks pretty real
Reviews.Author: Devi Jameson
Reviews.Content: For the price this is an excellent looking camera!  I am concerned that I will have to replace the batteries regularly which requires a ladder etc.  Our whole neighborhood is interested in installing these.

Reviews.Title: looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Diane Keck-Katona "Diane Keck-Katona"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, have it in a high place and the LED light is still very visible from the street

Reviews.Title: Are these cameras real or fake.
Reviews.Author: Travis J. Missey
Reviews.Content: Purchased these for a friend to give the illusion of a DVR system since they did not have the money to run a full system but had an issue with a break in.  If I wouldn't have installed them I would think they were real and recording.  Had an issue with one DOA but thanks to Amazons great service I had a new one in a day and returned the other with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Very Realistic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "The Heck Household"
Reviews.Content: We bought two for each corner of the house.  They are serving their purpose. Keeping the wack-a-doodle neighbor out of our yard. I would recommend this system as a deterent. Very realistic look, especially with the blinking red light.

Reviews.Title: Gets's the job done
Reviews.Author: R. Enrique Sanchez Montiel
Reviews.Content: i really was a little skeptical about this cameras specially when i need it three, as soon as i received them i realized that these were going to be very helpfull in my wife's beauty shop in order to fool some thieves. I did really liked the flashing red light i just need to know how much will the batteries last. will keep you posted.

Reviews.Title: looks good, very obvious at night!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Smith
Reviews.Content: Reasonably well built (mostly plastic) and realistic looking.Easy to install and adjust, visible at night (about 100 ft) while driving by on the street.Friends commented about the blinking lights without being told I had installed anything.Not sure about battery life, they have only been up a couple of weeks, but I used the high-end Li-ion batteries.I'm sure these will serve as a good deterrent for potential theives.

Reviews.Title: It's fake, but the screws are fake too
Reviews.Author: Securityguy
Reviews.Content: Ok this thing is flimsy, then again, it's also 10 bucks.  It looks ok from a distance.  Passable.  Blinking red light can be seen from the road, maybe even further at night.  My issue is even the screws are fake.  Bent one and broke another.  Needed to use my own.  Never seen fake screws before.

Reviews.Title: great fake
Reviews.Author: plumb50
Reviews.Content: This is a great fake Camera. nobody can tell that they are not the real thing. If you want some added security around the house (like our beach house)This is the product with a very low cost. Three little screw and they are done.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: La Reya "La Reya"
Reviews.Content: Good replica, seems real. However, I broke by trying to move it around without loosen the bolt first. My fault, but I fixed it.

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This product met my expectations perfectly.  It was easy to install, and looks real.  I also purchased a yard sign to go with it.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Get your money's worth
Reviews.Author: kouaka
Reviews.Content: The camera looks very real, considering the price. you can adjust the angle and direction very easily, so it covers the area you need. With 4 or 5 cameras, you can create the impression that your whole house and property is under camera surveillance. Perfect product

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Patricia Berg
Reviews.Content: We love this. We got it to add to our existing security lights when 2 men were observed crouched by our truck.  It looks so authentic.  Very nice.  I would order it again.

Reviews.Title: It WORKS !
Reviews.Author: Deek
Reviews.Content: Since installing the camera along with some window stickers, I no longer have any visitors !  Either wanted or unwanted !

Reviews.Title: Seems good to me
Reviews.Author: T. Beard
Reviews.Content: Pretty good fake camera, no way to tell if people are fooled but a good investment if you ask me

Reviews.Title: OK Could look more real
Reviews.Author: W. Gerken
Reviews.Content: Looks ok, except for printing printed on outside: "CCTV Camera" Might as well say "THIS IS REAL", which of course would only comunicate that it's fake. Except for the printing the camera's realistic looking. Probably better than nothing.

Reviews.Title: Looks Very Good
Reviews.Author: William R. High "sky hog"
Reviews.Content: Actually I purchased this item for my sister-in-law's house after she was burglarized. I installed motion sensing lights as well. Most burglars are pretty stupid and if they think there is any chance they will be caught they will avoid that house. Nothing is guaranteed, but if it keep one bad guy away it is worth every cent.  If you cannot afford a high dollar security system or it is not within your budget, this inexpensive fake camera may be a good way to deter mischievous persons. I also purchased a sign stating the property is under video surveillance.

Reviews.Title: Looks great and should serve the purpose!
Reviews.Author: fonewiz
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for. Camera is a great deal and it looks pretty darn real to me. Red LED can be seen from 3 houses over and across the street.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: For the cost the cameras look real enough and I already know they will work because we have used them before with satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: Blinking camera
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: The camera does exactly what it is supposed to do.  It has a red blinking light and looks like a real camera.  The only fault we can find is that we wish it would turn off during the day and come on only at night.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT, can be made BETTER
Reviews.Author: Maximilian
Reviews.Content: This fake security camera is very lightweight, seems well-constructed, and definitely looks like a real surveillance camera if you don't get too close to it.  The blinking red light is powered by two AA batteries, is visible from across the street, and adds to the camera's realistic appearance.  I have no way of knowing how long the batteries will last; hopefully, they will not drain too quickly, for if they do, it would be a nuisance to keep changing them too often.  Though this product is very good and its price is reasonable, there is one drawback:  The video cable, which is approximately 9 inches long, has a loose end that can be hidden in the hole provided in the back of the bracket attachment.  However, any curious visitor who is tall enough can easily yank on the cable to see if the camera is real or fake.  The manufacturer can improve this product simply by securing both ends of the video cable, not just one, i.e., the loose end facing the house should be tightly secured in the back of the mounting bracket to give the appearance that the cable leads directly to the interior of the building.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't look better
Reviews.Author: G. Miller
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with my fake camera. It couldn't look more real. Red flashin' lite is real visible day or nite. Don't think I'll be havin" people cuttin' through my yard anymore leavin' the gate open. We were worried about the dog gettin' out. I have a beware of dog sign on the fence next to the gate. Guess that didn't work because the dog is in the house a lot. I also made a large sign of the sticker that came with the camera and laminated it. That sign is under the beware of dog sign. I would Highly Recommend this to a friend!

Reviews.Title: Very Real
Reviews.Author: Charles F
Reviews.Content: I strategically placed these "cameras" at my home.  They were easy to set up and look real.  I think criminals would not take the chance, and would stay away.  They arrived on time and had been carefully packaged.  The silver color stands out slightly without being obvious.  Good deterrant.

Reviews.Title: Works Great, Looks Real
Reviews.Author: Reddog
Reviews.Content: Love this product and the price.  We ordered 2 for our place.  We also ordered two video surveillance signs.  The cameras look real; we placed them on our roof line looking down.  They blink and the batteries are still working after three months.  I recommend these cameras and would buy more if I need them.  Quick shipping also and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great item you can tweak to your liking.
Reviews.Author: Securon55
Reviews.Content: I purchased several different cameras to check out for use with my property MGT company. The cameras work great for me. I bought these in conjunction with some small domes and other types of dummy cams to see what works best. This camera BY FAR got the most attention and when placed correctly looks more real than the real ones !One thing I need to point out is ,,, a lot of comments about the blinking LED.Some older model security systems do have " active indicator" lights on cameras but new C-Systems don't.Bottom line is , don't complain about the flashing red LED being too bright. We have an older system in several of our buildings and to match up the LED brightness we just pop in used batteries and the glow is lower and more indicative of an older 'real' system.Either way , great real looking product that you can customize as to whether you want the light or not.One other thing , I have real cameras with the same plastic housing. Does anyone really think they make all metal security cams anymore ? Except for something VERY expensive ?Great product if you make it do what you want it to.

Reviews.Title: Looks real to me.
Reviews.Author: chris w
Reviews.Content: It's very light weight, which for me is a good thing because I was able to secure it with one screw into the stucco. The weight has nothing to do with whether it looks real or not. It does. There is some debate on the red blinking light. Some reviewers think it makes the camera look more fake, which I tend to agree, but my house is tucked away so the blinking light isn't noticeable unless you are standing at the front gate. This also comes with a yellow "CCTV" sticker that you can put in your window. Items takes several weeks to arrive because it is shipped from China. Overall, this is definitely worth $10.

Reviews.Title: Good product....worth the additional peace of mind!
Reviews.Author: R. Deonarine
Reviews.Content: This camera arrived quickly and I examined it thoroughly...at a mere few feet away you absolutely cannot tell this is fake. I studied its composition against the real thing in the store (which cost around $100) and the face is made up EXACTLY the same. The sticker is a neat addition, especially if the camera is positioned out of plain sight.Sometimes I work late and with the exception of my dusk-to-dawn garage light, the house is enveloped in darkness...the additional peace of mind that I get from this device as it blinks red in the dark is well worth the investment.Would definitely recommend if your security situation is circumstantial.

Reviews.Title: Fair Price for a good product
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased with the product. It does what it is supposed to do.I would not have the LED being as bright as it is but this is a minor quibble

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: online shopper
Reviews.Content: I like this product. I totally recommend it. The blinking light makes it look real.The size is right. Its easy to put batteries and there is no need to assemble.It does what its supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: Pleased!
Reviews.Author: S. Wilson "rapidfuse"
Reviews.Content: I received this in the way faster than I had expected. I did exactly what it said to do and it was up and running. The only issue I have so far is, it doesn't do well in the dark.. and it is not weather proof, but thankfully where I wanted it is directly under an air conditioner, I will move it for winter inside the window.

Reviews.Title: Not bad.
Reviews.Author: Pauly Bananas
Reviews.Content: Likes: It looks real and acts as a deterent.Dislikes: You have to unscrew a cover to turn it off (even though you probably wouldn't want to) and the little red light flashed when I put the batteries in but then it stopped. But when I waved my hand in front of it, it turned on again. Not sure if there is a motion sensor built in? I didn't think there was. I have it set up on the corner of the house pointing at the driveway. I entered the driveway with my car and it started flashing.

Reviews.Title: We'll See
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: I think these are nice but you have to put high thus they will be aware the are fake,. I have jimmy rigged a small antenna thus they noow like they can be remote controlled and recorded and gives a more realistic look,  But I* rated only a 4 as unsure about fooling anyone, Tried these once at a store of mine and did not work, So will see with the blinking light how good they are, Ayt least it is somthing and should do the job well, Thank you,m No I am not dissatisfied at all,

Reviews.Title: Flimsy mount broke
Reviews.Author: Cyberdotone
Reviews.Content: It is a nice looking camera, but I had the same experience as another reviewer. The knob on the mount that allows you to loosen the tension, so you can aim the camera properly was jammed. When I tried to move the camera to the right position, the arm immediately under the camera snapped in two. The support arm is definately underdesigned. I wonder if a strong wind would do the same thing to the arm.

Reviews.Title: Two of the Three Dummy Cameras Broke Within 5 Minutes
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these to position around the house.  They look quite realistic and the blinking red light is what sells me on this one over the other VideoSecu ones available on Amazon for about the same price.The trouble is that two of the three cameras I ordered broke during installation.  The twisty plastic piece on the mount that allows you to loosen the tension on the arm so that you can aim the camera properly was jammed, so I had to try and force the camera to the right position, and it busted the arm immediately under the camera.  Very flimsy plastic.The third camera that I ordered worked PERFECTLY.  It was easy to mount and aim the camera, and it looks quite realistic.

Reviews.Title: good value/looks sooooo real
Reviews.Author: Smile!!
Reviews.Content: easy to install. Looks very real. No one knew it was a fake camera. The trick I guess is to not tell everyone it's fake. I hung mine pretty high so no one could reach it and it's under a covered roof to protect from the sun and weather. I started looking at store outdoor cameras now, this one is identical to real ones I've seen. I'm very glad I bought this.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: phillips
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews I purchased 2 cameras, 1 for the front and 1 for the back door.  they did not go up as easily as i thought they would but with some work you can do it.  My son wondered if all the glowing reports were just positive comments from chinese assembly workers asked to rate the product so that sales would be increased.Sounds paranoid but you never know.  Anyway they are both up and blinking and have been doing so for the past month without a break in  so I bought 2 more for my mothers house.

Reviews.Title: Home handy man
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Marcoux "Tom"
Reviews.Content: Price was right, easy install, looks realistic.  It's been operating for several weeks now and regular batteries are working just fine.  Red blinking light looks like the real McCoy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the price!
Reviews.Author: Fleur
Reviews.Content: I have 4 of these scattered around the corners of the house and shop area. I've had them for about 2 years now and they haven't stopped blinking yet! You have to change the 2 AA batteries every 3 months like clock work. They are easy to change. Just make sure you put the camera in a place that you can reach easily a ladder. Everyone that sees them asks me about my security video system. I feel guilty lying to them, but that is the price for security! :-)

Reviews.Title: Dummy Cam
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: This camera looks very real and will fool almost anyone as long as you don't have the red blinking light on.Pros:-looks real-not too hard to set up-Sturdy build construction even though its plastic-Easy to angle the camera where you want itCons:-The blinking red light.  The light is way too bright. I would recommend to not put batteries in it. Anyways most of the real cameras that I see don't have blinking red light which is super bright.-Instructions, I wished it came with instructions, In the box is the camera and the mounting screws and that's it.  Even thought it was not too hard to figure out, it would be helpful to have some sort of instructions in the box.Overall I gave this camera a 4 out of 5 stars because of the red blinking light. But as long as you don't put batteries in it, this is a solid product especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Silver security camera
Reviews.Author: C. Phelps
Reviews.Content: My husband was impressed with the size, easy installation and flexibility of camera, flasing light indicating recording, and good pricing. He wants 2 more for the shed area.

Reviews.Title: looks genuine but limited arm movement
Reviews.Author: arashbabaki
Reviews.Content: It defintely looks real and a good price but I was unable to position it well due to limited movement and the angle of the camera. If you are planning to attach it to the ceiling you might get into the same problem.

Reviews.Title: outside video cam
Reviews.Author: Judy O
Reviews.Content: Great product! The blinking red light can be seen quite well at night. Looks great and authentic. Seems to be acting as a great deterrant on our building. Very reasonably priced, also.

Reviews.Title: Could use and on/off switch, but it's realistic
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: After our home was vandalized twice, we decided to purchase one of these fake security cameras and place it in a window.  The camera looks realistic enough, although I'm pretty sure most real cameras don't blink such a bright "look at me" red light.  We ended up putting a square piece of black electrical tape directly over the lens in front of the red LED.  This resulted in a more subtle, "halo" of red light which I think is more realistic.We also have no need to run this during daylight hours, so removing the batteries is kind of a pain - an on/off switch would be appreciated, a dusk/dawn sensor would be awesome.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: VRT
Reviews.Content: This is a good product, Our backshed was broken into a couple months ago so we decided we needed a something to keep other burglars away.  Since we live in a semi secluded area we dont get many visitors but people can get a good look at the house by just driving by. These cameras come with a red light that blinks (very bright) and that anyone passing by can clearly see. I bought 4 of these cameras, 2 for each side of the house and 1 for the front and 1 for the back porch and they work great!Easy to install and put together, they look very real and are pretty durable. I was a little concerned because of  how light weight they were and wondered if they would hold up in a storm or strong wind. We had some pretty nasty weather last week and they we all still standing and in great shape.The only bad thing is that you will need to buy lithium Ion Batteries and they only last about a month and you will have to change them out if you want the (very bright) red light to blink.I would recommend this product!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: CP30 "CP30"
Reviews.Content: Purchased in March 2012.  I had kids using my back-yard as a cut through to the next street.  I bought one of these cameras and placed it on the high side of my house and it looks great.  Looks real to me!  The product arrived on time, packaged well, complete with screws and plugs.  Took 5 minutes to put up.  It's fully adjustable so you can angle the camera the way you want it.  the light is still blinking.  Altough the product is plastic (good quality) it does look metal.  I haven't seen any kids cut through my yard since it went up!  oh, it comes with a window sticker too.Cheap price, working product, seems to have done the job and scared off those pesky kids!  :o)

Reviews.Title: Real Fake Cameras
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: Great concept, increased the intimidation factor by 200%. Try these with your real security system, great decor and keeps everyone on there toes.I use them in plain view at all of my entertainment rental locations.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Camera is exactly what I needed.  It gives the appearance of a working camera due to the blinking light.  Unit was installed 04/06/2012 and the light is still blinking today.  In addition to the camera, I installed an antenna and solar security light above the camera which enhances the camera's perceived operation.  Good product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Realistic & Reasonable Fake  Camera
Reviews.Author: Coolcat
Reviews.Content: I ordered few of these cameras, we have a monitored alarm system, but I wanted some cameras for added security.  This may sound odd to some, but I kept having series of dreams of what looks worse than the Great Depression  people appeared desperate,and dangerous. I felt frightened...my husband thinks you'll need more than a fake camera, if that happens! :)  The cameras arrived swiftly my husband was good enough to install all of the cameras in less than 15 minutes using his electric screwdriver. We were impressed with the cameras because of the color and style of the camera. The camera look real from a distance.  If you want the blinking light feature put the batteries in, and  if you do not want the blinking light, just leave the batteries out. My one advice is to work out the placement of the cameras, so it  look like a pro strategically placed them.

Reviews.Title: fake camera
Reviews.Author: al
Reviews.Content: I would order again. The price was dirt cheap.  Only thing I don't like is the huge red blinking light in the daytime.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY WITH AMAZON AND THIS VENDOR
Reviews.Author: Linda B. Cunningham
Reviews.Content: WELL WORTH EVERY PENNY EVEN HAS CABLE DANGLING FROM IT WORKS LIKE WE WANTED IT TO--MAY BUY MORE IN THE FUTURE

Reviews.Title: Wow, a really nice item
Reviews.Author: Robby Robinson "Globetrotter"
Reviews.Content: After several break ins where I live, I installed this fake camera and have had no problems since.  The batteries last about two months, and the flashing led is very bright.  It looks just like two other real cameras that we have installed that are web commected.  It was up and running in just a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: looks like a camera
Reviews.Author: spec this
Reviews.Content: The biggest draw-back seems to be the flimsy mount. I have not had it long enough to judge battery life and aging; but decided to give it the benefit of the doubt, and think a retrofit bracket would be easy to fashion. Should be easy enough to screw the camera onto an L bracket with a spacer perhaps; if the thin back plate breaks. It is big enough to see easy, and I think will stop most kids anyway, from testing its limits. Lightweight and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: placebo for a little peace of mind
Reviews.Author: NYC guy
Reviews.Content: Will fool the average person but won't do the trick for a career criminal, happy with the product, got one of my bikes stolen from my parking garage before and I believe this dummy will do the trick

Reviews.Title: Time will tell
Reviews.Author: James H
Reviews.Content: "Like others have said, they do look real. Be careful to loosen the screw before you try to move the camera up and down. I broke one....not the sellers fault....my stupidity! I will be interested to see how long the batteries last...seems to blink every 2 seconds. "

Reviews.Title: Looks good/no sticker
Reviews.Author: Oliver
Reviews.Content: These cameras look great mounted.  The red blinking light is bright.  None of these I ordered came with the security sticker that is advertised.

Reviews.Title: What a great copy of the real thing!
Reviews.Author: Magnutech
Reviews.Content: Very light plastic and has a black tube to make it look like it has a coax cable running into the wall.  The red light flashes every second or so, be sure to put it in a spot that is not going to bother anyone.  Even up close this looks real, no way for anyone to know unless you told them!On a side note, remember that the batteries need to go on top of this device, so don't slam it all the way to the ceiling when you install it, you'll pay for that decision later!  :-)

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Victor Hernandez "Victor"
Reviews.Content: Very good. have it on my front porch. VERY realistic. Flashes light continuously. buy it for security reasons. People will think twice before invading, they may think there are more of them.

Reviews.Title: it'll fool ya
Reviews.Author: a customer
Reviews.Content: I really like this security camera quite a bit.  I am very impressed.  It looks very real to me.  I plan to get more just like it.  I haven't decided whether or not I'll put up the yellow sign yet.  It looks really nice as well.I would recommend this product to those I care about.

Reviews.Title: Missing CCTV sticker
Reviews.Author: cathy lambert
Reviews.Content: Did not receive the CCTV sticker as show on related images. Better than expected quality. Installed in minutes. Red blinking lights shines bright even in daylight.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: The product works as described, what can be said about a dummy camera, however I had one small concern when it arrived and the support to resolve the issue was excellent.  When shopping for future items I will look at this seller first.

Reviews.Title: If it makes the thief think it really works...
Reviews.Author: jbson
Reviews.Content: I have an alarm system and it works great...but these could really be a game changer...If they make the burglar/thief reconsider my house and move to the next...goal complete...No blinking light like it says but still happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake/Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: CHUNG BOONE
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping.  Product is larger than I thought.  If you are looking for a Fake Camera then this is it.  Looks good and does the trick.  It is made of plastic, so a little gentle handling is required.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: I put these cameras up and they look so real!!! I read other reviews that they are not happy with them and cheap plastic etc... I personally don't know what they are talking about!(Maybe they got a bad batch? Who knows?) These cameras are plastic but not cheap plastic, furthermore they are so real looking I am fooling many people with them! Even my own family! So if you want inexpensive dummy cameras these are it! Also you can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: H. Riedel "hizdiddy"
Reviews.Content: This item looks real and was easy to install.  Compared it to a real camera and it operates and blinks like it.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: shawna
Reviews.Content: I had my car broken into and just this alone has kept everyone away!  Great investment! Now I am currently looking into buying 1 for the back yard too!  :D

Reviews.Title: Looks real enough but the flashing light is too bright
Reviews.Author: Paul Q
Reviews.Content: I think the key is to mount this out of reach. If it is at least that high off the ground, it's going to look real enough. It is all plastic and if you touch it, it will give it away. The flashing red light is at the base of the "lens" area. Unfortunately, it seems a lot brighter than it should be and the flash cycle keeps the light on too long (slow flash). That's just my personal opinion. A quicker, duller flash would be best.For the money, this is a decent buy. I think it will fool more people than not. As for the longevity, I can't say. Ask me in a year. :)

Reviews.Title: looks real!
Reviews.Author: Michael V. Mai
Reviews.Content: Installed this on the roof of my shed. It looks real! It's inexpensive but makes a big impact! Just two things to keep in mind when receiving this item.1. Size is bigger than it looks. When I received this, first thing in my mind was, whoa this is big. Like more for a business.2. The red light slowly blinks and holds for about two seconds on and off. Its not really a "flickering" light but its still bright and can be seen in day and night time.

Reviews.Title: clever
Reviews.Author: J. Chau "amateur amazonian :p"
Reviews.Content: these actually help. they have battery power blinking lights on them so its very convincing, especially at night bc you can see it blinking.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo
Reviews.Content: Works well , I use rechargeable power cell and it works for 3 moths. very good to use it at home

Reviews.Title: Bad quility
Reviews.Author: Leo Liu
Reviews.Content: It worked fine for two weeks, now the red light blinks like crazy (more that 70times per minutes). Thief will laugh at this fake camera .Leave a feedback to the company and didn't get an answer yet.

Reviews.Title: Keeps trashy, vandalizing neighbors from hell out of our yard and stops them from messing with our property!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Adams
Reviews.Content: I bought this fake camera (several actually) for different reasons than most and I wanted to share my story: We treated our next door neighbors like kings & queens for years since they seemed to be somewhat down on their luck. We gave them money, clothes, food from our cupboards, games & toys for their children and even rides to and back from football practice for one of their kids. We became so close that at one point our neighbors were calling my Fiancé' "Aunt" if that tells you anything. Well after several years of giving and giving we started to notice that we got nothing in return. Not that we were expecting anything but after 3 years you start to feel used.This neighbor next door (known as Heather E.) took advantage of us as well as several other neighbors and simply used us and took all she could get.
