There are too many details to share but you should know that Heather has a new best friend every 4 months and is often fighting with someone for various reason (mostly in her head).Shortly after we weaned ourselves of this one-sided relationship we saw that Heather E. and family began just opening their back door (that faced our house) and instead of putting their trash in the garbage can, they simply tossed it outside and let it land where it may. After a year+ of dealing with this "trash house" we were forced to contact the City of Gresham Code Enforcement here in Oregon. Code Enforcement quickly hopped on it and delivered an ultimatum to Heather E. and family: Clean things up or be fined. That night we saw Heather E., her best friend of the moment and one of her sons quickly cleanining up the refuse at 8:30pm at night!What we didn't know was that for the past year Heather E. and family were throwing bags of trash into their shed outdoors and it had accumulated so much that it was overflowing inside! 2 days after Heather E. was forced to clean things up, I went outside and noticed that there was a large, dead possum laying on the path to my shed. This possum had clearly been dead for months and the only way that it made its way to my path was that is was placed there by someone. My Fiancé and I quickly surmised that this possum had gotten into Heather E.'s shed and became trapped inside where it died. As retribution for contacting Code Enforcement, our wonderful neighbors placed the possum on our property. I quickly picked up the possum and threw it back into Heather E.'s shed (with a glove mind you) and never heard about it again.This is where the fake camera comes in: Rather than buy a gun or 2, along with a 6-foot fence with barbed wire or take some kind of militant stand here, I decided on a different approach. I had no idea what Heather E. and family might do next to escalate things so a fake camera was the PERFECT solution. Once installed, Heather E. instantly went on Facebook complaining about my cameras and even posted that they were "illegal" and "he doesn't have permission to film my house!" Clearly Heather E. doesn't know the law. :)In a nutshell these cameras worked like a miracle. They fooled our neighbors into thinking that they were being filmed at all times and basically it kept them from damaging our property (or worse). An unexpected bonus is that Heather E. and family never come out on that side of the house. Since they think they are on camera 24 hours a day, they choose to smoke on the other side of their house and rarely make an appearance. Even better, Heather E. is so paranoid that she put up cheap towels over the windows and doors so my cameras couldn't see in. LOL! Wonderful. Quick lesson:  The paranoid don't like having cameras pointed at them.These cameras look real (at least to the low-life people next door) and it keeps them honest and away from our house. Sure, no one likes fighting with neighbors and we really have 0 contact with them which is great, but these cameras add an extra layer of protection. If Heather E. wants to mess with our house or vandalize things, she thinks she'll be on camera. This couldn't have worked better for a non-violent, passive solution to our neighbors from hell.We have our neighbors trained and life is good again.

Reviews.Title: good idea
Reviews.Author: Rod Dietrich "Rod"
Reviews.Content: Purchased, and less then a month later, we had a armed robbery of our house, and these didn't even slow them down, and us or the sheriff can't figure out why

Reviews.Title: Fake camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Collett
Reviews.Content: Light blinks unlike a real camera.  Light quit working after a month, wouldn't recommend.  Bought a real camera system, go ahead and spend the money

Reviews.Title: Power hungry
Reviews.Author: L. Schrader
Reviews.Content: This camera uses AA batteries in less then two weeks, it looks great, but uses batteries too fast to be mounted anyplace up high

Reviews.Title: Awful! Looks fake from a mile away! Plastic JUNK!
Reviews.Author: elizabeth c.
Reviews.Content: Plastic junk...the reviews who say this looks real & say this piece of plastic junk would "deter" someone, ha...only if your burglar is blind and/or has no ability to notice its CLEARLY PLASTIC! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. Get a ZITRADES brand...I bought the white outdoor solar cam & it actually blends in & looks similar to my REAL Lorex security cameras...after I easily piled the cheap silver letters of the side that said ZITRADES. But save your money...this isn't worth 2 cents & would definitely give your trespassers a good laugh.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Jeholbro "Techy"
Reviews.Content: Be careful with the install it is plastic.  Put it up high enough so it won't be inspected too closely.  Don't open it up and put batteries in it.  They won't last long and the flashing lite looks fake.  Looks pretty good just as is.  For the price, you can't beat it....

Reviews.Title: not amused
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: did not realize it was as large as it was. could not put it outside the house because of its size. so it is a decoration in the garage

Reviews.Title: outdoor facke dummy security camerera with blinking light
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: unfortunately I was not in when it arrive and someone stole if from my door step!!!!  What to do? ,  luck of the draw I guess.!!!Pady J Andrews

Reviews.Title: poorr
Reviews.Author: Cynthia James
Reviews.Content: poor design, these things are huge, and very cheaply made, would not recommend them to anyone, they look very fake.

Reviews.Title: POS
Reviews.Author: Kevin E.
Reviews.Content: Immediately broke on the 'hinge'. No thanks. I bought it on the cheap for an add on item, wouldn't make that mistake again.

Reviews.Title: Looks really fake
Reviews.Author: Judy Barnes
Reviews.Content: Too hard to install and looks clumsy and fake. It looks dated and old compared to whats on the market now.

Reviews.Title: Looks real, but is fragile and hard to put up
Reviews.Author: Zachary M.
Reviews.Content: I like it, but this broke a week after I got it, and the stupid red light doesn't turn off until you take the batteries out.

Reviews.Title: Bought 3 and none of the lights blinked
Reviews.Author: AmazonLover3
Reviews.Content: I bought three and none of the lights worked. They blinked 15 times and then stopped. All three did the same thing. Waste of money...

Reviews.Title: an easy sell
Reviews.Author: TitleWriter
Reviews.Content: It looks like a real security camera, and it's cheap and easy to install.You can add two AA batteries if you want the blinking light to work, but I actually don't use that feature, because1) it seems a lot of real security cameras don't have blinking lights, like at Walmart.  I was even watching a documentary on the Playboy Mansion last week, and they showed a security camera on the property, and that wasn't blinking.2) I don't want a lot of questions about the camera.  I figured my friends and neighbors would probably only notice it if the light was blinking at them, but a thief would be more likely to look for something like that, so the light isn't really necessary.For $10 you can't go wrong.  Buy a few of them.  These would also work well in addition to a real security system if you just wanted a few more cameras for an extra deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Nice dummy camera
Reviews.Author: RMG "ASU OC DEVIL"
Reviews.Content: I have just finished installing 4 of these cameras around my house. Let's cut to the chase. 1) They look real 2) They are decent quality and you could never tell the difference of real vs fake unless you are some kind of security installation expert 3) the price is very reasonable 4) I can imagine that these cameras would deter any idiot burgaler to move on to the next victim once he sees the flashing light- that darn light looks serious!! 5) So let's recap- I paid 40 bucks for 4 cameras that I'm certain will serve as a serious DETERENT to the low life petty thief that might want to rob me...I can (ALMOST) guarantee that the idiot thief will give a serious second thought to robbing me once he looks around and sees 4 blinking red lights trained on him (or her)...very nice device, and nice value...There you go...

Reviews.Title: Good Product at a Good Price
Reviews.Author: Dr. Randall
Reviews.Content: The detail when you look into the lens of this camera is very realistic. The light blinks as it should and can be seen both day and night. It comes with a fake power cord that you can position to look as if it is running into the wall which makes it more convincing. It is of plastic construction but it is silver with realistic camera markings/branding printed on it. Complete with screws, it was easy to mount but care must be taken to snug the screws as you are dealing with plastic here and not metal. The top slides off for easy battery replacement and it has survived blowing rain, wind and freezing sleet. I change the batteries every 6-7 weeks or when they start to dim. I use it in conjunction with warning decals on my windows and doors as well as IR and motion switched outside lighting.

Reviews.Title: Great fakes - easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Smiling Buddha
Reviews.Content: Got these after rising robberies in our area. These look very real and I was able to set up each one in about 10 minutes. Make sure you unscrew the camera from the base before installing (the instructions do not say that). This could have been the reason some of the people broke the camera during installation. Mount them as high as possible and line them correctly with other electrical outlets outdoors (like the patio light) to make them look more authentic.You pop in two AA on the top and the red light starts blinking. These can  deter the unprofessional ones at least.

Reviews.Title: Same as in first original picture
Reviews.Author: Cowboy
Reviews.Content: I bought this to psyche would be parties to stay out of my home and I received the same as in the original picture.  If you order one and it does not have the CCD printed on the sides I would be getting a hold of the seller and asking why you didn't get the product you ordered.  As the photos posted by this reviewer http://www.amazon.com/gp/cdp/member-reviews/AXM7UWNYBTIRD/ref=cm_pdp_rev_title_3?ie=UTF8&sort;_by=MostRecentReview#R1KTXB6HKCII8KIf its plain jane like in the reviewers photos I will be a little leary about keeping it.

Reviews.Title: Looks Like Metal!
Reviews.Author: Evil Portrait
Reviews.Content: This silver camera was a very affordable purchase and it looks just as real as the weatherproof cameras you might see at any business.  Once the red light started blinking, it kept blinking.  However, what camera have you seen that has a blinking red light?  NONE!  So save your batteries.  Theives will recognize someone who doesn't know much about real cameras when they see a blinking light.  The lens cover has a foggy mirror-type glaze over it, making it look very realistic.  Also, it is plastic but appears to be robust metal.  Also, the black "cable" is very believable if you "wire" it the right way into a corner, under an eave, or from the ceiling.  The camera didn't come with the yellow warning sticker.  Overall, this is one of the best and most realistic decoys out there!  I highly recommend it.  In addition to this, I recommend the $5 dummy dome cameras available on Amazon!  VideoSecu Dummy Fake Imitation Security Camera with Flashing Light LED Cost-effective Security CCTV Simulated Dome Camera 3PZ Great buys.

Reviews.Title: outdoor fake security camera
Reviews.Author: sieta
Reviews.Content: we have not put it up yet, but it sure looks like the real thing! im sure it will do the job.

Reviews.Title: Good service, they look real, my maintenance man thinks I'm watching him!
Reviews.Author: NH Animal Lover
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly, and they are pretty lightweight.  But I had my carpenter mount them while he was doing some other work on one of my apartment buildings.  So the tenants didn't know that he wasn't installing a security system because he was doing all sorts of things with wires and siding.  The next day my maintenance man, who cuts the grass, etc, called and asked if I was checking up on him. :-)Because they are up high and have to be accessed with a ladder, I used lithium batteries.I'm happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: R. Rossell "Computer Buddy"
Reviews.Content: Product arrived quickly and was just what I hoped it would be.  It was so real like that I was sure that I was being recorded.

Reviews.Title: Longer Battery Life for this Dummy Camera
Reviews.Author: Dantes_peak 19 "Snake"
Reviews.Content: This is a good dummy camera i put 5 star because of the longer battery life. I bought energizer AA battery and i put it on this camera I order 2 of this. And after like 4 months the battery worned out... For me its a good longer battery life. I had my old dummy camera and the battery is C 3X it last only 2 months. So... the bottom line is i would recommend this dummy camera. I install 2 of this in the backyard in our storage side by side. The blinker red light its visible within a 100 feet. My neighbors ask me that my house is totally secured because i put a lot of surveillance camera. They didnt know theres only one camera is live hehehe...

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: Ron r
Reviews.Content: I knew when I purchased it that it was plastic and fake and no close to the real thing. But after plugging a battery in the light didnt flash. Still kept it knowing its intended to be a decoy but would have preferred that it flashed. Figured it was more of a waste of time to try to return it and wait another several days before receding a replacement.

Reviews.Title: Great fake
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: I bought this to mount above my desk at work as a practical joke. It was one of the best jokes I ever pulled off. Many, many conversations around 'who installed the camera? Why?' Most of my co-workers knew right away that it was a fake (because of the context), but it looks real enough to fool people even on close inspection. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: bugeye
Reviews.Content: the cameras look somewhat believable. they are cheap, one broke within 2 weeks. For fake cameras they are worth the price. The lights blink, so the crooks are now scared.

Reviews.Title: Cheap price, cheap looking.
Reviews.Author: Roger L Miller
Reviews.Content: Claimed to be an actual camera modified to be a dummy, there's no way an actual camera would be made of this cheap, thin plastic. Also, don't bother putting batteries in, the lights that activate are not the IR motion lights,  it a steady flashing single red LED, sure giveaway that it's a fake. And last, there's only 1 wire visible, again a sign that it's fake. For the price, I guess it's an ok start. I've modified mine, adding video wires into the rear of the unit. The unit is completely hollow and the rear plate is easily removable, so there's no problem making any mods you might want.A better fake camera would be an actual real housing, with a motion sensor that activates  the IR lights. Would still be cost-effective and would be much more convincing.

Reviews.Title: Take a risk its fine :-)
Reviews.Author: Richard Reid
Reviews.Content: Purchased 2 of these to go with 4 real cameras I have for my home...Design: design gets 8/10 looks good even though plastic.Functionality: 9/10 does what it is suppose to do, my wife loves the blinking light (i currently have it off though as non of my real cameras have light. In my country ot many persons know if blinking lights mean real or fake..so will put some batteries back in tomorrow.Bang for buck: 8/10 putting side by side with my realk ones they definatly hold there own and i would recommend for such a low price.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor FAKE
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Do not put a battery in it for the blinking red light . . .Real Cameras do not have Blinking lights . . . esp redLooks real though. . .

Reviews.Title: Looks good, but...
Reviews.Author: Lynn L
Reviews.Content: The lens just jangles around every time you move this thing. It isn't attached. Basically, just poor quality, but it will meet my needs of deterring speeders.

Reviews.Title: smile, you're on camera
Reviews.Author: Alvin R. Werchan "just a guy"
Reviews.Content: rigged it so that it looks like a remote wireless camera on my farm gate...little red blinking light is very noticable, especially at nite.Now here's something I can write 20 words about!

Reviews.Title: Too small to hide a Raspberry Pi
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: It is possible but you need a short SD card and to pull out a couple parts.  I wanted to use the RPi camera inside this housing but ended up giving up on making it work cleanly.  I ended up just buying a PVC tube from Home Depot and a couple end caps.

Reviews.Title: It's okay.
Reviews.Author: Circle Cutter Commander
Reviews.Content: It functioned as basically as it should have. No surprises there. They caught the kids putting tamales in my mailbox.Cheap, just as you want it. But remember, they only act as a temporary ward.

Reviews.Title: people think its real
Reviews.Author: princess posse
Reviews.Content: We put one up at the end of our private road and everyone thinks we have some advanced security set up here.  Can't ask for much more for $7!

Reviews.Title: Home Security
Reviews.Author: Robert Taylor
Reviews.Content: These camera's look just like the ones my friend has, that were installed by a security company. I had a door solicitor ask me what the range of the camera and the total cost for installation was! You can't beat them for the price!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Marilyn T. Giangrande
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, am very pleased because it may be fake but it looks real. I was having a problem with a person vandelizing my property, since tis camera has been installed it was detered the culprit away.  So far so goos, with all the rain we've been getting lately, it has not affected the function on this camera.  The red light that blinks intermittedly is very bright, which I like the most about it.  Only I know it's a fake, people have asked me about it, and I tell them it's hooked up to a monitor in my house!  It certainly is doing what it was intended to do.  I gave it 5 stars because it's working great for me.

Reviews.Title: Don't think this will save you....
Reviews.Author: Mark Eldridge
Reviews.Content: You can tell a fake or dead security camera by looking at it through the viewfinder of any camera that has zero lux capabilities - like sony handycams.  If the sec camera is funtioning it will glow like the sun due to the infrared bulbs.  If it's a fake you just see a blinking red light.  Any night vision goggle will do the same trick, like the free one that people got when they bought the Call of Duty video game.Here's an idea.... Buy a real system!  Save your money.Criminals are not as dumb as you think.

Reviews.Title: Lights went off after about 1 year
Reviews.Author: Hao Wang
Reviews.Content: The items looks like real one, but lights went off after about 1 year, also I need to change battery almost every 2 month, maybe this is outdoor as well as I am living in Phoenix.

Reviews.Title: Cheap trash.
Reviews.Author: NMGardner "NMGardner"
Reviews.Content: Just cheap junk. Not a single word of instruction.  One unit broke in box, one doesn't blink,  third works intermittently.  Three for three.  Bought the cheapest unit I found, shouldn't be too surprised.  Save your money.

Reviews.Title: All 3 were broken at the base
Reviews.Author: Ryan D. Green "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: They all 3 came broken. Had to super glue them back together. Lights in camera worked though.noy a great product.

Reviews.Title: Kinda cheesy....
Reviews.Author: janice white
Reviews.Content: It looks like a toy...doesn't look real. Since the light doesn't turn off, I'm worried that the batteries will die while I'm gone.

Reviews.Title: Trying to avoid the real thing in High Def
Reviews.Author: Flicker
Reviews.Content: We all use deception from time to time, not leaving anything visible in the front of the car while having everything in the trunk. Who hasn't used light timers. This is just another. The security system is real though. The rating is because the real thing in High Definition is amazing in it's clarity. Their much more expensive too. $1600 for  a 4 camera system as opposed to $300. We use a High Def system at work and the definition is good a long way (10 meters) from the camera.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: This camera does what it claims to do and looks so real .. will make going on vacation feel a lot safer for us. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: works for the purpose, but cheap
Reviews.Author: Tojam
Reviews.Content: really cheap plastic, make sure they are mounted high otherwise staring at it for a few minutes may reveal that it's fake!

Reviews.Title: Looks fake
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed by how fake it looks. I bought two and they're sitting in my basement. I will throw them away because putting them up will be a big joke. Any layman can tell that these are not genuine.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: mr.chinatown
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like the real thing!  Easy to install and perfect to keep your unwanted criminals off your property!  Cheaper than the real thing and everyone thinks it's real!

Reviews.Title: Not good for the price
Reviews.Author: raj
Reviews.Content: It looks cheap material. It doesn't move up or down only sideways. There is no on-off switch to turn the led light.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: aliwishes
Reviews.Content: Not worth it. Won`t even tilt far enough to mount. There are better buys. and even some with long battery lives

Reviews.Title: mounting
Reviews.Author: Barry Barbour
Reviews.Content: Could not hang upside down on the eave of the house. A multi purpose hanging should be available with each order.

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Stanley
Reviews.Content: I needed to read the product information better.  The entire 'circle' area of the camera does NOT light up, just 1 light...It does the job but not the way I had hoped it would

Reviews.Title: Ehhh Is ok.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I don't like the blinking read light it's too phoney. In my opinion there should just be a small low power back like that gently iluminates the fake IR leds to make it look like the night vision cameras at night. I took a long pieces of white scrap wire and strung it from the camera into a phony hole around molding to make it look truely wired in. Worth $10 maybe if just tryin to scare away. Even with real cameras most theives are going to do what they want anyways and will have a hoodie or something guess a real camera will just catch the spur of the moment vandel.

Reviews.Title: No instructions
Reviews.Author: shoxked
Reviews.Content: The product came in a damage box. The shipper used a padded envelope which was way to small. Their were only images on the box but no instructions.

Reviews.Title: An impressive dummy
Reviews.Author: Shiftless
Reviews.Content: The Dummy appears authentic, more like the real thing than Charlie McCarthy. It presents a reasonable profile and long term will be a distraction for the "real thing" otherwise mounted moe unobtrusively.  When the "real thing" goes into service, it would be nice to teach the Dummy to speak, sing, click, or flash.

Reviews.Title: look good
Reviews.Author: Noel B. Fludgate
Reviews.Content: I gave only 3 stars because of the two I ordered one was broken. I did not want to go through the return hassle so I superglued the broken part. These camera's look good. The light flashes constantly and I wonder how long the one battery will last. Time will tell.

Reviews.Title: A lot of protection, very little price.
Reviews.Author: Bruce_in_LA "reader_in_LA"
Reviews.Content: I was at a police and city council sponsored meeting in Los Angeles this week about rising home burglary rates in "nice" neighborhoods.  A woman said her house had been broken into 3 times over a few years, and ZERO times after she installed a (real) video security camera.  Well, it's not the video camera that stopped the criminals:  It's the APPEARANCE of a video camera, obviously.

Reviews.Title: Worth 1$ maybe 2...
Reviews.Author: hotrodjoe
Reviews.Content: This thing is absolute junk. Easily identifiable as a fake camera and feels as if looking at it will break it.

Reviews.Title: It's look Plastiky
Reviews.Author: Agent100usa
Reviews.Content: I know it's fake , but please gave me a break, you can identify it from a miles away that this one is FAKE

Reviews.Title: Does not have features similar to some I have previously purchased
Reviews.Author: STONEPOINTE GA
Reviews.Content: I have some dummy cameras that light up only when they sense someone in their area of view. They will then track that person side to side. They will continue to blink until no one is in view. THESE cameras do not do anything but constantly blink until 2 AA batteries are dead. The cameras do not move. I took the batteries out. Maybe they will scare off a fox.

Reviews.Title: Very Cheap Looking!
Reviews.Author: L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: The product is very cheap looking and doesn't look like it should be mounted on a residential house..Would not recommend..

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made and fragile
Reviews.Author: mikeskor
Reviews.Content: Cheaply made and fragile. I doubt this product would hold up to a strong wind or driving rain without breaking. Certainly it could be knocked down with a light tap from a stick or hand. Not worth putting batteries into it. I doubt that it is worth the time and energy to install. A disappointing product. Spend a little more and get a better quality fake camera!

Reviews.Title: Never again!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Kwilos
Reviews.Content: Not reliable, even using the best batteries the batteries went dead in just a couple of weeks. Would recommend just spending the money and getting real cameras.  Just a waste of time and money!

Reviews.Title: Plastic fake security camera, looks fake and is flimsy
Reviews.Author: L. Su
Reviews.Content: This does not look like a real camera it is all plastic, I was going to use it for a housing for my raspberry pi camera, but with the power cable attached the rasp board is just a little too big to fit in the housing.  Also the housing design does not make it very waterproof unless you silicone all parts.  So for my purpose, and with the intent for it to look like a real camera, it was a fail.

Reviews.Title: VERY CHEAP PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: RUDE BOY
Reviews.Content: IT BROKE SOON AS I TIRED TO INSTALL IT I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER ONE VERY HARD TO ANGEL NOT HAPPY

Reviews.Title: Two worked one did not
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: Ordered and received three items.  Two worked one defective.  Had to return one.  Return process fine.  I had to reorder to replace defective item.  I did not  order a replacement

Reviews.Title: Good children's toy
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This item looks and feels like a toy. I would think if it was placed outdoors it would not last very long due to the cheap plastics. I ended up giving it to my kids - and they use it as "laser guns."

Reviews.Title: Camera excellent
Reviews.Author: Pm
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Picks up anythingDef a great purchaseEven get to watch deerGreat signal to alert you to  people or animals

Reviews.Title: Thanks for the great service .
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: Great service, Came in time ,exactly as expected but when got  them one of the camera arrived they was broken, the handle to hang them from was broken, they changed to a good one as soon as they can.Can not ask for better service than this thanks

Reviews.Title: Switch a roo
Reviews.Author: T L Pearson
Reviews.Content: Most people are not at smart as they think they are.  This is a good distraction while you come up behind them and introduce yourself as the owner of the property.  Good stories for friends.

Reviews.Title: No blinking light, no instructions
Reviews.Author: SlotWise
Reviews.Content: Description mentions blinking light, but there is no instructions as to how to open camera for batteries.  I can't find compartment or anything that indicates that it can be opened.

Reviews.Title: Looks great, product non-durable.
Reviews.Author: Alex Nguyen
Reviews.Content: Opened it up, and camera was broken away from the mount more than likely due to poor shipping, or poor packaging. Either way, it arrived broken. Because of the cheap price, I called it a loss, as repackaging, reshipping, etc is just too much trouble. I gave it a 2 star, because it more than likely would have been nice to use, if it was in one piece. Bad quality, but you get what you pay for I guess... Shipping it back would cost nearly as much as the device itself.

Reviews.Title: Cheap. No graphics. Look fake. Don't look like photo. Red light doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: poop noggin
Reviews.Content: The units I received look nothing like those in the photo. They are very cheap plastic, all silver paint, no graphics, and the motion sensors don't work on any of them. I bought three. Wish the company would make contact with me and resolve. The red light doesnt work. Oddly it says in the ad they take AA batteries. These units take AAA. I'm very unhappy.

Reviews.Title: Looks Very Real & Solid Build
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: The price US$9 is a little too much. I wish it's be priced US$5, that would be fair. The build, look and size is very believable and solid.

Reviews.Title: Lights Don't Work
Reviews.Author: Nicole Maschke
Reviews.Content: This review should bear no reflection on the company. But the lights on the camera do not work, which causes the camera to appear to not be functioning. I believe that the company is reputable. And that when one of their products does not work correctly that the company will endeavor to do all that is possible to resolve the situation. However, I think that, partially, because the cameras are so inexpensive, that the quality control on their manufacturing, might not be as effective as it might be with more expensive versions of cameras of this type. However, if the lights are not an issue, then the rest of the camera works fine. The lights not working was my only issue. All other aspects, and the presentation of the company itself was fine.

Reviews.Title: How does it ship?
Reviews.Author: CPLNAVARRO
Reviews.Content: Is the box going to say "Fake Dummy Camera Inside" & give it away to all my neighbors??? I need a temporary fix at the moment. My car was broken into last night. They didn't take much but an old cell phone, sunglasses and some spare change in the ashtray but its the violation that's killing me! They trashed the car, throwing important papers about, tossing cds all over. All day I've been looking out the window! I'm not sure what a real camera will cost and this seems cheap enough with good reviews. My only concern will be the box left on the steps that might say "HEY! I'm fake!"

Reviews.Title: My husband got these
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: My husband got these and I think they are dumb. Why would someone want fake cameras? They do look real and the red light does flash.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Service
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item June 26 2012.Today is 8/10/2012.I have not yet received this item!Do not recommend ordering this item!

Reviews.Title: Careful, Dummy Cameras Can Carry Heavy Fines
Reviews.Author: Saitias
Reviews.Content: Hey guys,I just wanted to note something I learned recently. I own a store that has been broken into twice now over 2 years. We're beefing up security and I had a few different security camera companies come out to give us quotes, including the well known guys like ADT. I was informed on more than one occasion that dummy cameras like this are very illegal. You won't get busted for putting one up...because the thing looks real. But if something happens - for instance if a crime happens and your dummy camera should have technically caught the incident but didn't, there is a several thousand dollar fine for that. The law can vary from state to state, but the gist is that you mislead people into believing they were safe, and therefore put their safety at risk, so you were acting recklessly. In my county the police department hands out the fine. Don't know if it works that way everywhere. Didn't do the research on this, so if someone knows otherwise speak up, but from talking to some camera technicians that weren't exactly selling their own products (the ADT guy recommended a different company all together), they all chimed in that dummy cameras are an awful and risky idea.granted, i suppose you can say that there is no recording...
